content: Chiv keeb thau u Vaajtswv tswm lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb.
Lub nplajteb tseed tsw tau muaj tug yaam ntxwv zoo le caag, hab nyob do cuas hab tsaus ntuj nti thoob plawg sau tej dej, hab Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig yuj roog taag nrho sau tej dej ntawd.
Mas Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj qhov kaaj,” tes txawm muaj qhov kaaj.
Vaajtswv pum tas qhov kaaj ntawd zoo, txawm muab qhov kaaj cais tawm huv qhov tsaus ntuj.
Vaajtswv hu qhov kaaj tas Nruab Nub, hab hu qhov tsaus ntuj tas, Mo Ntuj. Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog thawj nub.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj lub ntuj lug nyob nruab nraab tej dej hab ca lub ntuj cais dej cais naag nyag nyob nyag.”
Vaajtswv txhad tswm lub ntuj hab muab tej dej kws nyob huv qaab lub ntuj cais ntawm tej dej kws nyob sau lub ntuj. Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Vaajtswv txhad hu lub ntuj hov ua Ntuj. Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog nub ob.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca tej dej kws nyob huv qaab ntuj sau zog moog nyob rua ib qho, hab nruab nqhuab tshwm tuaj.” Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Vaajtswv txhad hu nruab nqhuab tas Nplajteb, hab hu tej dej kws sau zog ua ke tas Havtxwv. Mas Vaajtswv pum tas zoo.

Hab Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca lub nplajteb tuaj qoob loos nroj tsuag kws muaj noob hab tuaj xyoob ntoo kws muaj txwv hab muaj noob, nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam rua sau lub nplajteb.” Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Lub nplajteb txawm tuaj tej qoob loos nroj tsuag kws muaj noob nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam, hab tuaj tej ntoo kws txw txwv hab muaj noob nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam. Mas Vaajtswv pum tas zoo.
Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog nub peb.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le muaj tej lub ci ci rua sau nruab ntug cais nruab nub hab mo ntuj, hab ca tej lub ci ci hov qha kuas paub quas caij quas nyoog quas nub quas hli quas naj quas xyoo.
Hab ca tej lub hov ci rua sau nruab ntug pum kev rua huv nplajteb.” Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Vaajtswv tswm ob lub ci ci kws luj, lub luj kaav nruab nub, lub yau kaav mo ntuj. Hab nwg kuj tswm tej nub qub.
Vaajtswv txawb tej kws ci nuav rua sau nruab ntug pum kev rua lub nplajteb,
hab kaav nruab nub hab mo ntuj, hab cais qhov kaaj tawm huv qhov tsaus ntuj. Mas Vaajtswv pum tas zoo.
Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog nub plaub.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca nruab deg tshwm tej tsaj caj sa coob kawg, hab ca naag noog yaa sau lub nplajteb rua sau nruab ntug.”

Vaajtswv txhad tswm tej tsaj luj luj huv havtxwv, hab tswm txhua yaam tsaj caj sa coob coob kws yaa laim quas txag huv nruab deg, nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam, hab tswm txhua yaam naag noog muaj tis nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam. Mas Vaajtswv pum tas zoo.
Hab Vaajtswv foom moov zoo rua tej tsaj ntawd has tas, “Ca le muaj mivnyuas hab fuam vaam coob puv nkaus nruab havtxwv, hab ca naag noog fuam vaam coob rua sau lub nplajteb.”
Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog nub tswb.
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca lub nplajteb tshwm tej tsaj caj sa nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam, yog tej tsaj nyeg tej tsaj nkaag huv aav hab tej tsaj qus nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam.” Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.

Vaajtswv txhad tswm tej tsaj qus rua huv nplajteb nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam hab tswm tej tsaj nyeg nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam, hab tswm txhua yaam tsaj nkaag huv aav nyag muaj lawv le nyag yaam. Mas Vaajtswv pum tas zoo.

Hab Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca peb tswm tuabneeg lawv le peb tug yaam ntxwv hab zoo le peb. Ca puab muaj fwjchim tswjfwm tej ntseg huv havtxwv hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug hab tej tsaj txhu hab lub nplajteb huvsw hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv lub nplajteb.”
Vaajtswv txhad tswm tuabneeg lawv le nwg tug yaam ntxwv, lawv le Vaajtswv tug yaam ntxwv hov nwg tswm tuabneeg, nwg tswm tuabneeg kuas muaj txwvneej hab quaspuj.

Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua puab, hab has rua puab tas, “Ca le muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob puv nkaus nplajteb, hab kaav lub nplajteb rua huv mej xwb teg, hab muaj fwjchim tswjfwm tej ntseg huv havtxwv hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug hab txhua yaam tsaj caj sa kws nkaag huv lub nplajteb.”
Hab Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv pub txhua yaam qoob loos kws muaj noob kws nyob thoob plawg huv lub nplajteb hab txhua yaam ntoo kws txw txwv muaj noob rua mej. Mej yuav muab tej nuav lug ua zaub mov noj.

Hab txhua yaam tsaj huv nplajteb hab txhua yaam naag noog sau nruab ntug hab txhua yaam kws nkaag huv nplajteb, yog txhua yaam caj sa kws ua paa nyob, kuv pub tej zaub mog ntsuab ntsuab huvsw rua puab noj.” Tes txawm muaj le ntawd.
Vaajtswv saib txhua yaam kws nwg tau tswm hov mas pum tas zoo heev. Tes txawm muaj tsaus ntuj hab muaj kaaj ntug, yog nub rau.
Lub ntuj lub teb hab ib puas tsaav yaam huv qaab ntuj tswm tav taag le nuav.
Nub xyaa Vaajtswv tej num tub tav taag lawm, mas nub xyaa hov nwg su txhua yaam num kws nwg tau ua.
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nub xyaa hab muab tsaa ua nub kws dawb huv, tsua qhov nub ntawd Vaajtswv su txhua yaam num kws tau tswm ntuj tswm teb.
Ntawm nuav moog yog has txug qhov kws tswm lub ntuj hab tswm lub nplajteb. Nub kws Vaajtswv Yawmsaub  tswm lub nplajteb hab lub ntuj,
tej xyoob ntoo tsw tau muaj rua huv nplajteb hab tej qoob loos tsw tau tuaj le, vem yog Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tsw tau tso naag lug rua sau lub nplajteb hab tsw muaj tuabneeg ua laj ua teb,
tassws muaj dej txheem huv nplajteb tuaj ua rua aav noo quas zaws thoob plawg.
Thaus ntawd Vaajtswv Yawmsaub muab moov aav lug puab tswm ua tuabneeg,  hab tshuab paa caj sa rua huv nwg lub qhov ntswg, mas tuabneeg txhad le caj sa.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub cog ib lub vaaj rua ntawm Etee kws nyob saab nub tuaj, mas nwg muab tug tuabneeg kws nwg tau tswm tso nyob qhov ntawd.
Hab Vaajtswv Yawmsaub ua kuas txhua yaam ntoo kws zoo saib zoo noj tawm huv aav tuaj. Huv lub plawv vaaj muaj ib tsob ntoo kws pub txujsa hab ib tsob ntoo kws pub kuas paub qhov zoo qhov phem.
Muaj ib tug dej ndwg ntawm Etee lug ntub lub vaaj, dhau ntawd lawm txawm faib ndwg ua plaub tug.
Tug kws ib npe hu ua Pisoo, yog tug dej kws ndwg puag ncig Havila tebchaws, hov ntawd muaj qhov kub.
Cov kub ntawm lub tebchaws hov yog cov tseem kub. Hab muaj cov roj ntoo tsw qaab hab tej qai zeb av txho ci laam lug hov ntawd.
Tug dej kws ob hu ua Kihoo, yog tug dej kws ndwg puag ncig Khuj tebchaws.
Tug dej kws peb hu ua Thaiki, kws ndwg moog rua Axilia tebchaws saab nub tuaj. Tug dej kws plaub yog tug dej Yufeti.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub muab tug tuabneeg hov tso nyob huv lub vaaj Etee kuas tu hab saib lub vaaj ntawd.
Mas Vaajtswv Yawmsaub nkaw lug rua tug tuabneeg tas, “Txhua yaam txwv ntoo huv lub vaaj nuav koj noj tau huvsw,
tassws tsob ntoo kws pub kuas paub qhov zoo qhov phem, koj tsw xob noj cov txwv hlo le, yog nub twg koj noj koj yuav tuag.”
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, “Tsw tswm nyog ca tug tuabneeg nuav nyob tuab leeg. Kuv yuav tswm ib tug paab kws phim nwg.”

Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad le muab aav lug puab tswm txhua yaam tsaj huv nplajteb hab txhua yaam naag noog sau nruab ntug, coj lug rua tug tuabneeg hov, saib nwg yuav tis npe hu le caag. Tug tuabneeg tis npe rua tej tsaj kws caj sa le caag, tes tej tsaj hov kuj muaj npe le ntawd.
Tug tuabneeg hov tis npe rua tej tsaj nyeg tsaj qus huvsw hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug huvsw. Tassws tsw muaj ib tug paab kws phim tug tuabneeg  hov.
Mas Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad ua rua tug tuabneeg tsaug zug heev, hab thaus nwg tsaug zug lawm Vaajtswv txhad rhu nwg ib tug taav tawm lug hab ua rua lub qhov txhaab nqawm zoo le qub.
Tug taav kws Vaajtswv Yawmsaub rhu tawm huv tug tuabneeg hov lug, Vaajtswv muab tswm ua ib tug quaspuj, hab coj lug rua tug txwvneej hov.
Tug txwvneej txhad has tas, “Nuav lauj, tej txhaa nuav tawm huv kuv txhaa lug, tej nqaj nuav tawm huv kuv nqaj lug. Yuav hu ua Quaspuj, vem rhu nwg tawm huv Quasyawg lug.”
Vem le nuav tug txwvneej txhad ncaim ntawm nwg nam nwg txwv hab nrug nwg tug quaspuj tsheej xeeb ua ke mas ob tug koom ua ib lub cev.
Tug quasyawg hab nwg tug quaspuj nyob lab qaab tsw txaaj muag.
Tej tsaj qus kws Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tswm mas naab ntse dua huvsw. Naab txhad nug tug quaspuj hov tas, “Vaajtswv has tas tsw xob noj txhua yaam txwv ntoo huv lub vaaj nuav tag lov?”
Tug quaspuj txhad teb naab tas, “Wb noj tau tej txwv ntoo huv lub vaaj nuav huvsw,
kuas Vaajtswv has tas, ‘Meb tsw xob noj tsob txwv ntoo kws nyob huv plawv vaaj, hab tsw xob kov hlo le, tsaam tes meb tuag.’ ”
Naab txawm has rua tug quaspuj hov tas, “Meb yeej yuav tsw tuag le.
Vaajtswv has le ntawd vem nwg paub tas meb noj tsob txwv ntoo hov thaus twg tes meb lub qhov muag yuav pum tseeb thaus ntawd mas meb yuav zoo ib yaam le Vaajtswv, yog paub qhov zoo qhov phem.”

Thaus tug quaspuj hov pum tas tsob txwv ntoo hov ntxwm noj hab saib ntsoov lab sab kawg le, hab pum tas tsob txwv ntoo ntxwm ntshaw vem ua kuas muaj plaab plaw tswvyim, nwg txhad de lug noj hab cev rua nwg tug quasyawg mas nwg tug quasyawg kuj noj.
Mas ob tug ob leeg lub qhov muag txawm pum tseeb tuaj, hab ob tug xaam pum tas ob tug nyob lab qaab. Ob tug txhad muab nplooj txwv cua lug xaws ua tsoog naav.

Thaus tshaav ntuj laaj lawm ob tug txawm nov Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tuaj ncig rua huv lub vaaj, mas tug quasyawg hab nwg tug quaspuj txhad moog tswv nraim rua huv cov ntoo huv lub vaaj kuas dhau Vaajtswv Yawmsaub lub xubndag.
Tes Vaajtswv Yawmsaub hu tug quasyawg hov hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj nyob hovtwg?”
Tug quasyawg teb tas, “Kuv nov koj tuaj rua huv lub vaaj mas kuv ntshai vem yog kuv nyob lab qaab, kuv txhad moog tswv nraim lawm.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Leejtwg has rua koj tas koj lab qaab? Koj noj tsob txwv ntoo kws kuv txwv tsw pub koj noj lawm lov?”
Tug quasyawg has tas, “Tub yog tug quaspuj kws koj pub nrug kuv nyob ua ke muab tej txwv hov rua kuv mas kuv txhad noj.”
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has rua tug quaspuj tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav?” Tug quaspuj teb tas, “Naab ntxag kuv, kuv txhad le noj.”

Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad has rua naab tas, “Vem qhov kws koj ua le nuav, koj yuav raug foom tsw zoo heev dua tej tsaj nyeg tsaj qus huvsw. Koj yuav xuas lub plaab ndaug, hab yuav noj moov aav moog taag koj swm neej.

Kuv yuav ua rua koj hab tug quaspuj nuav ua yeeb ncuab, koj caaj ceg hab tug quaspuj caaj ceg yuav ua yeeb ncuab moog le. Tug quaspuj caaj ceg yuav tsoo koj taubhau kuas ntsoog, hab koj yuav tum nwg lauj taw.”

Vaajtswv has rua tug quaspuj tas, “Kuv yuav tsaav kev mob ntau rua koj rua thaus koj hai mivnyuas, koj yuav mob heev rua thaus koj yug mivnyuas, txawm le ntawd los koj tseed xaav nrug koj tug quasyawg ua txwj ua nkawm, hab koj tug quasyawg yuav tswjfwm koj.”

Vaajtswv has rua Ataa tas, “Vem koj noog koj tug quaspuj lug es noj tsob txwv ntoo kws kuv has tas, ‘Koj tsw xob noj,’ mas tej aav raug foom tsw zoo vem yog tim koj, koj yuav nrhav noj khwv khwv le taag koj swm neej.
Cov aav yuav tuaj xuav paug hab tuaj nroj tsuag rua koj, hab koj yuav noj tej qoob loos huv daim teb.
Koj yuav khwv nto fws quas lug txhad tau noj moog txug thaus koj rov qaab moog rua huv aav, vem yog tswm koj tawm huv aav lug. Koj yog moov aav, mas koj yuav rov moog ua moov aav.”
Ataa  hu nwg tug quaspuj lub npe tas Eva,  vem nwg yog ib tsoom tuabneeg kws muaj txujsa nyob leej nam.
Vaajtswv Yawmsaub muab tawv tsaj ua tsoog tsho rua Ataa hab nwg tug quaspuj hab muab rua ob tug naav.

Mas Vaajtswv Yawmsaub has tas, “Saib maj, tug tuabneeg hov lug ua zoo le peb lawm hab txawj paub qhov zoo qhov phem. Nwgnuav tsw kheev nwg cev teg de tsob txwv kws pub txujsa lug noj es muaj txujsa ntev moog ib txhws tsw kawg.”
Vem le nuav Vaajtswv Yawmsaub txhad ntab nwg tawm huv lub vaaj Etee moog ua laj ua teb rua huv cov aav kws Vaajtswv tswm nwg tawm lug.

Vaajtswv ntab tug tuabneeg hov tawm moog hab tsaa cov Khelunpee  nyob ntawm lub vaaj Etee saab nub tuaj hab tsaa ib raab ntaaj nplaim tawg kws txawj ncig rua txhua faab zuv txujkev kws nkaag rua ntawm tsob ntoo kws pub txujsa.
Ataa nrug nwg tug quaspuj Eva pw, mas Eva txhad xeeb tub hab yug tau tug tub Khayee.  Eva has tas, “Yawmsaub paab kuv yug tau ib tug tub.”
Dhau ntawd Eva yug tau dua ib tug tub hu ua Anpee. Anpee yog tuabneeg yug yaaj, Khayee yog tuabneeg ua teb.
Muaj ib nub Khayee coj tej qoob loos kws nwg sau huv nruab teb tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub,
huas Anpee coj tej mivnyuas yaaj kws yog thawj tug huv nwg paab yaaj tuaj muab cov roj yaaj hov xyeem. Mas Yawmsaub txaus sab rua Anpee hab tej kws nwg coj tuaj xyeem.
Tassws Yawmsaub tsw txaus sab rua Khayee hab tej kws nwg coj tuaj xyeem hov. Khayee txhad chim heev ua ntsej muag o wv.
Yawmsaub txhad nug Khayee tas, “Ua caag koj chim? Ua caag koj ntsej muag o wv?
Yog koj ua zoo, kuv yuav txais koj los tsw yog? Yog koj ua tsw zoo, lub txem plab lua zuv ntawm qhov rooj xaav tum koj, tassws koj yuav tsum kov yeej lub txem ntawd.”
Khayee has rua nwg tug kwv Anpee tas, “Wb ua ke moog teb.”  Thaus ob tug nyob huv teb, Khayee txawm muab nwg tug kwv Anpee ntaus raus rw tua pov tseg.
Mas Yawmsaub nug Khayee tas, “Koj tug kwv Anpee dua twg lawm?” Khayee teb tas, “Kuv tsw paub, kuv nyim yog tug kws zuv kuv tug kwv lov?”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Koj ua le caag lawm? Koj tug kwv cov ntshaav quaj qw huv cov aav tuaj txug kuv lawm.
Nwgnuav koj yuav raug foom tsw zoo ntawm cov aav kws rua ncauj nqog koj tug kwv cov ntshaav huv koj txhais teg.
Thaus koj ua teb cov aav yuav tsw zoo qoob loos rua koj. Koj yuav tswv moog nyob tsw muaj vaag tsw muaj tse rua huv lub nplajteb.”
Khayee has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Kuv lub txem nyaav dhau kuv rws tsw taug.

Nub nua koj muab kuv ntab tawm huv cov aav hab dhau ntawm koj lub xubndag moog. Kuv yuav tswv moog nyob tsw muaj vaag tsw muaj tse rua huv lub nplajteb. Leejtwg ntswb kuv kuj yuav muab kuv tua pov tseg.”
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Khayee tas, “Tsw tau. Leejtwg tua Khayee mas yuav raug pauj taub xyaa npaug.” Hab Yawmsaub ntaus cim rua Khayee lub cev sub leejtwg ntswb nwg los txhad tsw muab nwg tua.
Khayee txhad tawm huv Yawmsaub lub xubndag moog hab nyob rua huv tebchaws Nauj,  kws nyob Etee saab nub tuaj.
Khayee nrug nwg tug quaspuj pw, mas nwg txhad xeeb tub hab yug tau tug tub Enauj. Khayee rhawv ib lub moos hab hu lub npe lawv nwg tug tub Enauj.
Enauj yug tau Ilaj, hab Ilaj yug tau Mehuya‑ee, hab Mehuya‑ee yug tau Methusa‑ee, hab Methusa‑ee yug tau Lame.
Lame yuav ob tug quaspuj, ib tug hu ua Antas, ib tug hu ua Xilas.
Antas yug tau Yanpaa. Yanpaa yog cov kws nyob huv tsev ntaub hab yug tsaj le yawm koob.
Nwg tug kwv yog Yunpaa. Yunpaa yog cov kws txawj ntaus nkauj nog ncaas hab tshuv raaj suavdawg le yawm koob.
Xilas yug tau Thunpaa Khayee, kws yog Kws tooj Kws hlau ntaus txhua yaam cuab yeej swv. Thunpaa Khayee muaj ib tug muam hu ua Na‑ama.

Lame has rua nwg ob tug quaspuj tas, “Antas hab Xilas, ca le noog kuv tej lug, Lame tej quaspuj ca le noog kuv has, kuv tua ib tug txwvneej vem nwg ua raug kuv mob, yog tua ib tug hluas, vem nwg ntaus kuv.
Yog ua raug Khayee yuav ua pauj xyaa npaug, yog ua raug Lame yeej yuav ua pauj xyaa caum xyaa npaug.”
Ataa rov nrug nwg tug quaspuj pw, mas nwg yug tau ib tug tub hab tis npe hu ua Xej.  Nwg has tas, “Vaajtswv pub kuv muaj dua ib tug tub nyob Anpee chaw, tsua qhov Khayee muab Anpee tua lawm.”
Xej muaj ib tug tub mas tis npe hu ua Enaus. Lub swjhawm ntawd tuabneeg chiv tuav Yawmsaub lub npe thov.
Ntawm nuav moog yog has txug Ataa caaj ceg. Thaus Vaajtswv tswm tuabneeg, nwg tswm lawv le Vaajtswv tug yaam ntxwv.
Nwg tswm kuas muaj txwvneej hab quaspuj, hab foom koob moov rua puab, hab nwg tis npe hu ua Tuabneeg  rua nub kws nwg tswm puab.
Thaus Ataa muaj ib puas peb caug xyoo, nwg muaj ib tug tub zoo le nwg hab lawv le nwg tug yaam ntxwv, hab tis npe hu ua Xej.
Thaus Ataa muaj tug tub Xej lawm nwg nyob tau yim pua xyoo ntxwv, mas nwg tseed muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Ataa le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua peb caug xyoo nwg le tuag.
Xej noob nyoog muaj ib puas tswb xyoo le muaj tug tub Enaus.
Thaus Xej muaj tug tub Enaus lawm nwg tseed nyob tau yim pua xyaa xyoo, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Xej le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua kaum ob xyoos nwg le tuag.
Enaus noob nyoog muaj cuaj caug xyoo le muaj tug tub Khenaa.
Thaus Enaus muaj tug tub Khenaa lawm nwg tseed nyob tau yim pua kaum tswb xyoos, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Enaus le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua tswb xyoo nwg le tuag.
Khenaa noob nyoog muaj xyaa caum xyoo le muaj tug tub Mahalalee.
Thaus Khenaa muaj tug tub Mahalalee lawm nwg tseed nyob tau yim pua plaub caug xyoo, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Khenaa le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua kaum xyoo nwg le tuag.
Mahalalee noob nyoog muaj rau caum tswb xyoos le muaj tug tub Yale.
Thaus Mahalalee muaj tug tub Yale lawm nwg tseed nyob tau yim pua peb caug xyoo, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Mahalalee le noob nyoog huvsw muaj yim pua cuaj caug tswb xyoos nwg le tuag.
Yale noob nyoog muaj ib puas rau caum ob xyoos le muaj tug tub Enauj.
Thaus Yale muaj tug tub Enauj lawm nwg tseed nyob tau yim pua xyoo, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Yale le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua rau caum ob xyoos nwg le tuag.
Enauj noob nyoog muaj rau caum tswb xyoos le muaj tug tub Methuxela.
Thaus Enauj muaj tug tub Methuxela lawm nwg tseed nrug nraim Vaajtswv tau peb puas xyoo, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Enauj le noob nyoog huvsw muaj peb puas rau caum tswb xyoos.
Enauj nrug nraim Vaajtswv mas ca le pluj plag lawm tsua qhov yog Vaajtswv coj nwg moog lawm.
Methuxela noob nyoog muaj ib puas yim caum xyaa xyoo le muaj tug tub Lame.
Thaus Methuxela muaj tug tub Lame lawm nwg tseed nyob tau xyaa pua yim caum ob xyoos, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Methuxela le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua rau caum cuaj xyoos nwg le tuag.
Lame noob nyoog muaj ib puas yim caum ob xyoos le muaj ib tug tub.

Nwg tis tug tub npe hu ua Nau‑a  hab nwg has tas, “Tug nuav yuav coj txujkev tau su ntawm peb tej num hab tau su ntawm tej kws peb txhais teg ua khwv khwv le huv cov aav kws raug Yawmsaub foom tsw zoo lawm.”
Thaus Lame muaj tug tub Nau‑a lawm nwg tseed nyob tau tswb puas cuaj caug tswb xyoos, hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Lame le noob nyoog huvsw muaj xyaa pua xyaa caum xyaa xyoo nwg le tuag.
Nau‑a noob nyoog muaj tswb puas xyoo le muaj peb tug tub hu ua Xeeb hab Haa hab Yafe.
Thaus tuabneeg fuam vaam coob rua huv lub nplajteb hab muaj ntxhais,
mas Vaajtswv cov tub  pum tas tuabneeg tej ntxhais zoo nkauj heev puab txawm tuaj yuav cov kws puab nyam ua quaspuj.
Yawmsaub txhad has tas, “Kuv tug ntsuj plig yuav tsw nyob huv tuabneeg moog ib txhws, tsua qhov tuabneeg yog nqaj tawv, puab noob nyoog yuav nyob ib puas neeg nkaum xyoo xwb.”

Thaus ntawd hab yaav tom qaab muaj cov tuabneeg Nefili nyob huv lub nplajteb, yog thaus Vaajtswv cov tub  nrug tuabneeg tej ntxhais pw es yug tau mivnyuas. Cov Nefili hov yog cov tuabneeg sab luj sab tuab hab muaj koob meej thau u.
Yawmsaub pum tas tuabneeg tej kev phem luj kawg rua huv lub nplajteb, hab pum tas puab tsuas yog pheej xaav zaaj phem rua huv lub sab moog le xwb.
Yawmsaub khauvxwm qhov kws nwg tau tswm tuabneeg rua huv lub nplajteb, hab nwg tu sab heev.

Yawmsaub txhad has tas, “Kuv yuav muab cov tuabneeg kws kuv tau tswm lug lawm ntxuav pov tseg huv lub nplajteb, tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu hab tej tsaj kws nkaag huv aav hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug huvsw, tsua qhov kuv tu sab qhov kws kuv tau tswm puab lug.”
Tassws Nau‑a yog tug kws Yawmsaub txaus sab rua.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Nau‑a caaj ceg. Nau‑a yog tug kws ncaaj nceeg hab huv nwg tam neej nwg tuab leeg ua zoo. Nau‑a nrug nraim Vaajtswv.
Nau‑a muaj peb tug tub, Xeeb, Haa hab Yafe.
Vaajtswv pum tas taag nrho lub nplajteb phem taag huvsw hab ua limham ndais ntuj puv nkaus nplajteb.
Vaajtswv saib ntsoov lub nplajteb mas pum tas phem kawg le, vem yog ib tsoom tuabneeg ua puab lub neej phem taag rua huv lub nplajteb.

Vaajtswv txhad has rua Nau‑a tas, “Kuv txav sab lawm tas kuv yuav ua rua tej tuabneeg puam tsuaj taag huvsw, vem yog muaj kev limham ndais ntuj puv nkaus lub nplajteb vem yog tim tuabneeg. Saib maj, kuv yuav ua kuas puab hab lub nplajteb puam tsuaj ua ke.
Koj ca le muab ntoo thuv kaufaw ua ib lub nkoj. Hab muab kem ua tej quas chaav hab muab roj ntoo luam saab huv saab nrau huvsw.
Koj ua lub nkoj lawv le nuav, yog ntev peb puas tshwm, daav tswb caug tshwm, sab peb caug tshwm.
Tseg qag ib zaaj  sau lub npoo nkoj sab le ib tshwm, ua lub qhov rooj nkoj rua ib saab, hab ua peb txheej, ua txheej ib, txheej ob, txheej peb.
Tsua qhov kuv yuav tso dej lug nyaab lub nplajteb, yuav ua kuas txhua yaam kws caj sa ua paa puam tsuaj taag nrho huvsw huv lub qaab ntuj. Txhua yaam kws nyob huv lub nplajteb yuav tuag taag huvsw.
Tassws kuv yuav cog lug ruaj rua koj. Koj hab koj quaspuj koj tej tub tej nyaab huvsw yuav nkaag rua huv lub nkoj.
Coj txhua yaam kws muaj txujsa ib yaam ib nkawg ib tug maum ib tug txwv nkaag rua huv lub nkoj sub txhad dim txujsa nrug koj nyob.
Txhua yaam noog lawv le nwg yaam hab txhua yaam tsaj lawv le nwg yaam hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv aav lawv le nwg yaam, ib yaam ib nkawg yuav lug cuag koj sub txhad dim txujsa.
Koj yuav sau qoob loos mov noj txhua yaam khaws ca rua koj hab rua tej tsaj txhu naag noog noj.”
Nau‑a ua txhua yaam lawv le Vaajtswv kuas nwg ua.
Yawmsaub has rua Nau‑a tas, “Koj tsev tuabneeg huvsw ca le nkaag taag nrho rua huv lub nkoj, tsua qhov tam tuabneeg nuav kuv pum tas koj ncaaj nceeg xwb.
Coj tej tsaj kws huv txhua yaam nrug koj moog ib yaam xyaa nkawm ib tug maum ib tug txwv, hab coj tej tsaj kws tsw huv ib yaam ib nkawg ib tug maum ib tug txwv,
hab coj tej noog sau nruab ntug ib yaam xyaa nkawm ib tug puj ib tug lauv sub txhad dim txujsa ua noob thoob nplajteb.
Tshuav xyaa nub kuv yuav tso naag lug rua huv lub nplajteb nuav plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, mas kuv yuav muab txhua yaam caj sa kws kuv tau tswm lug ntxuav pov tseg huv lub nplajteb.”
Nau‑a ua txhua yaam lawv le Yawmsaub kuas nwg ua.
Thaus dej lug nyaab lub nplajteb Nau‑a noob nyoog muaj rau pua xyoo.
Nau‑a hab nwg quaspuj hab nwg tej tub tej nyaab ua ke moog rua huv lub nkoj sub txhad dim dej nyaab.
Tej tsaj kws huv hab tej tsaj kws qas hab tej naag noog hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv aav,
kuj nrug Nau‑a nkaag rua huv lub nkoj, ua ib nkawg ib nkawg, ib tug maum hab ib tug txwv, lawv le Vaajtswv tau has rua Nau‑a.
Thaus dhau xyaa nub dej kuj lug nyaab lub nplajteb.
Thaus Nau‑a noob nyoog muaj rau pua xyoo, lub ob hlis nub tim kaum xyaa, mas nub ntawd ntaag dej txhawv huv nruab tiv txwv fuam tuaj rua txhua lub hauv dej, hab rooj ntug qheb.
Hab naag lug rua huv lub nplajteb plaub caug nub plaub caug mo.
Tuab nub ntawd Nau‑a hab nwg cov tub, Xeeb hab Haa hab Yafe hab Nau‑a tug quaspuj hab nwg peb tug nyaab ua ke nkaag rua huv lub nkoj.

Puab hab txhua yaam tsaj qus lawv le nwg yaam, hab tej tsaj nyeg huvsw lawv le nwg yaam hab tej tsaj huvsw kws nkaag huv aav lawv le nwg yaam hab txhua yaam noog huvsw lawv le nwg yaam, yog txhua yaam kws muaj tis huvsw nkaag moog.
Txhua yaam kws caj sa ua paa nrug Nau‑a nkaag moog rua huv lub nkoj ua ib nkawg ib nkawg.
Txhua yaam tsaj hov puavleej muaj tug maum hab tug txwv nkaag moog lawv le Vaajtswv has. Mas Yawmsaub txhad muab Nau‑a kaw rua huv.
Dej nyaab nplajteb tau plaub caug nub, dej txhad fuam hlub ua rua lub nkoj ntaab rua sau lub nplajteb.
Dej fuam hlub quas zug rua sau lub nplajteb mas lub nkoj ntaab sau nplaim dej.
Dej fuam hlub kawg le rua sau lub nplajteb nyaab hlo txhua lub roob sab huv qaab ntuj huvsw.
Dej nyaab dhau cov hauv roob sab rua sau kaum tswb tshwm.
Txhua yaam kws caj sa nyob huv nplajteb, tsw has naag noog, tsaj nyeg tsaj qus, txhua yaam tsaj miv miv kws npoj quas log huv nplajteb hab txhua tug tuabneeg tuag taag huvsw.
Txhua yaam tsaj caj sa kws ua paa nyob nruab nqhuab kuj tuag taag huvsw.

Vaajtswv ntxuav txhua yaam kws caj sa nyob huv lub nplajteb tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu hab tej tsaj kws nkaag huv aav hab tej naag noog sau nruab ntug, puavleej raug muab ntxuav du lug huv lub nplajteb. Tsuas yog tshuav Nau‑a hab cov kws nrug nwg nyob huv lub nkoj xwb.
Dej nyaab nplajteb tau ib puas tswb caug nub.
Vaajtswv ncu txug Nau‑a hab tej tsaj qus tsaj nyeg huvsw kws nrug Nau‑a nyob huv lub nkoj. Mas Vaajtswv txhad ua cua ntsawj rua sau lub nplajteb dej txhad nqeg.
Tej qhov dej txhawv huv nruab tiv txwv hab tej rooj ntug kuj raug muab kaw, naag sau ntuj txhad tu lawm.
Dej txhad nqeg sau lub nplajteb quas zug lawm. Thaus dhau ib puas tswb caug nub lawm dej kuj nqeg lawm ntau.
Nub tim kaum xyaa lub xyaa hli lub nkoj lug txawb rua sau tej roob Alalab.
Dej nqeg quas zug moog txug lub kaum hli. Nub xab ib lub kaum hli tej ncov roob kuj tshwm tuaj.
Dhau plaub caug nub lawm Nau‑a qheb lub qhov rais nkoj kws nwg ua,
nwg tso ib tug uab voj tawm moog. Tug uab voj hov yaa moog yaa lug moog txug thaus dej qhuav taag huv lub nplajteb.
Nau‑a tso ib tug nquab taug yaa moog, saib dej nqeg taag huv lub nplajteb los tsw tau.
Tassws tug nquab taug nrhav tsw tau chaw tsaws vem dej tseed nyaab thoob nplajteb, mas txhad yaa rov lug rua ntawm Nau‑a huv lub nkoj. Mas Nau‑a cev teg moog nteg tug nquab hov lug rua huv lub nkoj.
Nau‑a tog dua xyaa nub le tso tug nquab tawm huv lub nkoj moog dua ib zag.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj tug nquab rov lug rua ntawm Nau‑a, tug kaug ncauj kwv ib daim nplooj txwv aulib ntsuab ntsuab kws nyav de lug. Nau‑a txhad paub tas dej nqeg taag huv lub nplajteb lawm.
Nau‑a tog dua xyaa nub le tso tug nquab tawm moog, mas tug nquab tsw rov lug rua ntawm Nau‑a le lawm.
Xyoo kws rau pua ib, lub ib hlis nub xab ib dej qhuav taag huv lub nplajteb, mas Nau‑a yaws tej vuag kws vuv lub nkoj saib mas pum tas aav qhuav lawm.
Thaus txug nub tim neeg nkaum xyaa lub ob hlis lub nplajteb qhuav taag lawm.
Yawmsaub has rua Nau‑a tas,
“Koj hab koj quaspuj koj tej tub tej nyaab huvsw ca le tawm huv lub nkoj moog.
Ca le coj txhua yaam tsaj caj sa kws nrug koj nyob tawm lug, tsw has naag noog tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv aav, sub txhad tau yeej noob fuam vaam coob rua huv nplajteb.”
Nau‑a hab nwg tug quaspuj hab nwg tej tub tej nyaab txawm tawm lug.
Txhua yaam tsaj txhu hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv aav hab txhua yaam noog, yog txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag hab yaa huv lub nplajteb, kuj tawm ib yaam zuj zug huv lub nkoj lug.
Nau‑a ua ib lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub, mas muab tej tsaj kws huv hab tej noog kws huv qee tug lug hlawv xyeem sau lub thaaj hov.

Thaus Yawmsaub nov tej paa tsw qaab kws hum nwg lub sab mas nwg has huv nwg lub sab tas, “Kuv yuav tsw tsawm foom nplajteb dua le lawm vem yog tim tuabneeg, txawm yog tuabneeg xaav zaaj phem rua huv lub sab ib txwm thaus yau lug kuj xwj. Hab kuv yuav tsw muab txhua yaam kws caj sa ua kuas puam tsuaj dua le lawm, ib yaam le kuv tau ua lug lawm.
Thaus lub nplajteb tseed muaj nyob, yuav muaj lub caij tseb lub caij sau, muaj lub caij txag lub caij suv, muaj lub caij ntuj no lub caij ntuj kub, muaj nruab nub muaj mo ntuj tsw tu ncua le.”
Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Nau‑a hab nwg cov tub hab has rua puab tas, “Ca le muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob puv nplajteb.

Txhua yaam tsaj huv nplajteb hab txhua yaam noog sau nruab ntug hab txhua yaam tsaj kws nkaag huv aav hab txhua yaam ntseg huv havtxwv yuav ntshai mej heev. Kuv muab tej tsaj hov huvsw cob rua huv mej txhais teg.
Txhua yaam caj sa kws nkaag hab yaa yuav ua mej zaub noj. Kuv pub txhua yaam rua mej noj ib yaam le kuv pub zaub ntsuab rua mej noj lawd.
Tassws tsw xob noj cov nqaj nrug cov ntshaav kws yog nwg txujsa.
Cov ntshaav kws yog mej txujsa kuv yuav rob. Kuv yuav rob ntawm txhua tug tsaj hab yuav rob ntawm tej tuabneeg. Kuv yuav rob tuabneeg txujsa ntawm nwg txhua tug kwvtij.
“Leejtwg tua tuabneeg lug ntshaav, tug hov yuav raug tuabneeg tua kuas lug ntshaav ib yaam nkaus, tsua qhov Vaajtswv tswm tuabneeg zoo le nwg tug yaam ntxwv.
Mej ca le muaj mivnyuas fuam vaam coob, ca le muaj tub ki coob coob huv lub nplajteb hab fuam vaam coob.”
Vaajtswv has rua Nau‑a hab nwg cov tub tas,
“Nuav 'ov, kuv cog lug ruaj rua mej hab mej caaj ceg kws tshwm lug rua yaav tom qaab
hab rua txhua yaam caj sa kws nrug koj nyob huv lub nkoj es tawm lug rua huv nplajteb, tsw has naag noog tsaj nyeg tsaj qus huvsw.
Kuv cog lug ruaj rua mej tas kuv yuav tsw tso dej lug nyaab ua kuas txhua yaam kws caj sa puam tsuaj taag dua le lawm, hab dej yuav tsw lug nyaab rhuav tshem lub nplajteb dua le lawm.”
Hab Vaajtswv has tas, “Nuav yog tug cim kws kuv cog lug rua mej hab kuv, hab txhua yaam caj sa kws nrug mej nyob, moog rua txhua tam.
Kuv tsaa kuv tug zaaj sawv rua sau cov fuab, mas tug zaaj hov yuav ua tug cim kws kuv cog lug rua lub nplajteb hab kuv.
Thaus kuv ua fuab sawv rua sau lub nplajteb hab muaj tug zaaj sawv huv cov fuab hov,
kuv yuav ncu txug tej lug cog tseg kws cog rua mej hab kuv hab txhua yaam kws caj sa, mas dej yuav tsw lug nyaab ua kuas txhua yaam kws caj sa puam tsuaj dua le lawm
Thaus tug zaaj sawv sau cov fuab, kuv yuav saib ntsoov tug zaaj hov hab ncu txug tej lug cog tseg kws nyob ib txhws rua Vaajtswv hab txhua yaam caj sa kws nyob huv lub nplajteb.”
Vaajtswv has rua Nau‑a tas, “Nuav lauj yog tug cim kws kuv cog lug ca rua kuv hab txhua yaam caj sa kws nyob huv lub nplajteb.”
Nau‑a cov tub kws tawm huv lub nkoj lug yog Xeeb hab Haa hab Yafe. Haa yog Khana‑aa le txwv.
Peb tug nuav yog Nau‑a le tub. Tuabneeg txhad tshwm ntawm peb leeg nuav moog puv lub nplajteb.
Nau‑a yog tuabneeg ua teb hab nwg yog thawj tug kws xub cog vaaj txwv maab.
Nwg haus cawv txwv maab qaug mas moog pw lab qaab huv nwg lub tsev ntaub.
Mas Haa kws yog Khana‑aa txwv pum nwg txwv lab qaab cuas txawm has rua ob tug kwvtij kws nyob saab nrau.

Tes Xeeb hab Yafe txhad muab ib daim taab choj khuam sau ob leeg xub pwg, thaub qaab moog npug leej txwv lub cev kws lab qaab cuas. Ob tug tsw tig ndag saib txhad tsw pum leej txwv lub cev kws lab qaab hov.
Thaus Nau‑a zoo cawv tswm lug hab paub tas tug tub ntxawg ua le caag rua nwg lawm,
nwg txawm has tas, “Khana‑aa raug foom tsw zoo, nwg yuav ua nwg cov kwvtij tug qhev kws qeg kawg.”
Nau‑a kuj has tas, “Thov Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua Xeeb. Hab ca Khana‑aa ua Xeeb le qhev lauj.
Thov Vaajtswv nthuav Yafe  lub tebchaws kuas daav hab ca nwg nyob huv Xeeb tej tsev ntaub. Hab ca Khana‑aa ua Yafe qhev.”
Txwj thaus dej nyaab nplajteb lug Nau‑a tseed nyob tau peb puas tswb caug xyoo.
Nau‑a le noob nyoog huvsw muaj cuaj pua tswb caug xyoo nwg le tuag.
Txwj ntawm nuav moog yog Nau‑a cov tub le caaj ceg, yog Xeeb hab Haa hab Yafe puab tej tub ki kws dej nyaab nplajteb taag le yug lug.
Yafe le tub  yog Kaumaw, Makau, Mantai, Yavaa, Thunpaa, Mese hab Thila.
Kaumaw le tub yog Akhena hab Lifa hab Thaukama.
Yavaa le tub yog Elisas, Thasi, Khithi hab Ntauntani.

(Cov tuabneeg nuav tej tub ki txhad moog nyob thoob plawg tej tebchaws ntawm ntug havtxwv, nyag nyob nyag ib lub nyuag tebchaws, nyag has nyag ib yaam lug, nyag nrug nyag cum nyob, hab nyag ua nyag ib haiv tuabneeg.)
Haa le tub yog Khuj, Iyi,  Phuj hab Khana‑aa.
Khuj le tub yog Xenpa, Havila, Xatha, La‑ama hab Xatheka. La‑ama le tub yog Senpa hab Ntentaa.
Khuj muaj ib tug tub hu ua Nilauj. Nilauj yog thawj tug kws muaj sab luj sab tuab huv nplajteb nuav.
Nilauj yog tug Kws txawj tua nqaj kawg le taab meeg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Vem le nuav txhad muaj paaj lug has tas, “Txawj tua nqaj zoo le Nilauj kws tua taab meeg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.”
Thawj lub tebchaws kws Nilauj kaav yog lub moos Npanpee hab lub moos Elej hab lub moos Akhab. Txhua lub moos nuav nyob huv Sina  tebchaws.
Nilauj tawm ntawm lub tebchaws hov moog rua Axilia tebchaws mas rhawv lub moos Ninave hab lub moos Lehaunpau‑i hab lub moos Khala
hab lub moos Lexee kws nyob ntawm lub moos Ninave hab lub moos Khala ntu nruab nraab. Lub moos Khala hov luj kawg le.
Iyi  cov tub yog cov tuabneeg nuav, yog cov Lunti, cov Anami, cov Lehanpi, cov Nathuhi,
cov Paluxi hab cov Khaluhi (cov tuabneeg Filixatee yog tshwm ntawm cov Khaluhi lug) hab cov Khathauli.
Khana‑aa cov tub yog cov nuav, Xaintoo yog tug tub hlub, cov yau yog Hej,
hab cov Yenpu, cov Amaulai, cov Kawkasi,
cov Hivai, cov Akhi, cov Xini,
cov Alava, cov Xema hab cov Hama. Yaav tom qaab nuav cov quas cum Khana‑aa nyag txawm ncaim moog nyob nyag lawm.

Cov Khana‑aa le tebchaws yog txwj nrho lub moos Xaintoo moog rua lub moos Kelas hab txug ncua lub moos Kaxa hab moog rua lub moos Xauntoo hab Kaumaula hab Ama hab Xenpau‑i hab txug ncua lub moos Lasa.
Cov nuav yog Haa le tub kws puab nyag nrug nyag cum nyob, nyag has nyag ib yaam lug, nyag nyob nyag ib lub nyuag tebchaws, hab nyag ua nyag ib haiv tuabneeg.
Xeeb kws yog Yafe tug tijlaug hlub hlo kuj muaj tub. Nwg yog cov Enpaw  suavdawg tug yawm koob.
Xeeb le tub yog Elaa, Asu, Apasa, Lus hab Alaa.
Alaa le tub yog Us, Hoo, Kethaw hab Mab.
Apasa muaj ib tug tub hu ua Sela. Sela muaj ib tug tub hu ua Enpaw.
Enpaw muaj ob tug tub, ib tug hu ua Pele  vem yog thaus Pele ua neej nyob hov tej tuabneeg txawm faib teb faib chaw. Pele tug kwv hu ua Yaujthaa.
Yaujthaa cov tub yog cov nuav, yog Amaunta, Seleb, Haxamave, Yela,
Hantaulaa, Uxaa, Ntila,
Aunpaa, Anpima‑ee, Senpa,
Aufi, Havila hab Yaunpam. Cov tuabneeg nuav puavleej yog Yaujthaa le tub ki xeeb ntxwv.
Lub tebchaws kws puab nyob ntawd nyob txwj ntawm lub moos Mesas moog rua lub moos Xefa kws nyob sau tej roob saab nub tuaj.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog Xeeb le caaj ceg kws puab nyag nrug nyag cum nyob, nyag has nyag ib yaam lug, nyag nyob nyag ib lub nyuag tebchaws, hab nyag ua nyag ib haiv tuabneeg.

Cov tuabneeg nuav yog Nau‑a cov tub le caaj ceg kws nyag nrug nyag cum nyob hab nyag ua nyag ib haiv tuabneeg. Txhua haiv tuabneeg puavleej tshwm ntawm puab lug moog nyob puv nplajteb ua qaab kws dej nyaab nplajteb lawd.
Taag nrho tej tuabneeg huv nplajteb puavleej paub tuab yaam lug hab swv tej lug ib yaam nkaus.
Thaus puab tswv moog rua saab nub tuaj  mas moog txug ib lub taj ntawm Sina  tebchaws tes txawm ua vaaj ua tsev nyob hov ntawd.
Puab nyag taug nyag has tas, “Peb ca le tuaj ua ke ua thwv cib muab hlawv kuas tawv.” Puab txawm muaj thwv cib swv ib yaam le pob zeb, hab muaj roj aav nplaum swv ib yaam le moov swb.

Puab has tas, “Ca le tuaj, peb rhawv ib lub nroog hab ua ib tug pem thuam kuas lub hauv sab moog nto ntuj, hab ca peb ua kuas peb tau koob meej. Yog peb tsw ua le ntawd peb yuav tswv rw quas sua moog thoob nplajteb.”
Yawmsaub nqeg lug saib lub nroog ntawd hab tug pem thuam kws tuabneeg ua hov.

Mas Yawmsaub has tas, “Saib maj, cov tuabneeg nuav yog tuab haiv tuabneeg hab puab suavdawg has tuab yaam lug. Nuav yog qhov kws puab nyav chiv ua xwb, mas nwgnuav yog puab xaav ua ib yaam daabtsw los puab yeej ua kuas tau xwb.
Ca peb nqeg moog ua kuas puab tej lug ntxhuv tsw sws thooj sub ib leeg has ib leeg txhad tsw nkaag sab.”
Yawmsaub txhad ua rua puab tawg rw quas sua hov ntawd moog thoob nplajteb, puab txhad tso tseg tsw ua lub nroog ntawd lawm.
Vem le nuav txhad hu lub nroog ntawd ua Npanpee,  vem qhov chaw ntawd Yawmsaub ua rua puab tej lug ntxhuv thoob nplajteb. Hab Yawmsaub ua rua puab tawg rw quas sua qhov ntawd moog thoob nplajteb.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Xeeb caaj ceg. Dhau dej nyaab ob xyoos, thaus Xeeb noob nyoog muaj ib puas xyoo mas nwg muaj tug tub Apasa.
Thaus Xeeb muaj tug tub Apasa lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau tswb puas xyoo hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Apasa noob nyoog muaj peb caug tswb xyoos le muaj tug tub Sela.
Thaus Apasa muaj tug tub Sela lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau plaub puas peb xyoos hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Sela noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo le muaj tug tub Enpaw.
Thaus Sela muaj tug tub Enpaw lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau plaub puas peb xyoos hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Enpaw noob nyoog muaj peb caug plaub xyoos le muaj tug tub Pele.
Thaus Enpaw muaj tug tub Pele lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau plaub puas peb caug xyoo hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Pele noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo le muaj tug tub Le‑u.
Thaus Pele muaj tug tub Le‑u lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau ob puas cuaj xyoos hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Le‑u noob nyoog muaj peb caug ob xyoos le muaj tug tub Xelu.
Thaus Le‑u muaj tug tub Xelu lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau ob puas xyaa xyoo hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Xelu noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo le muaj tug tub Nahau.
Thaus Xelu muaj tug tub Nahau lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau ob puas xyoo hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Nahau noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum cuaj xyoos le muaj tug tub Thela.
Thaus Nahau muaj tug tub Thela lawm, nwg tseed nyob tau ib puas kaum cuaj xyoos hab muaj tub muaj ntxhais ntxwv.
Thela noob nyoog muaj xyaa caum xyoo le muaj tug tub Aplaa hab Nahau hab Halaa.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Thela caaj ceg. Thela muaj peb tug tub yog Aplaa, Nahau hab Halaa. Halaa tug tub yog Lauj.
Halaa tuag ua nwg txwv Thela ntej rua huv lub tebchaws kws yug nwg, yog huv cov Kheentia lub moos Aw.
Aplaa hab Nahau kuj tau quaspuj. Aplaa quaspuj hu ua Xalai, Nahau quaspuj hu ua Meekha. Meekha yog Halaa le ntxhais. Halaa yog Meekha hab Ixakha txwv.
Xalai tsw xeeb tub mas tsw muaj mivnyuas.

Thela coj nwg tug tub Aplaa hab nwg tug xeeb ntxwv Lauj kws yog Halaa tug tub hab Xalai kws yog nwg tug nyaab, kws yog nwg tug tub Aplaa quaspuj, mas puab tawm huv cov Kheentia lub moos Aw yuav tswv moog rua Khana‑aa tebchaws. Tassws thaus puab lug txug ntawm lub moos Halaa puab txawm nyob hov ntawd.
Thela noob nyoog muaj ob puas tswb xyoos, Thela txawm tuag rua huv lub moos Halaa lawm.
Yawmsaub has rua Aplaa tas, “Koj ca le tawm huv koj lub tebchaws hab tawm huv koj cov kwvtij hab koj txwv lub tsev moog rua lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav qha rua koj.
Kuv yuav tsaa koj ua ib haiv tuabneeg luj hab kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj hab ua rua koj lub npe nrov nchaa quas lug moog, mas koj yuav ua rua lwm tug tau koob moov.
Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua cov kws foom koob moov rua koj. Kuv yuav tsawm foom cov kws foom koj tsw zoo. Ib tsoom tuabneeg huv lub nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm koj lug.”
Mas Aplaa kuj moog lawv le Yawmsaub tau has rua nwg. Lauj kuj nrug nwg moog hab. Thaus Aplaa tawm huv lub moos Halaa moog nwg noob nyoog muaj xyaa caum tswb xyoos.

Aplaa coj nwg tug quaspuj Xalai hab Lauj kws yog nwg tug kwv le tub, hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws puab khwv tau hab tej tub qhe kws puab tau huv lub moos Halaa, mas puab tswv moog rua Khana‑aa tebchaws. Thaus moog txug Khana‑aa tebchaws lawm,
Aplaa txawm moog zuj zug txug lub chaw tseem ceeb ntawm lub moos Sekhee, yog moog txug tug ntoo xeeb ntawm Maule. Lub swjhawm hov cov Khana‑aa nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Mas Yawmsaub lug tshwm rua Aplaa pum hab has tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav kuv yuav pub rua koj caaj ceg.” Aplaa txawm ua ib lub thaaj hov ntawd rua Yawmsaub kws lug tshwm rua nwg pum.

Nwg tshais chaw qhov ntawd moog rua lub roob kws nyob lub moos Npe‑ee saab nub tuaj tes txawm tsaa tsev ntaub tsuam hov ntawd, lub moos Npe‑ee nyob saab nub poob, lub moos Ai nyob saab nub tuaj. Nwg txawm ua ib lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub hov ntawd hab tuav Yawmsaub lub npe thov Yawmsaub.
Aplaa kuj tshais chaw moog zuj zug ib ntus ib ntus moog rua nraag Neke.
Muaj kev tshaib nqhes huv lub tebchaws. Aplaa txawm tswv moog nyob ib ntus nraag Iyi tebchaws, vem yog huv Khana‑aa tebchaws muaj kev tshaib nqhes heev.
Thaus moog yuav txug Iyi tebchaws, Aplaa has rua nwg tug quaspuj Xalai tas, “Kuv paub tas koj yog ib tug quaspuj zoo nkauj.
Thaus cov tuabneeg Iyi pum koj, puab yuav has tas, ‘Tug puj nuav yog yawm hov le quaspuj,’ tes yuav muab kuv tua pov tseg yuav tseg koj nyob.
Koj ca le has tas koj yog kuv le muam sub puab txhad ua zoo rua kuv vem yog muaj koj hab puab txhad tseg kuv txujsa vem yog saib rua koj.”
Thaus Aplaa nkaag moog txug huv Iyi tebchaws lawm, cov Iyi pum tas tug quaspuj zoo nkauj heev.
Thaus Falau cov tub teg tub taw pum nwg lawm, puab txawm qhuas nwg rua Falau. Puab txawm coj Xalai moog rua huv Falau lub tsev.
Mas Falau ua zoo rua Aplaa heev vem yog saib rua Xalai. Aplaa txhad tau yaaj tau nyuj tau txwv neeg luav, hab tau tub qhe nkauj qhev hab tej maum neeg luav hab tej ntxhuav.
Tassws Yawmsaub ua mob phem luj lug raug Falau hab nwg tsev tuabneeg vem yog tim Xalai kws yog Aplaa tug quaspuj.
Falau txhad hu Aplaa tuaj hab has tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav rua kuv? Ua caag koj tsw has tas tug puj nuav yog koj le quaspuj?
Ua caag koj has tas nwg yog koj le muam, kuv txhad coj nwg lug ua kuv tug quaspuj? Koj tug quaspuj nyob nuav nawj, ca le coj nwg moog hab tswv tawm moog.”
Falau has txug Aplaa rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw mas puab txhad xaa Aplaa hab nwg tug quaspuj hab tej hov txhua chaw kws nwg muaj huvsw rov moog.
Aplaa hab nwg tug quaspuj txawm tawm huv Iyi tebchaws coj txhua yaam kws nwg muaj moog txug Neke. Lauj kuj nrug nwg moog hab.
Aplaa muaj tsaj txhu hab nyaj hab kub nplua quas mag.
Nwg tswv ntawm Neke ib ntus zuj zug moog txug lub moos Npe‑ee, yog lub chaw kws yaav dhau lug nwg tau tsaa tsev ntaub rua ntu nruab nraab lub moos Npe‑ee hab lub moos Ai,
hab yog lub chaw kws yaav tom ntej nwg tau ua lub thaaj ca. Hab Aplaa tuav Yawmsaub lub npe thov hov ntawd.
Lauj kws nrug Aplaa ua ke kuj muaj yaaj muaj tshws hab muaj nyuj tsheej paab hab muaj tej tsev ntaub.
Lub tebchaws yug tsw tau ob tug nyob ua ke vem ob tug muaj tsaj txhu coob hov txhua chaw ntau kawg le mas tebchaws tsw txaus ob tug nyob ua ke.
Aplaa cov tub qhe yug tsaj hab Lauj cov tub qhe yug tsaj kuj sws caav sws tshe. Lub swjhawm ntawd cov Khana‑aa hab cov Pelixai tseed nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Aplaa txhad has rua Lauj tas, “Tsw xob ca ib sws caav sws tshe hab tsw xob ca koj cov tub qhe yug tsaj hab kuv cov tub qhe yug tsaj sws caav sws tshe, tsua qhov ib yog tej txwv tub.
Lub tebchaws huvsw nyob ntawm koj xubndag nuav. Koj ca le ncaim ntawm kuv moog. Yog koj moog rua saab phem kuv yuav moog rua saab xws, lossws yog koj moog rua saab xws kuv yuav moog rua saab phem.”

Lauj tsaa muag saib mas pum tas lub taj ntawm ntug dej Yalatee moog txug lub moos Xau‑a muaj dej zoo txhua qhov ib yaam le Yawmsaub lub vaaj hab ib yaam le Iyi tebchaws. Nuav yog ua ntej kws Yawmsaub tsw tau ua kuas lub moos Xauntoo hab lub moos Kaumaula puam tsuaj.
Lauj txhad xaiv lub taj ntawm ntug dej Yalatee rua nwg, hab Lauj txawm moog rua saab nub tuaj, ob tug txhad sws ncaim.
Aplaa nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws huas Lauj moog nyob huv tej moos nraag taj, hab nwg tshais tsev ntaub moog nyob ze lub moos Xauntoo.
Cov tuabneeg huv lub moos Xauntoo ua phem ua txhum luj rua Yawmsaub.
Thaus Lauj ncaim Aplaa lawm, Yawmsaub has rua Aplaa tas, “Koj tsaa muag saib ntawm lub chaw kws koj nyob nuav moog rua saab peg saab nraag saab nub tuaj saab nub poob.
Taag nrho lub tebchaws kws koj pum nuav kuv yuav muab pub rua koj hab koj caaj ceg moog ib txhws.
Kuv yuav ua kuas koj caaj ceg coob yaam le tej moov aav, leejtwg suav txheeb tej moov aav txhad le suav txheeb koj caaj ceg.
Koj ca le sawv tseeg moog ncig kuas thoob plawg lub tebchaws nuav rua saab ntev hab saab daav huvsw, tsua qhov kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav rua koj.”
Aplaa txhad tshais tsev ntaub lug nyob ze cov ntoo xeeb ntawm Maale kws nyob ntawm Heploo, hab nwg ua ib lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub hov ntawd.
Thaus ntawd vaajntxwv Alafee kws kaav Sina, hab vaajntxwv Ali‑au kws kaav lub moos Eelaxa hab vaajntxwv Khentaula‑aumaw kws kaav lub moos Elaa, hab vaajntxwv Thintaa kws kaav lub moos Kauyi,

cov vaajntxwv nuav ua rog rua vaajntxwv Npela kws kaav lub moos Xauntoo hab vaajntxwv Npisa kws kaav lub moos Kaumaula hab vaajntxwv Sinaj kws kaav lub moos Ama hab vaajntxwv Semenpaw kws kaav lub moos Xenpau‑i hab tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub moos Npelas, kws yog lub moos Xau‑a.
Cov vaajntxwv nuav sau zog ua ke rua ntawm lub taj Xinti (kws yog Havtxwv Ntsev. )
Cov vaajntxwv nuav tau zwm rua vaajntxwv Khentaula‑aumaw tau kaum ob xyoo, tassws xyoo kaum peb puab tau faav xeeb.

Mas xyoo kws kaum plaub Khentaula‑aumaw hab cov vaajntxwv kws koom nwg ntawd tuaj ua rog yeej cov tuabneeg Lefa‑i ntawm lub moos Athalau Khana‑i, hab cov tuabneeg Xuxis ntawm lub moos Haa, hab cov Emi ntawm lub moos Savekhiliyatha‑i,
hab cov tuabneeg Hauli peg tej roob Xe‑i moog txug lub moos Eepalaa kws nyob npuas tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Mas puab tig rov lug txug lub moos Eemixafa kws yog lub moos Khante, puab kov yeej cov Amalej lub tebchaws hab kov yeej cov Amaulai kws nyob huv lub moos Haxaxoothama.
Mas Xauntoo tug vaajntxwv hab Kaumaula tug vaajntxwv hab Ama tug vaajntxwv hab Xenpau‑i tug vaajntxwv hab Npela kws yog Xau‑a tug vaajntxwv kuj tawm moog rua ntawm lub taj Xinti

ua rog rua vaajntxwv Khentaula‑aumaw kws kaav lub moos Elaa hab vaajntxwv Thintaa kws kaav lub moos Kauyi hab vaajntxwv Alafee kws kaav Sina, hab vaajntxwv Ali‑au kws kaav lub moos Eelaxa, plaub tug vaajntxwv ua rog rua tswb tug vaajntxwv.

Lub taj Xinti muaj qhov roj aav nplaum thoob plawg, mas thaus Xauntoo tug vaajntxwv hab Kaumaula tug vaajntxwv tswv lug, muaj qee leej txawm poob rua huv cov qhov roj ntawd, cov kws tshuav tswv taag rua peg tej roob.
Cov yeeb ncuab txhad tuaj muab puab tej hov txhua chaw mov noj huv Xauntoo hab Kaumaula huvsw sau zog moog lawm.
Puab kuj kuav hlo Lauj kws yog Aplaa tug kwv le tub kws nyob huv lub moos Xauntoo hab nwg tej hov txhua chwm huvsw moog lawm hab.

Mas muaj ib tug dha dim huv tshaav rog tuaj has rua Aplaa kws yog tuabneeg Henplais paub. Aplaa nyob ze Maale cov ntoo xeeb. Maale yog tuabneeg Amaulai, nwg kwvtij yog Ekhau hab Anaw, puab cov nuav nrug Aplaa sws raug zoo.

Thaus Aplaa nov tas nwg tug kwvtij txheeb raug nteg coj moog lawm, tes nwg txawm coj nwg cov tuabneeg kws yug huv nwg tsev kws nwg qha kuas txawj ua rog peb puas kaum yim leej lawv moog cuag ntawm lub moos Ntaaj.

Thaus tsaus ntuj Aplaa txhad faib nwg cov tub rog ua tej paab tej pawg, nwg hab nwg cov tub qhe txhad txeem moog ntaus yeeb ncuab hab muab lawv moog txug lub moos Haunpa kws nyob ntawm lub nroog Ntamaxaka saab peg.
Mas nwg muab tau tej hov txhua chaw huvsw rov lug hab coj tau Lauj kws yog nwg tug kwv le tub hab nwg tej hov txhua chaw hab tej quaspuj hab nwg cov tuabneeg huvsw rov lug.

Thaus Aplaa moog tua yeej Khentaula‑aumaw hab cov vaajntxwv kws koom nrug Khentaula‑aumaw rov qaab lug, mas tug vaajntxwv huv lub moos Xauntoo tawm tuaj tog Aplaa ntawm lub haav Save (kws yog lub Haav Vaajntxwv).
Hab Mekhixente kws yog vaajntxwv huv lub moos Xalee coj ncuav hab cawv txwv maab tuaj tog. Mekhixente yog Vaajtswv kws luj dua ndais tug pov thawj,
mas nwg foom koob moov rua Aplaa has tas, “Thov Vaajtswv kws luj dua ndais kws tswm lub ntuj hab lub nplajteb pub koob moov rua Aplaa lauj.
Qhuas Vaajtswv tug luj dua ndais, kws muab koj cov yeeb ncuab rua huv koj txhais teg.” Aplaa txawm muab txhua yaam kws nwg coj lug hov ib feem huv kaum pub rua Mekhixente.
Xauntoo tug vaajntxwv has rua Aplaa tas, “Thov muab cov tuabneeg rua kuv xwb, tej hov txhua chaw koj ca le coj moog yuav.”
Aplaa has rua Xauntoo tug vaajntxwv tas, “Kuv tub tsaa teg twv rua Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tug luj dua ndais kws tswm ntuj tswm teb tas,
kuv tsw yuav ib txuj xuv lossws ib txuj hlua khau lossws ib yaam daabtsw kws yog koj le, sub koj txhad has tsw tau tas, Kuv txhawb Aplaa nplua nuj.

Kuv tsw yuav ib yaam daabtsw le, tsuas yog yuav tej zaub mov kws kuv cov tuabneeg tau noj lawm hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug kuv moog le feem xwb, yog Anaw, Ekhau hab Maale le feem. Ca puab coj puab le feem moog.”
Dhau ntawd Aplaa ua yug quas toog pum Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, “Aplaa, koj tsw xob ntshai, kuv yog daim hlau kws thaiv koj, kuv yuav pub tshaav ntuj ntau kawg rua koj.”
Aplaa nug tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub, koj yuav pub daabtsw rua kuv? Vem tas kuv tseed tsw tau muaj mivnyuas le, mas Eliyexaw kws yog tuabneeg Ntamaxaka yuav ua tug kws saws kuv qub txeeg qub teg.”
Hab Aplaa has tas, “Koj tsw tau pub mivnyuas rua kuv, mas ib tug tub qhe kws yug huv kuv tsev yuav ua tug saws kuv qub txeeg qub teg.”
Mas Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua Aplaa tas, “Tug kod tsw yog tug kws saws koj qub txeeg qub teg. Koj tug tub kws koj yug yuav ua tug kws saws ntaag.”

Yawmsaub txawm coj Aplaa tawm rua saab nrau mas has tas, “Ca le saib sau ntuj, yog koj suav txheeb tej nub qub ca le suav moog.” Mas Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, “Koj caaj ceg yuav coob ib yaam nkaus le ntawd.”
Aplaa kuj ntseeg Yawmsaub. Yawmsaub suav tas qhov kws Aplaa ntseeg ntawd yog txujkev ncaaj nceeg rua Aplaa.
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Aplaa tas, “Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws coj koj tawm huv cov Kheentia lub moos Aw, txhad le pub tau lub tebchaws nuav rua koj ua koj tug.”
Aplaa has rua nwg tas, “Au Vaajtswv Yawmsaub kuv yuav ua le caag paub tas kuv yuav tau lub tebchaws nuav ua kuv tug?”

Yawmsaub has rua Aplaa tas, “Ca le coj ib tug maum nyuj muaj peb xyoos, hab ib tug maum tshws muaj peb xyoos hab ib tug txwv yaaj muaj peb xyoos, hab ib tug nquab taug hab ib tug rhaws nquab nyeg tuaj rua kuv.”
Aplaa txhad coj tej tsaj nuav tuaj, hab muab cov tsaj phua ua ob saab tso ua ob leej sws ncaag, tassws cov noog ntawd mas tsw phua.
Thaus tej laj daav yaa lug rua ntawm cov nqaj hov, Aplaa muab lawv tswv moog.
Thaus nub yuav poob qho, daab ndub txawm laum Aplaa tsaug zug heev, txujkev ntshai hab kev tsaus ntuj dub ncab lug tsuam nwg.

Mas Yawmsaub has rua Aplaa tas, “Koj ca le paub tseeb tas koj caaj ceg yuav poob tebchaws moog nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws tsw yog puab teb puab chaw, hab puab yuav ua luas qhev hab raug tswm txom plaub puas xyoo rua hov ntawd.
Tassws kuv yuav rau txem rua lub tebchaws kws puab ua qhev ntawd, mas dhau ntawd puab yuav tawm lug muaj nyaj txag hov txhua chaw ntau.
Tassws koj mas koj yuav moog nrug koj tej laug nyob sab tug quas yeeg, koj yuav laug heev le tuag hab muab log.
Mas tam kws plaub koj caaj ceg yuav rov lug rua ntawm nuav, vem yog cov Amaulai tej kev phem kev qas tsw tau txaus.”
Thaus nub poob qho hab tsaus ntuj dub lawm, txawm muaj ib cub suavtawg paa nchu auv quas nab hab ib teg tsau cig laam lug moog huv plawv ob leej nqaj ntawd.
Nub ntawd Yawmsaub cog lug rua Aplaa tas, “Kuv muab lub tebchaws nuav rua koj caaj ceg, txwj ntawm tug dej Iyi moog txug tug dej luj kws yog tug dej Yufeti,
kws yog cov Khenai, cov Khena, cov Khamaunai,
cov Hithai, cov Pelixai, cov Lefa‑i,
cov Amaulai, cov Khana‑aa, cov Kawkasi hab cov Yenpu le tebchaws.”
Xalai kws yog Aplaa tug quaspuj tsw muaj mivnyuas rua Aplaa. Xalai muaj ib tug nkauj qhev kws yog tuabneeg Iyi hu ua Haka.
Xalai txhad has rua Aplaa tas, “Saib maj, Yawmsaub tsw pub kuv muaj mivnyuas. Koj ca le moog nrug kuv tug nkauj qhev pw, tej zag nwg yuav yug tau mivnyuas rua kuv.” Aplaa kuj noog Xalai lug.
Thaus Aplaa nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws tau kaum xyoo lawm, Aplaa tug quaspuj Xalai txawm muab nwg tug nkauj qhev Haka kws yog tuabneeg Iyi rua nwg tug quasyawg Aplaa yuav ua quaspuj.
Aplaa nrug Haka pw, nwg txawm xeeb tub. Thaus nwg paub tas nwg xeeb tub lawm nwg txawm saib tsw taug Xalai.

Xalai txawm has rua Aplaa tas, “Ca koj rws qhov kws kuv raug saib tsw taug nuav. Kuv muab kuv tug nkauj qhev rua huv koj lub xubndag, tassws thaus nwg paub tas nwg xeeb tub lawm nwg txawm saib tsw taug kuv. Thov Yawmsaub txav txem saib yog tim kuv los tim koj.”
Aplaa txhad has rua Xalai tas, “Koj tug nkauj qhev nyob huv koj kev tswjfwm. Ca le ua rua nwg lawv le koj pum zoo.” Xalai txhad tswm txom Haka, Haka txhad tswv lawm.
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj ntswb Haka huv tebchaws moj saab qhua ntawm lub qhov dej kws nyob ntawm txujkev moog rua lub moos Su.
Nwg txhad nug Haka tas, “Haka, Xalai tug nkauj qhev, koj tuaj hovtwg tuaj hab koj yuav moog hovtwg?” Haka teb tas, “Kuv tswv kuv tug puj lospaav Xalai.”
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj has rua nwg tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog cuag koj tug puj lospaav hab ua lawv le nwg tswjfwm.”
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai kuj has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yuav pub koj caaj ceg fuam vaam coob coob suav tsw txheeb.”

Yawmsaub tug tubkhai has rua Haka tas, “Koj tub xeeb mivnyuas lawm, koj yuav yug tau ib tug tub, hab koj yuav hu tug tub hov lub npe tas Yisama‑ee tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub nov txug koj txujkev txom nyem lawm.
Nwg yuav zoo ib yaam le tug neeg luav qus, nwg txhais teg yuav tawm tsaam suavdawg, hab ib tsoom suavdawg txhais teg yuav tawm tsaam nwg. Nwg yuav nyob ua yeeb ncuab rua nwg cov kwvtij suavdawg.”
Haka txhad tis npe rua Yawmsaub kws has lug rua nwg tas, “Koj yog tug Vaajtswv kws pum,” tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Kuv tub pum Vaajtswv tag tag le mas tseed muaj txujsa nyob hab lov?”
Vem le nuav txhad hu lub qhov dej hov tas Npe‑aw Lahailai,  nyob ntawm lub moos Khante hab lub moos Npele ntu nruab nraab.
Haka yug ib tug tub rua Aplaa. Mas Aplaa tis nwg tug tub kws Haka yug hu ua Yisama‑ee.
Thaus Haka yug Yisama‑ee rua Aplaa hov, Aplaa noob nyoog muaj yim caum rau xyoo.
Thaus Aplaa noob nyoog muaj cuaj caug cuaj xyoos, Yawmsaub lug tshwm rua Aplaa hab has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.  Ca le nrug nraim kuv hab xyum zoo kawg nkaus.
Kuv yuav nrug koj sws cog lug, hab kuv yuav ua rua koj caaj ceg fuam vaam coob kawg nkaus.”
Aplaa txawm khwb nkaus rua huv aav, mas Vaajtswv has rua nwg tas,
“Nuav yog kuv tej lug kws kuv cog rua koj, koj yuav ua ntau haiv tuabneeg leej txwv.
Koj lub npe yuav tsw hu ua Aplaa le lawm, yuav hu ua Aplahaa,  vem kuv ua rua koj ua ntau haiv tuabneeg leej txwv.
Kuv yuav ua rua koj muaj tub ki xeeb ntxwv coob, hab kuv yuav ua rua koj ua ntau haiv tuabneeg hab yuav muaj tej vaajntxwv tshwm huv koj lug.

Kuv yuav cog lug tseg ruaj rua kuv hab koj hab rua koj caaj ceg kws tshwm lug txhua tam tom qaab, ua lu lug cog tseg kws nyob moog ib txhws, has tas kuv yuav ua koj tug Vaajtswv hab ua koj caaj ceg kws tshwm lug tom qaab tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws Khana‑aa kws koj ua qhua nyob nuav huvsw pub rua koj hab pub rua koj caaj ceg kws tshwm lug tom qaab ua puab tug moog ib txhws le. Hab kuv yuav ua puab tug Vaajtswv.”
Vaajtswv has rua Aplahaa tas, “Has txug koj, mas koj hab koj caaj ceg kws tshwm lug txhua tam tom qaab yuav tsum ua lawv le kuv tej lug cog tseg.
Nuav yog kuv tej lug cog tseg rua kuv hab koj hab koj caaj ceg kws tshwm lug tom qaab mas mej yuav tsum ua lawv le. Txhua tug txwvneej huv mej yuav tsum ua kevcai txav.
Mej yuav tsum ua kevcai txav daim tawv chaw xws, ua lub hom thawj rua tej lug cog tseg rua kuv hab mej.

Mej cov tub kws noob nyoog muaj yim nub, yuav tsum muab ua kevcai txav. Mej yuav ua le nuav rua cov txwvneej txhua tug huv mej haiv tuabneeg txhua tam moog le, tsw has cov kws yug huv mej tsev hab cov kws mej muab nyaj yuav lwm haiv tuabneeg lug kws tsw yog mej le mivnyuas.
Cov kws yug huv mej tsev hab cov kws muab nyaj yuav lug yuav tsum ua kevcai txav. Ua le nuav mas kuv tej lug cog tseg txhad nyob huv mej tej nqaj ua lu lug cog tseg moog ib txhws.
Tug txwvneej twg kws tsw tau ua kevcai txav daim tawv chaw xws mas yuav raug muab rhu tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg, vem yog nwg tau rhuav kuv tej lug cog tseg.”
Hab Vaajtswv has rua Aplahaa tas, “Koj tug quaspuj Xalai, koj tsw xob hu nwg ua Xalai, yuav hu ua Xala.

Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg hab tsw taag le ntawd xwb kuv yuav pub nwg yug ib tug tub rua koj. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg, nwg yuav ua tej haiv tuabneeg leej nam hab tej vaajntxwv yuav tshwm huv nwg lug.”
Aplahaa txawm khwb nkaus rua huv aav luag hab has tuabywv huv lub sab tas, “Tug txwvneej ib puas xyoo tseed muaj taug mivnyuas hab lov? Xala muaj cuaj caug xyoo lawm tseed yug tau mivnyuas hab lov?”
Hab Aplahaa has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Au thov ca Yisama‑ee yog tug kws koj pum zoo.”

Vaajtswv has tas, “Tsw yog le ntawd, koj tug quaspuj Xala yuav yug ib tug tub rua koj hab koj yuav tis npe hu ua Yiha. Kuv yuav cog lug tseg rua nwg ua lu lug cog tseg moog ib txhws rua nwg caaj ceg kws tshwm lug tom qaab.

Has txug Yisama‑ee, mas kuv tub nov koj has lawm. Kuv yuav foom koob moov rua nwg hab ua rua nwg muaj tub ki hab fuam vaam coob coob. Nwg yuav ua kaum ob tug thawj leej txwv hab kuv yuav ua rua nwg ua ib haiv tuabneeg luj.
Kuv yuav muab kuv tej lug cog tseg rua Yiha kws lwm xyoo lub caij nuav Xala yuav yug rua koj.”
Thaus Vaajtswv has rua Aplahaa taag lawm Vaajtswv txawm rov qaab ntawm nwg moog lawm.

Aplahaa txhad muab nwg tug tub Yisama‑ee hab txhua tug tub qhe kws yug huv nwg tsev hab tej kws muab nyaj yuav lug, yog txhua tug txwvneej huv nwg tsev, ua kevcai txav daim tawv chaw xws rua nub ntawd lawv le Vaajtswv has rua nwg.
Aplahaa noob nyoog muaj cuaj caug cuaj xyoos rua thaus kws nwg ua kevcai txav daim tawv chaw xws.
Nwg tug tub Yisama‑ee noob nyoog muaj kaum peb xyoos rua thaus nwg ua kevcai txav daim tawv chaw xws.
Aplahaa hab nwg tug tub Yisama‑ee ua kevcai txav rua nub ntawd ntaag.
Txhua tug txwvneej huv nwg lub tsev, tsw has cov kws yug huv tsev hab cov kws muab nyaj yuav lwm haiv tuabneeg lug kuj nrug nwg ib txhwj ua kevcai txav.
Yawmsaub lug tshwm rua Aplahaa ntawm cov ntoo xeeb huv Maale, rua thaus Aplahaa tseed nyob tsawg ntawm qhov rooj tsev ntaub thaus tshaav ntuj kub heev.
Nwg tsaa muag saib pum peb tug quasyawg sawv tom nwg hauv ntej. Thaus nwg pum dheev puab nwg dha loo ntawm qhov rooj moog tog puab hab pe rua huv aav,
hab has tas, “Kuv tug tswv, yog koj txaus sab rua kuv, koj tsw xob hlaa hlo ntawm koj tug qhev moog.
Ca kuv coj mivntswv dej tuaj rua mej ntxuav kwtaw, hab su huv qaab tug ntoo nuav.
Vem mej tub tuaj txug mej tug qhev lawm, kuv yuav nqaa mivntswv zaub mov rua mej noj sub mej txhad tau su lug sav le maav moog.” Puab teb has tas, “Moog ua lawv le koj has.”
Aplahaa maaj nroog nkaag moog rua huv tsev ntaub has rua Xala tas, “Kawgkag moog muab peb xe‑a  moov zoo zoo lug zuaj ua ncuav.”
Hab Aplahaa dha loo moog rua huv paab tsaj, muab hlo ib tug thaav nyuj mog zoo zoo cob rua tug tub qhe maaj nroog ua zaub.
Aplahaa muab tej kua mig nyeem hab nyuj mig hab tej nqaj nyuj kws ua sav lawm lug rau rua ntawm puab xubndag. Thaus puab noj nwg sawv ntsug ntawm puab ib saab huv qaab tsob ntoo.
Puab nug nwg tas, “Koj tug quaspuj Xala nyob hovtwg?” Nwg teb tas, “Nyob huv tsev ntaub.”
Yawmsaub  has tas, “Lwm xyoo kuv yuav rov tuaj saib koj tag tag le, mas koj tug quaspuj Xala yuav muaj ib tug tub.” Xala nyob ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub ncaaj ntawm tug hov nraus qaum noog hab.
Aplahaa hab Xala noob nyoog nchaav hab laug heev lawm, Xala tub tseg tsw ua quaspuj lawm.
Xala txhad luag tuabywv huv lub sab hab has tas, “Kuv laug lawm, kuv tug quasyawg kuj laug heev lawm, kuv tseed yuav zoo sab hab lov?”
Yawmsaub has rua Aplahaa tas, “Ua caag Xala luag hab has tas, ‘Kuv tub laug lawm, tseed yuav yug tau mivnyuas tag tag le lov?’
Muaj ib yaam daabtsw kws Yawmsaub ua tsw tau lov? Txug swjhawm kws teem ca lawm kuv yuav rov tuaj cuag koj lwm xyoo, mas Xala yuav tau ib tug tub.”
Tassws Xala tsw leeg, nwg has tas, “Kuv tsw luag,” vem nwg ntshai. Yawmsaub has tas, “Tsw xob daag, koj tub luag tag tag le.”
Peb tug txwvneej hov txawm tawm hov ntawd moog, puab moog saib lub moos Xauntoo. Aplahaa nrug puab moog xaa puab.
Yawmsaub has tas, “Kuv yuav npog tej kws kuv yuav ua tsw qha rua Aplahaa paub lov?
Tsua qhov Aplahaa yuav ua ib haiv tuabneeg kws luj hab muaj zug heev, hab ib tsoom tebchaws huv nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm nwg lug.

Kuv tub xaiv nwg lawm sub nwg txhad qhuab qha nwg tej tub ki hab nwg caaj ceg kws tshwm lug tom qaab kuas ua lawv le Yawmsaub txujkev kws yog ua raug cai hab ua ncaaj nceeg sub Yawmsaub txhad le pub tej kws nwg cog lug ca lawm rua Aplahaa.”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Lub suab kws kom lub moos Xauntoo hab lub moos Kaumaula nrov heev hab puab lub txem kuj luj heev,
mas kuv yuav nqeg moog saib puab puas tau ua txhua yaam txhum lawv le lub suab kws kom tuaj txug kuv hov. Yog tsw muaj kuv txhad paub.”
Cov txwvneej hov txawm tawm hov ntawd ncaaj nraim moog rua lub moos Xauntoo, tassws Aplahaa tseed sawv ntsug ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag.
Aplahaa txawm txaav lug ze Yawmsaub hab has tas, “Koj yuav ua rua cov kws ncaaj nceeg nrug cov tuabneeg phem puam tsuaj ua ke tag le lov?

Pev tas yog muaj tswb caug leej ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub moos hov, koj yuav ua rua lub moos hov puam tsuaj hlo lov? Koj yuav tsw tseg lub moos hov nyob vem yog saib rua tswb caug leej ncaaj nceeg kws nyob huv le lov?

Thov tsw xob ua le ntawd hlo le lauj! Tsw xob tua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg nrug cov tuabneeg phem ua ke, tsw xob ua rua cov ncaaj nceeg ib yaam le ua rua cov tuabneeg phem. Tsw xob ua le ntawd lauj! Tug kws txav txem taag nrho huv lub nplajteb yuav tsw ua ncaaj lov?”
Yawmsaub has tas, “Yog kuv pum muaj tswb caug leej ncaaj nceeg nyob huv lub moos Xauntoo, kuv yuav tseg lub moos hov huvsw nyob vem yog saib rua tswb caug leej hov.”
Aplahaa teb tas, “Txawm yog kuv tsuas yog moov aav hab moov tshauv xwb, los kuv tseed muaj ntsej muag nrug tug tswv txuas lug.

Pev tas yog tswb caug leej ntawd poob tswb leeg lawm, koj tseed yuav ua rua lub moos huvsw puam tsuaj vem yog tu ncua tswb leeg hov lov?” Yawmsaub has tas, “Yog kuv ntswb plaub caug tswb leeg kws ncaaj nceeg nyob huv, kuv yuav tsw ua kuas puam tsuaj.”
Nwg rov has dua rua Yawmsaub tas, “Yog tas ntswb plaub caug leej nyob huv nev?” Yawmsaub teb tas, “Vem yog saib rua plaub caug leej kuv yuav tsw ua kuas puam tsuaj.”

Aplahaa txhad has tas, “Thov tug tswv tsw xob chim, kuv yuav has ntxwv. Yog tas ntswb peb caug leej nyob huv nev?” Yawmsaub teb tas, “Yog kuv ntswb peb caug leej nyob huv kuv yuav tsw ua kuas puam tsuaj.”

Aplahaa has tas, “Kuv tseed muaj ntsej muag nrug tug tswv txuas lug. Yog tas ntswb neeg nkaum leej nyob huv nev?” Yawmsaub teb tas, “Vem yog saib rua neeg nkaum leej kuv yuav tsw ua kuas lub moos hov puam tsuaj.”

Mas Aplahaa has tas, “Thov tug tswv tsw xob chim, kuv yuav has dua ib zag xwb. Yog tas ntswb kaum leej nyob huv nev?” Yawmsaub teb tas, “Vem yog saib rua kaum leej, kuv yuav tsw ua kuas lub moos puam tsuaj.”
Thaus Yawmsaub nrug Aplahaa sws txuas lug taag lawm, Yawmsaub kuj moog lawm, mas Aplahaa txhad rov qaab moog rua nwg lub chaw nyob lawm.

Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj ob tug tubkhai ntuj moog txug lub moos Xauntoo, Lauj kuj nyob quas tsawg ntawm rooj loog lub moos Xauntoo. Thaus Lauj pum dheev ob tug, nwg txawm sawv tseeg moog hu ob tug, hab pe ti nkaus huv aav.

Nwg has tas, “Ob tug yawm hlub, kuv thov meb lug su huv kuv kws yog meb tug tub qhe lub tsev hab ntxuav meb kwtaw pw ib mos, es pigkig meb le sawv ntxuv taug kev moog.” Ob tug has tas, “Tsw xob ua le ntawd, ib laam pw ib mos ntawm tshaav puam nuav xwb.”
Lauj txawm cheem ob tug heev heev, ob tug txhad nrug Lauj moog hab nkaag rua huv nwg tsev. Nwg npaaj zaub mov hab ci ncuav tsw xyaw keeb rau rua ob tug noj.
Thaus tseed tsw tau pw, cov txwvneej huv lub moos Xauntoo hov taag nrho cov hluas cov laug txhua tug huvsw txawm tuaj vej nkaus Lauj lub tsev.
Puab hu Lauj has tas, “Ob tug txwvneej kws mo nuav tuaj txug ntawm koj nyob hovtwg? Ca le coj ob tug tawm tuaj rua peb, peb yuav deev ob tug.”
Lauj tawm ntawm qhov rooj moog cuag puab hab muab qhov rooj kaw ca.
Nwg has tas, “Kuv cov kwvtij, kuv thov mej tsw xob ua phem le nuav.

Kuv tseed muaj ob tug ntxhais tsw tau deev dua hluas nraug le. Ca kuv coj ob tug tawm tuaj rua mej, mej yuav ua le caag rua ob tug los kuj tau lawv le mej lub sab nyam. Tsw xob ua le caag rua ob tug txwvneej nuav tsua qhov ob tug tub lug nraim ntxoo rua huv kuv lub tsev lawm.”

Tassws puab teb tas, “Ca le tswv moog.” Hab puab has tas, “Tug nyuag tuabneeg nuav tsuas yog lug dai peb xwb, nwg tseed yuav ua tug txav cai rua peb. Peb yuav ua tsw zoo rua koj heev dua le ua rua ob tug txwvneej nuav.” Puab txawm swv zug phoom Lauj hab txaav lug ze yuav tsoo lub qhov rooj.
Mas ob tug txwvneej cev loo teg moog nqug Lauj lug rua huv tsev hab muab lub qhov rooj kaw.
Tes ob tug txawm ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob nrau qhov rooj hov dig muag taag, tsw has tug hluas tug laug huvsw nyag taug nyag nrhav tsw tau lub qhov rooj.

Mas ob tug txwvneej has rua Lauj tas, “Huv lub moos nuav koj puas muaj kwvtij neej tsaa? Tsw has tub, ntxhais, vauv lossws lwm tug kws yog koj le tuabneeg huv lub moos nuav, mas ca le coj tawm ntawm nuav moog huvsw.
Wb tub yuav ua rua lub moos nuav puam tsuaj, vem lub suab kws kom cov tuabneeg huv lub moos nuav nrov heev kawg tuaj rua Yawmsaub, mas Yawmsaub txhad khaiv ib tuaj ua kuas lub moos nuav puam tsuaj.”

Lauj txhad tawm moog has rua nwg ob tug vauv kws tseed npaaj yuav yuav nwg ob tug ntxhais has tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg tswv tawm ntawm nuav moog, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub yuav ua rua lub moos nuav puam tsuaj.” Tassws ob tug vauv xaav has tas Lauj tso daag xwb.

Thaus kaaj ntug ob tug tubkhai ntuj txawm txhwb Lauj tas, “Sawv tseeg, coj koj quaspuj hab koj ob tug ntxhais kws nyob ntawm nuav tawm moog, tsaam tes thaus rau txem rua lub moos nuav koj yuav puam tsuaj taag hab.”

Tassws Lauj tseed ua xyem xyuv, mas ob tug tubkhai txhad ntsab nkaus Lauj hab nwg quaspuj hab nwg ob tug ntxhais teg caab moog vem yog Yawmsaub khuvleej nwg, ob tug txhad coj nwg tawm lug rua nrau ntug moos.
Thaus ob tug coj puab tawm lug lawm, ob tug has tas, “Ca le tswv kuas dim txujsa, tsw xob tig saib qaab lossws nreg huv lub taj nuav. Ca le tswv moog lawm peg roob tsaam tes koj puam tsuaj taag.”
Lauj has rua ob tug tas, “Yawm hlub, tsw xob ua le hov.

Saib maj, koj tub txaus sab rua kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe lawm hab koj tub ua txujkev hlub kws luj kawg cawm kuv txujsa, tassws kuv tswv tsw taug moog rua peg roob tsaam tes vej sub vej sw hov lawv cuag tes kuv yuav tuag.
Saib maj, lub moos tim nyob ze tswv taug moog txug, hab yog lub moos miv miv. Thov ca kuv tswv moog rua tid, yog ib lub moos miv miv, kuv txhad dim txujsa.”
Ib tug tubkhai has rua nwg tas, “Kuv tso ncauj qhov nuav hab, kuv yuav tsw ua rua lub moos kws koj has ntawd puam tsuaj.
Ca le maaj nroog tswv moog rua hov ntawd, tsua qhov kuv ua tsw tau daabtsw moog txug thaus koj tswv moog txug qhov ntawd.” Vem le hov luas txhad hu lub moos hov tas Xau‑a.
Thaus Lauj lug txug lub moos Xau‑a nub tawm lawm.
Mas Yawmsaub tso suavtawg lawj faaj ntawm Yawmsaub poob sau ntuj lug rua lub moos Xauntoo hab lub moos Kaumaula.
Hab nwg rhuav tshem tej moos hov hab lub taj huvsw hab txhua tug kws nyob huv tej moos hab nroj tsuag qoob loos huvsw.
Lauj tug quaspuj kws ua Lauj qaab tig saib tom qaab, nwg txawm txa hlo ua ib tug ncej ntsev lawm.
Thaus taagkig sawv ntxuv Aplahaa tawm moog sawv ntawm lub chaw kws txeev sawv ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.
Nwg saib rua nraag lub moos Xauntoo hab lub moos Kaumaula hab saib moog thoob plawg lub taj huvsw, ua cav lub tebchaws muaj paa nchu quas lug yaam nkaus le ib cub tawg hlub hlub nchu paa.

Yog le ntawd thaus Vaajtswv ua rua tej moos nraag taj puam tsuaj taag, Vaajtswv ncu txug Aplahaa, txhad xaa Lauj tawm tswv dim kev puam tsuaj, rua thaus Vaajtswv muab tej moos kws Lauj nyob ua lamswm taag.
Lauj hab nwg ob tug ntxhais tawm huv lub moos Xau‑a moog nyob peg roob, tsua qhov nwg ntshai nyob huv lub moos Xau‑a. Nwg hab ob tug ntxhais txhad moog nyob huv ib lub qhov tsua.
Tug ntxhais hlub has rua tug nam hluas tas, “Wb txwv laug lawm, hab tsw muaj ib tug quasyawg twg huv lub nplajteb yuav nrug ib pw ua ke lawv le tuabneeg nplajteb ib txwm ua.
Ca ib ua kuas ib txwv haus cawv txwv maab, tes ib yuav nrug nwg pw, sub ib txhad le muaj tub ki lug ntawm ib txwv.”
Tes mo ntawd ob tug txawm kuas leej txwv haus cawv txwv maab, mas tug ntxhais hlub txhad moog nrug leej txwv pw, leej txwv tsw paub tas tug ntxhais lug pw thaus twg hab sawv moog thaus twg lawm.

Taagkig tug ntxhais hlub txawm has rua tug nam hluas tas, “Naag mo kuv tub moog nrug kuv txwv pw lawm. Ca mo nuav ib ua kuas nwg haus cawv txwv maab dua hab, tes koj moog nrug nwg pw, sub ib txhad le muaj tub ki lug ntawm ib txwv.”
Tes ob tug txawm ua kuas leej txwv haus cawv txwv maab mo hov hab. Tug nam hluas txhad moog nrug leej txwv pw, leej txwv tsw paub tas tug ntxhais lug pw thaus twg hab sawv moog thaus twg lawm.
Yog le nuav Lauj ob tug ntxhais txhad le xeeb mivnyuas ntawm ob tug txwv.
Tug ntxhais hlub yug tau ib tug tub hab tis npe hu ua Mau‑a.  Nwg ua cov Mau‑a kws nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav tug yawm koob.
Tug nam hluas kuj yug tau ib tug tub hab tis npe hu ua Npee‑ami.  Nwg ua cov Aamoo kws nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav tug yawm koob.
Aplahaa tswv hov ntawd moog rua nraag Neke tebchaws  mas nwg moog tsuam chaw nyob ntawm lub moos Khante hab lub moos Su ntu nruab nraab. Nwg moog nyob huv lub moos Kelas ib ntus.
Aplahaa has txug nwg tug quaspuj Xala has tas, “Yog kuv le muam.” Anpimelej kws ua vaajntxwv kaav lub moos Kelas txhad le khaiv tuabneeg moog coj Xala lug.
Tes mo ntuj Vaajtswv txawm tshwm rua Anpimelej ua npau suav pum mas nwg has tas, “Koj yuav tuag tag tag le vem tug quaspuj kws koj coj lug nuav tub yeej muaj quasyawg lawm.”
Tassws Anpimelej tsw tau moog ze Xala le mas nwg txhad has tas, “Au tug Tswv, koj txawm yuav muab haiv tuabneeg kws tsw txhum tua pov tseg hab lov?

Vem Aplahaa civ has tas, ‘Nwg yog kuv le muam,’ hab tug quaspuj nuav kuj has tas ‘Aplahaa yog kuv le nug,’ qhov kws kuv ua nuav kuv lub sab yeej ua ncaaj ua nceeg hab kuv txhais teg yeej tsw tau ua txhum le.”

Mas Vaajtswv txhad has rua nwg huv zaaj npau suav has tas, “Kuv yeej paub tas qhov kws koj ua le hov koj kuj ua ncaaj tag, mas kuv txhad taav tsw kheev koj ua txhum rua kuv. Vem le nuav kuv txhad tsw kheev koj kov tug quaspuj nuav.

Ca le muab tug quaspuj nuav thim rov qaab rua nwg tug quasyawg, vem tug quasyawg hov yog ib tug kws cev Vaajtswv lug mas nwg yuav thov Vaajtswv paab koj sub koj txhad caj sa nyob. Tassws yog koj tsw thim tug quaspuj nuav rua nwg, koj ca le paub tseeb tas koj hab koj cov tuabneeg suavdawg yuav tuag.”
Anpimelej sawv ntxuv ntxuv lug hu nwg cov num tswv suavdawg tuaj cuag nwg mas nwg qha txhua yaam nuav rua puab noog mas puab ntshai kawg le.

Anpimelej txawm hu Aplahaa tuaj cuag nwg mas has rua Aplahaa tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav rua peb? Kuv tau ua txhum le caag rua koj es koj yuav coj lub nam tuam txem luj le nuav lug rua kuv hab kuv lub tebchaws. Tej kws koj ua rua kuv nuav tub tsw tswm nyog ua hlo le.”
Anpimelej has rua Aplahaa tas, “Koj xaav le caag es koj ua le nuav.”
Aplahaa teb has tas, “Kuv xaav tas huv lub tebchaws nuav tsw muaj leejtwg paub ntshai Vaajtswv hlo le tes tsaam luas muab kuv tua vem yog xaav yuav kuv quaspuj.
Qhov tseeb nwg yog kuv le muam tag tsua qhov nwg nrug kuv koom txwv tsw koom nam xwb mas nwg txhad tau lug ua kuv quaspuj.

Thaus Vaajtswv kuas kuv tawm huv nam txwv lub tsev tswv moog rua u rua nua kuv txhad has rua kuv quaspuj tas, ‘Wb txawm moog txug hovtwg los xwj koj yuav tsum has rua luas tas kuv yog koj le nug, mas txhad yog koj hlub kuv.’ ”
Tes Anpimelej txawm muab yaaj muab nyuj muab tub qhe nkauj qhev pub rua Aplahaa hab muab Aplahaa tug quaspuj Xala thim rov qaab rua Aplahaa.
Hab Anpimelej has tas, “Saib maj, kuv lub tebchaws nyob ntawm koj xubndag nuav mas yog koj xaav moog nyob rua thaaj twg los kuj moog nyob tau lawv le koj lub sab nyam.”
Hab nwg has rua Xala tas, “Kuv muab ib txheeb sekhee nyaj  rua koj tug nug ntxuav koj taab meeg cov tuabneeg kws nrug koj nyob suavdawg mas koj kuj dawb huv fem taug ib tsoom lawm.”
Tes Aplahaa txawm thov Vaajtswv mas Vaajtswv txhad khu Anpimelej hab Anpimelej quaspuj hab tej nkauj qhev suavdawg zoo, puab txhad muaj taug mivnyuas.
Vem yog Anpimelej coj Aplahaa tug quaspuj Xala lug le hov mas Vaajtswv txhad kaw cov quaspuj kws nyob huv vaajntxwv tsev tej plaab tsw pub xeeb tub.
Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua Xala lawv le nwg tub has tseg lawm, hab Yawmsaub ua rua Xala lawv le nwg cog lug ca.
Xala txhad xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Aplahaa rua thaus Aplahaa laug heev hab yog lub swjhawm kws Vaajtswv tau has rua nwg lawm.
Aplahaa tis npe rua tug tub kws Xala yug rua nwg hu ua Yiha.
Hab Aplahaa muab nwg tug tub Yiha ua kevcai txav rua thaus kws nwg muaj yim nub lawm, lawv le Vaajtswv tau kuas nwg ua.
Aplahaa muaj ib puas xyoo rua thaus yug Yiha rua nwg.
Mas Xala has tas, “Vaajtswv ua rua kuv luag zoo sab. Txhua tug kws tau nov yuav nrug kuv luag hab.”
Hab Xala has tas, “Leejtwg yuav has tau rua Aplahaa tas Xala yuav pub mig rua mivnyuas noj? Tassws kuv yug tau ib tug tub rua nwg rua thaus nwg laug heev lawm.”
Tug mivtub hov kuj hlub hab tseg mig lawm. Aplahaa npaaj ib rooj noj luj rua nub kws Yiha tseg mig.
Tassws Xala pum Haka kws yog tuabneeg Iyi tug tub kws yug rua Aplahaa luag luag nwg tug tub.
Xala txhad has rua Aplahaa tas, “Ca le muab tug nkauj qhev nuav hab nwg tug tub lawv tswv moog, tsua qhov tsw kheev tug nkauj qhev nuav tug tub nrug kuv tug tub Yiha txais qub txeeg qub teg.”
Qhov nuav ua rua Aplahaa nyuaj sab vem yog saib rua nwg tug tub Yisama‑ee.
Tassws Vaajtswv has rua Aplahaa tas, “Tsw xob nyuaj sab rua tug mivnyuas hab koj tug nkauj qhev. Xala has le caag rua koj ca le ua le ntawd, tsua qhov koj caaj ceg yuav yog tshwm ntawm Yiha moog.
Tug nkauj qhev tug tub ntawd kuv yuav pub ua tau ib haiv tuabneeg hab vem nwg yog koj le noob.”

Aplahaa txhad sawv ntxuv tseeg muab ncuav hab ib naab dej tsaws rua Haka rws sau xub pwg, hab xaa nwg nrug tug mivnyuas ua ke tawm moog.  Nwg txhad tawm moog hab moog moog lug lug huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Npe‑awsenpa.
Thaus naab dej hov taag lawm Haka txawm muab tug mivnyuas tso rua huv qaab ib tsob nyuag ntoo.
Tes nwg txawm moog nyob quas tsawg rua ib caag kwvlaam deb le tua ib nee, vem nwg has tas, “Kuv tsw xaav pum kuv tug mivnyuas tu sav.” Thaus nwg tseed nyob tsawg hov ntawd, nwg tsaa suab quaj.

Vaajtswv nov tug mivtub hov lub suab, mas Vaajtswv tug tubkhai ntuj hu sau ntuj tuaj rua Haka tas, “Koj ua le caag lawm? Koj tsw xob ntshai tsua qhov Vaajtswv tub nov tug mivtub lub suab ntawm qhov chaw kws nwg nyob lawm.
Ca le sawv tseeg moog tsaa tug mivtub tuav rawv nwg txhais teg, tsua qhov kuv yuav pub kuas nwg ua ib haiv tuabneeg luj.”
Mas Vaajtswv qheb Haka lub qhov muag nwg txawm pum ib lub qhov dej. Nwg txhad moog ntim dej puv nkaus lub naab hab muab rua tug mivtub haus.
Vaajtswv nrug nraim tug mivtub nwg txhad kheev hlub. Nwg nyob rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua hab ua tug kws txawj tua neev.
Nwg nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa. Nwg nam yuav ib tug quaspuj huv Iyi tebchaws lug rua nwg.
Thaus ntawd vaajntxwv Anpimelej hab Fikhau kws yog Anpimelej tug thawj tub rog has rua Aplahaa tas, “Vaajtswv nrug nraim koj rua txhua yaam kws koj ua.

Vem le nuav mas nwgnuav ca le tuav Vaajtswv lub npe cog lug twv rua kuv ntawm nuav tas koj yuav tsw ntxeev ntxag kuv hab kuv tej tub ki hab kuv caaj ceg, hab kuv tau ua zoo le caag rua koj lawm, koj yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua kuv hab rua lub tebchaws kws koj txeev ua qhua nyob nuav.”
Aplahaa txhad has tas, “Kuv cog lug twv le ntawd.”
Thaus Aplahaa ywg rua Anpimelej has txug lub qhov dej kws Anpimelej cov tub qhe muab txeeb lawm,
Anpimelej has tas, “Kuv tsw paub tas leejtwg ua le nuav. Koj tsw tau has rua kuv, kuv yeej tsw tau nov txug nub nua.”
Aplahaa txhad coj yaaj hab nyuj tuaj pub rua Anpimelej, mas ob tug txhad sws cog lug.
Aplahaa txhad cais xyaa tug xyuas yaaj tawm ntawm paab yaaj.
Anpimelej has rua Aplahaa tas, “Xyaa tug xyuas yaaj kws koj muab cais rua ib caag hov yog daabtsw?”
Aplahaa has tas, “Xyaa tug xyuas yaaj hov, thov koj ca le txais ntawm kuv txhais teg, sub koj txhad ua tau timkhawv rua kuv tas kuv tau khawb lub qhov dej nuav.”
Vem le nuav txhad hu lub chaw ntawd tas Npe‑awsenpa  tsua qhov ob tog tau cog lug twv tseg qhov chaw ntawd.
Ob tug txhad cog lug tseg le ntawd rua ntawm Npe‑awsenpa. Mas Anpimelej hab Fikhau kws yog tug thawj rog kuj rov qaab moog rua huv cov Filixatee lub tebchaws lawm.
Aplahaa cog ib tsob nyuag ntoo tamalis  rua ntawm Npe‑awsenpa, hab tuav Yawmsaub kws yog Vaajtswv muaj txujsa nyob ib txhws lub npe thov hov ntawd.
Mas Aplahaa ua qhua nyob huv cov Filixatee lub tebchaws tau ntau nub.
Dhau ntawd lug Vaajtswv swm Aplahaa lub sab mas has rua nwg tas, “Aplahaa.” Aplahaa teb tas, “Kuv nyob nuav 'os.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Ca le coj koj tug tub Yiha, yog koj tuab tug tub kws koj hlub, moog rua Mauliya tebchaws hab muab nwg hlawv xyeem rua sau ib lub roob kws kuv yuav qha koj.”

Aplahaa txawm sawv ntxuv tseeg pem eeb rua sau neeg luav hab coj nwg ob tug tub qhe kws tseed hluas hab nwg tug tub Yiha nrug nwg moog. Nwg txav tawg swv hlawv xyeem, hab taug kev moog rua lub chaw kws Vaajtswv has rua nwg.
Thaus moog tau peb nub lawm Aplahaa tsaa muag saib pum lub chaw nyob deb deb.
Aplahaa txhad has rua ob tug tub qhe tas, “Meb nrug neeg luav nyob ntawm nuav, kuv hab kuv tug tub yuav moog rua tim u, moog pe hawm Vaajtswv taag, ib le maav rov lug rua ntawm meb nuav.”
Aplahaa muab cov tawg kws yuav swv hlawv xyeem hov rua nwg tug tub Yiha kwv, hab nwg coj suavtawg hab rag huv nwg txhais teg. Tes ob tug txhad ua ke moog.

Yiha has rua nwg txwv Aplahaa tas, “Txwv.” Aplahaa teb tas, “Mivtub, koj has daabtsw?” Yiha txhad has tas, “Muaj suavtawg hab muaj tawg rauv tassws tug mivnyuas yaaj kws yuav muab hlawv xyeem nyob hovtwg?”
Aplahaa has tas, “Mivtub, Vaajtswv nwg yuav npaaj hab pub tug mivnyuas yaaj kws swv hlawv xyeem hov.” Mas ob tug txhad ua ke taug kev moog.

Thaus ob tug moog txug qhov chaw kws Vaajtswv tau has rua nwg lawm, Aplahaa txawm ua ib lub thaaj rua hov ntawd hab muab cov tawg tib tuab zoo rua sau. Nwg muab nwg tug tub Yiha khi lug tso rua sau cov tawg sau lub thaaj.
Tes Aplahaa txawm cev teg muab rag lug yuav tua nwg tug tub.
Tassws Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj hu sau ntuj tuaj rua nwg hab has tas, “Aplahaa, Aplahaa.” Aplahaa teb tas, “Kuv nyob nuav 'os.”

Tug tubkhai ntuj has tas, “Tsw xob kov tug mivnyuas tub hab tsw xob ua le caag rua nwg hlo le, tsua qhov nwgnuav kuv paub tseeb lawm tas koj fwm hab paub ntshai Vaajtswv vem qhov kws koj swv nyog muab koj tug tub, kws yog koj tuab tug tub pub rua kuv.”

Aplahaa tsaa muag saib na cav pum muaj ib tug txwv yaaj nyob tom nwg qaab kws txwm kub khuab rua ib xyov ntoo ntum ntum. Aplahaa txhad moog muab tug txwv yaaj hov lug xyeem ua kevcai hlawv xyeem theej nwg tug tub chaw.
Aplahaa txhad hu lub chaw hov tas Yawmsaub yuav npaaj hab pub,  yaam le kws has lug txug naj nub nwgnuav tas “Yuav npaaj hab pub rua sau Yawmsaub lub roob.”
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj hu sau ntuj tuaj rua Aplahaa zag ob,
hab has tas, “Yawmsaub has tas, Kuv tuav kuv lub npe cog lug ruaj tas, vem qhov kws koj ua le nuav es swv nyog koj tug tub, kws yog koj tuab tug tub,

mas kuv yeej yuav foom koob moov rua koj tag tag le, kuv yuav ua rua koj caaj ceg fuam vaam coob heev yaam le tej nub qub sau ntuj hab yaam le tej xuab zeb ntawm ntug havtxwv. Koj caaj ceg yuav tau yeeb ncuab tej rooj loog ua puab tug.
Ib tsoom tebchaws huv lub nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm koj caaj ceg, vem koj noog kuv tej lug.”
Aplahaa txhad rov qaab moog ntswb nwg ob tug tub qhe hluas, hab puab ua ke moog rua Npe‑awsenpa. Aplahaa kuj nyob ntawm Npe‑awsenpa.
Dhau ntawd lug muaj tuabneeg has rua Aplahaa tas, “Meekha yug tau mivnyuas rua koj tug kwv Nahau.
Us yog tug hlub, Npub yog tug kwv, hab muaj Khemu‑ee kws yog Alaa txwv,
hab Khexe, Haxo, Pinta, Yila hab Npethu‑ee.”
Npethu‑ee yog Lenpekha txwv. Meekha yug tau yim leej tub nuav rua Nahau kws yog Aplahaa tug kwv.
Tsw taag le ntawd Nahau tug nam yau kws npe hu ua Le‑uma yug tau Thenpa, Kahaa, Thahas hab Ma‑akha.
Xala noob nyoog nyob tau ib puas neeg nkaum xyaa xyoo.
Xala tuag huv lub moos Khiliya Anpa (kws yog Heploo) huv Khana‑aa tebchaws. Aplahaa paam Xala hab quaj quaj ncu ncu Xala.
Aplahaa rua sawv ntawm Xala lub cev tuag moog has rua cov tuabneeg Hithai has tas,

“Kuv yog tuabneeg lwm tebchaws lug ua qhua nrug mej nyob. Thov nrug mej yuav ib thaaj aav rua kuv swv ua toj ntxaas sub kuv txhad tau chaw muab tug tuag moog foob kaab kuas pluj ntawm lub qhov muag moog.”
Cov Hithai teb Aplahaa tas,

“Yawm hlub, thov koj noog peb has. Koj yog ib tug ua hlub huv peb cov ntaag. Ca koj coj koj tug tuag moog log rua huv peb tej qhov ntxaa lub kws zoo kawg nkaus. Tsw muaj leejtwg yuav taav tsw kheev koj muab koj tug tuag log rua huv nwg lub qhov ntxaa ntawd.”
Aplahaa txawm sawv tseeg lug nyo hau pe cov Hithai kws nyob lub tebchaws hov,
hab nwg has rua puab has tas, “Yog mej kheev kuv log kuv tug tuag tag, thov mej noog kuv has hab paab nrug kuv thov Xauha tug tub Efoo

muab nwg lub qhov tsua Mapela kws nyob ntawm nwg ntug teb rua kuv. Thov kuas nwg muab muag rua kuv taab meeg mej suavdawg xubndag kuas txaus nkaus tug nqe, kuv txhad muaj ib thaaj aav swv ua toj ntxaas ua kuv tug.”
Efoo kuj nrug cov Hithai nyob quas tsawg ua ke ntawd mas Efoo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai txhad teb Aplahaa taab meeg cov Hithai suavdawg kws tuaj nyob ua ke ntawm rooj loog  has tas,

“Tsw xob ua le, yawm hlub. Thov koj noog kuv has. Kuv yuav pub daim teb hab lub qhov tsua kws nyob ntawm daim teb hov rua koj. Kuv pub rua koj taab meeg kuv cov tuabneeg suavdawg. Ca le coj koj tug tuag moog log rua huv.”
Aplahaa rov nyo hau pe cov tuabneeg tebchaws hov
