mas nwg has rua Efoo taab meeg cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov nov tas, “Yog koj kheev, thov koj noog kuv has hab. Kuv yuav them cov nqe teb hov rua koj, koj ca le txais ntawm kuv sub kuv txhad tau chaw log tug tuag rua ntawd.”
Efoo teb Aplahaa tas,
“Yawm hlub, thov koj noog kuv has. Daim teb mas tug nqe yog plaub puas sekhee nyaj  tassws koj hab kuv mas tsw xob xaav le caag. Ca le coj koj tug tuag moog log rua huv xwb.”

Aplahaa txhad le nrug Efoo has hum hab Aplahaa kiv cov nyaj txwm nkaus le tug nqe kws Efoo has rua nwg taab meeg cov Hithai nov lawd, yog plaub puas sekhee txwm nkaus le kws tej tub laag tub luam kiv rua ncua swjhawm ntawd.
Efoo daim teb huv Mapela kws nyob ntawm Maale saab nub tuaj mas nwg muag taag nrho thaaj teb hab lub qhov tsua hab tej xyoob ntoo kws nyob huv thaaj teb ntawd huvsw
rua Aplahaa yuav ua Aplahaa tug taab meeg cov Hithai suavdawg kws tuaj ua ke ntawm rooj loog xubndag.
Tes Aplahaa txawm muab nwg tug quaspuj Xala log rua huv lub qhov tsua ntawm thaaj teb Mapela kws nyob ntawm Maale saab nub tuaj, kws yog Heploo, huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Daim teb hab lub qhov tsua ntawm daim teb hov mas cov Hithai muab muag hlo rua Aplahaa yuav ua Aplahaa tug mas Aplahaa txhad tau chaw log tuag.
Nwgnuav Aplahaa laug heev, noob nyoog nchaav lawm. Hab Yawmsaub tau foom koob moov rua Aplahaa txhua yaam.
Aplahaa has rua nwg tug tub qhe kws noob nyoog laug dua tej huv nwg tsev, yog tug kws saib txhua yaam kws Aplahaa muaj, has tas, “Muab koj txhais teg lug tso rua huv qaab kuv txhais ncej qaab.

Mas kuv yuav kuas koj tuav Yawmsaub kws yog Vaajtswv kaav sau ntuj hab huv lub nplajteb lub npe cog lug twv tas, koj yuav tsw yuav cov tuabneeg Khana‑aa kws kuv nrug nyob nuav tej ntxhais ua kuv tug tub quaspuj.
Tassws koj yuav moog rua kuv lub qub tebchaws hab rua kuv cov kwvtij, hab yuav ib tug quaspuj rua kuv tug tub Yiha.”
Tug tub qhe has rua nwg tas, “Yog tug ntxhais tsw kaam nrug kuv lug rua lub tebchaws nuav, tes kuv yuav coj koj tug tub moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws koj tswv tawm lug ntawd lov?”
Aplahaa has rua nwg tas, “Ceev faaj tsw xob coj kuv tug tub rov qaab moog rua hov ntawd.

Yawmsaub kws yog Vaajtswv sau ntuj, yog tug kws coj kuv tawm huv kuv txwv tsev lug hab tawm huv lub tebchaws kws yug kuv, hab cog lug tseg ruaj rua kuv has tas, ‘Kuv yuav pub lub tebchaws nuav rua koj caaj ceg,’ mas Vaajtswv yuav tso nwg tug tubkhai ntuj moog ua koj ntej, mas koj txhad yuav yuav ib tug quaspuj huv lub tebchaws hov rua kuv tug tub.
Yog tug quaspuj tsw kaam nrug koj lug koj yuav dim tej lug kws cog twv rua kuv nuav. Tsuav yog koj tsw xob coj kuv tug tub rov qaab moog rua lub tebchaws ntawd xwb.”
Tug tub qhe txhad muab nwg txhais teg tso rua huv qaab nwg tug lospaav Aplahaa txhais ncej qaab, hab cog lug twv tas yuav ua lawv le ntawd.

Tug tub qhe txawm coj nwg tug lospaav kaum tug ntxhuav tawm moog, hab coj ntau yaam hov txhua chaw tswm txaj ntawm nwg tug lospaav moog. Nwg taug kev moog rua Alaa Nahala‑i tebchaws,  moog txug Nahau lub moos.
Nwg ua kuas cov ntxhuav txhus caug rua ntawm ntug qhov dej nrau lub moos, yog lub swjhawm yuav tsaus ntuj kws cov quaspuj tawm tuaj ntaus dej.
Nwg has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, kws yog kuv tug tswv Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, thov koj coj kuv txuj hauv kev kuas tav rua nub nua, hab qha txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rua kuv tug tswv Aplahaa.
Kuv saamswm sawv ntsug ntawm ntug qhov dej txhawv hab cov tuabneeg huv lub moos tej ntxhais saamswm tawm tuaj ntaus dej.

Tug ntxhais kws kuv has rua nwg tas, ‘Thov txu koj lub taub dej rua kuv haus,’ tes nwg has tas ‘Haus maj hab kuv yuav ntaus dej rua koj cov ntxhuav haus huvsw,’ mas thov ca tug hov yog tug kws koj tau teem ca ua koj tug tub qhe Yiha tug quaspuj. Yog le nuav kuv txhad paub tseeb tas koj qha koj txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov rua kuv tug tswv Aplahaa.”
Thaus nwg has lug tsw tau xaus, na cav Lenpekha kws yog Npethu‑ee tug ntxhais kwv nwg lub taub dej sau xub pwg tawm tuaj. Npethu‑ee nam yog Meekha, txwv yog Nahau kws yog Aplahaa tug kwv.
Tug hluas nkauj hov zoo nkauj heev, yog ib tug ntxhais dawb huv tsw tau muaj ib tug deev le. Nwg nqeg moog rua ntawm lub qhov dej txhawv ntaus dej puv lub taub hab nce rov lug.
Aplahaa tug qhev dha loo moog tog hab has tas, “Thov koj laub mivntsw dej huv koj lub taub rua kuv haus.”
Nwg teb tas, “Yawm hlub, haus maj,” tes nwg txawm txu plhuav nwg lub taub dej cev rua haus.
Thaus cev rua haus taag lawm, nwg txawm has tas, “Kuv yuav ntaus dej rua koj cov ntxhuav haus kuas tsau huvsw.”
Nwg maaj nroog laub dej huv nwg lub taub rua huv lub daab hab dha rov moog ntaus dej ntawm lub qhov dua, hab nwg ntaus dej rua cov ntxhuav haus huvsw.
Aplahaa tug qhev saib tuabywv tug hluas nkauj hov xaav paub tas Yawmsaub coj nwg txujkev kws tuaj tav lawm los tsw tau.
Thaus cov ntxhuav haus dej taag lawm, tug yawm hov txawm muab ib lub khawb kub ntawm qhov ntswg nyaav ib nraab sekhee hab ib nkawg paug teg kub nyaav kaum sekhee  rua Lenpekha coj ntawm txhais teg,
hab has tas, “Thov qha kuv saib koj yog leejtwg tug ntxhais. Huv koj txwv tsev muaj chaw rua peb su los tsw muaj?”
Nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog Npethu‑ee le ntxhais, kuv yawm yog Nahau, kuv puj yog Meekha.”
Hab nwg has ntxwv tas, “Peb muaj quav nyaab hab mov noj txaus hab muaj chaw su.”
Tug yawm ntawd txawm nyo hau hab pe Yawmsaub,

hab nwg has tas, “Qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug tswv Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, nwg tsw tso nwg txujkev hlub ruaj khov tseg hab nwg yeej ua lawv le nwg cog lug tseg rua kuv tug tswv. Kuv mas Yawmsaub tau coj kuv taug kev tuaj txug kuv tug tswv tsev kwvtij.”
Mas tug hluas nkauj txhad dha moog has rua nwg nam tsev tuabneeg paub txug tej nuav.
Lenpekha muaj ib tug nug hu ua Lanpaa. Lanpaa txhad dha loo moog saib tug yawm hov tom qhov dej txhawv.

Thaus nwg pum lub khawb ntswg hab tej paug teg ntawm nwg tug muam txhais teg hab nov tej lug kws nwg tug muam Lenpekha has tas tug yawm tau has rua nwg, Lanpaa txawm moog saib tug yawm hov mas pum nwg sawv ntsug ua ke nrug cov ntxhuav ntawm qhov dej.
Nwg has tas, “Koj yog tug kws tau Yawmsaub le moov zoo, ca le lug tsev. Koj nyob nrau nuav ua daabtsw? Kuv tub npaaj vaaj tse hab npaaj chaw rua koj cov ntxhuav lawm.”
Tug yawm hov txhad lug rua huv tsev, mas Lanpaa daws tej ntxhuav hab muab quav nyaab hab zaub rua cov ntxhuav noj, hab muab dej rua nwg hab cov kws nrug nwg tuaj ntxuav kwtaw,
hab rau zaub mov rua tug yawm hov noj. Tassws nwg has tas, “Kuv yuav tsw noj moog txug thaus kuv has tej lug kws kuv yuav has taag tsaiv.” Lanpaa kuj has tas, “Ca le has.”
Nwg txhad has tas, “Kuv yog Aplahaa le tub qhe.

Yawmsaub tau foom koob moov rua kuv tug tswv ntau heev, hab nwg kuj vaam meej. Yawmsaub pub tej nam paab yaaj paab tshws tej paab nyuj, nyaj hab kub, tub qhe nkauj qhev, tej ntxhuav hab neeg luav rua nwg.
Xala kws yog kuv tug tswv tug quaspuj yug tau ib tug tub rua nwg thaus nwg laug lawm, mas kuv tug tswv muab hlo txhua yaam kws nwg muaj rua nwg tug tub.
Kuv tug tswv kuas kuv cog lug twv hab has tas, ‘Koj tsw xob yuav cov tuabneeg Khana‑aa kws kuv nrug nyob nuav tej ntxhais ua kuv tug tub quaspuj.
Tassws koj yuav rov qaab moog rua kuv txwv tsev tuabneeg hab rua kuv cov kwvtij, hab yuav ib tug quaspuj rua kuv tug tub.’
Kuv has rua kuv tug tswv tas, ‘Tsaam tug quaspuj hov tsw kaam nrug kuv lug.’

Tassws nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Yawmsaub kws kuv nrug nraim yuav tso nwg tug tubkhai ntuj nrug koj moog hab ua rua txujkev kws koj moog tav. Koj yuav yuav tau quaspuj ntawm kuv cov kwvtij hab huv kuv txwv lub tsev rua kuv tug tub.
Thaus koj moog txug kuv cov kwvtij, koj txhad dim tej lug kws koj cog twv rua kuv lawm. Yog puab tsw yeem pub tug ntxhais hov rua koj, koj kuj yuav dim tej lug kws koj cog twv rua kuv.’
“Nub nua kuv tuaj txug ntawm lub qhov dej txhawv hab has tas, ‘Au Yawmsaub, kws yog kuv tug tswv Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, thov koj coj kuv txuj hauv kev kuas tav nwgnuav.
Kuv saamswm sawv ntsug ntawm ntug qhov dej nuav, mas tug ntxhais kws tuaj ntaus dej kws kuv has rua nwg tas, “Thov muab mivntswv dej ntawm koj lub taub rua kuv haus,”
tes nwg has tas “Haus maj hab kuv yuav ntaus dej rua koj cov ntxhuav haus,” mas thov ca tug hov yog tug kws Yawmsaub tau teem ca ua kuv tug tswv tug tub quaspuj.’

“Thaus kuv has huv lub sab tsw tau taag, na cav Lenpekha kwv nwg lub taub dej sau xub pwg tawm tuaj hab nqeg moog ntaus dej ntawm lub qhov dej txhawv. Kuv has rua nwg tas, ‘Thov mivntswv dej rua kuv haus.’

Nwg txawm maaj nroog txu lub taub dej sau xub pwg lug hab has tas, ‘Haus maj. Kuv tseed yuav muab dej rua koj cov ntxhuav haus hab.’ Tes kuv txawm haus, hab nwg kuj ntaus dej rua cov ntxhuav haus hab.

Mas kuv txhad nug nwg tas, ‘Koj yog leejtwg le ntxhais?’ Nwg teb tas, ‘Kuv yog Npethu‑ee le ntxhais, kuv yawm yog Nahau kuv puj yog Meekha.’ Kuv txhad muab lub khawb khawm rua nwg qhov ntswg hab muab paug teg rua nwg coj ntawm txhais teg.

Hab kuv nyo hau pe Yawmsaub hab qhuas Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug tswv Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, yog tug kws coj kuv taug txujkev kws raug lawm txhad tau kuv tug tswv cov txheeb ze tug ntxhais rua nwg tug tub.
Nwgnuav yog mej kaam ua zoo ua ncaaj rua kuv tug tswv, los thov has rua kuv paub. Txawm tsw ua le ntawd los has rua kuv paub, sub kuv txhad txawj moog rua saab xws los saab phem.”
Lanpaa hab Npethu‑ee txawm teb tas, “Tej nuav yog lug ntawm Yawmsaub lug. Peb yuav has sab has qeg rua koj tsw tau.
Lenpekha tub nyob ntawm koj xubndag nuav, ca le coj nwg es moog, ca nwg ua koj tug tswv tug tub le quaspuj lawv le Yawmsaub has lawm.”
Thaus Aplahaa tug qhev tau nov puab tej lug lawm, nwg txawm khoov ntshws huv peg teb pe Yawmsaub.
Nwg rhu tej paug nyaj paug kub saw nyaj saw kub hab tsoog tsho lug muab rua Lenpekha. Nwg tseed muab tej hov txhua chaw tseem ceeb tswm txaj rua tug nug hab leej nam.
Nwg hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg tuaj txhad noj txhad haus hab pw ib mos ntawd. Thaus puab sawv ntxuv tseeg, Aplahaa tug qhev has tas, “Thov tso kuv rov qaab moog kuas txug kuv tug tswv.”
Tug nug hab leej nam has tas, “Ca peb tug ntxhais nrug peb nyob ib ntus, yaam tsawg yog kaum nub, nwg le moog tau.”
Tassws Aplahaa tug qhev has rua ob tug tas, “Tsw xob cheem kuv, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub coj kuv txujkev tuaj tav lawm. Thov ca kuv moog kuv txhad tau rov moog txug kuv tug tswv.”
Ob tug has tas, “Ca ib hu tug ntxhais lug nug saib.”
Ob tug txhad hu Lenpekha lug, hab has rua nwg tas, “Koj yuav nrug tug yawm nuav moog los tsw moog?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv moog hab.”
Puab txhad xaa tug muam Lenpekha hab tug nkauj qhev kws tu nwg nrug Aplahaa tug qhev hab nwg cov tuabneeg moog.
Puab txawm foom koob moov rua Lenpekha has tas, “Leej muam, thov koj tau ua quas txheeb quas vaam tuabneeg le nam. Thov kuas koj caaj ceg tau yeeb ncuab lub rooj loog ua puab tug.”
Mas Lenpekha hab nwg cov nkauj qhev kuj sawv kev caij ntxhuav nrug Aplahaa tug qhev moog. Tug qhev txhad coj Lenpekha taug kev moog.
Yiha tub tawm ntawm Npe‑aw Lahailai moog nyob nraag Neke lawm.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj Yiha tawm moog ncig ua sw tom teb, nwg tsaa muag saib na cav pum ib paab ntxhuav taug kev lug.
Lenpekha tsaa muag saib, mas thaus nwg pum Yiha nwg txawm nqeg sau ntxhuav lug,
hab has rua Aplahaa tug qhev tas, “Tug yawm tid kws saamswm taug kev tuaj ntswb peb yog leejtwg?” Tug qhev tas “Yog kuv tug tswv.” Lenpekha txhad muab txuj phuam lug npug nwg ntsej muag.
Aplahaa tug qhev pav txhua yaam kws nwg ua lawm rua Yiha paub.
Yiha txawm coj Lenpekha nkaag rua huv nwg nam Xala lub tsev ntaub, hab yuav Lenpekha ua nwg quaspuj, nwg kuj nyam Lenpekha. Nwg nam txawm tuag lawm los Yiha txhad rov zoo sab.
Aplahaa yuav dua ib tug quaspuj npe hu ua Khethula.
Nwg yug tau cov tub nuav rua Aplahaa, yog Xilaa, Yaujsaa, Mentaa, Mintee, Isanpas hab Su‑a.
Yaujsaa yog Senpa hab Ntentaa txwv. Ntentaa le tub yog Asuli, Lethusi hab Le‑umi.
Mintee cov tub yog Efa, Efaw, Hanau, Anpinta hab Eenta‑a. Cov nuav huvsw yog Khethula le tub ki xeeb ntxwv.
Aplahaa muab hlo nwg lub cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw rua Yiha.

Aplahaa kuj muab hov txhua chaw rua nwg tej nam yau cov tub hab. Thaus nwg tseed ua neej nyob nwg kuas puab ncaim nwg tug tub Yiha moog rua saab nub tuaj moog nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws nyob saab nub tuaj.
Aplahaa le noob nyoog huvsw muaj ib puas xyaa caum tswb xyoos.
Aplahaa tu sav rua thaus nwg laug heev, noob nyoog ntau heev lawm, mas nwg moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob.
Yiha hab Yisama‑ee kws yog nwg le tub kuj muab nwg log rua huv lub qhov tsua Mapela kws nyob huv Xauha tug tub Efoo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai daim teb ntawm Maale saab nub tuaj,
yog daim teb kws Aplahaa yuav ntawm cov Hithai lug. Puab muab Aplahaa log rua hov ntawd nrug nwg tug quaspuj Xala ua ke.
Thaus Aplahaa tuag lawm, Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua nwg tug tub Yiha. Yiha nyob ntawm Npe‑awlahailai.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Yisama‑ee caaj ceg, nwg yog Aplahaa tug tub kws Xala tug nkauj qhev Haka kws yog tuabneeg Iyi yug rua Aplahaa.
Nuav yog Yisama‑ee cov tub tej npe, lawv tug hlub rua cov yau zuj zug moog. Yisama‑ee tug tub hlub yog Nenpayau, cov yau yog Khenta, Anpe‑ee, Mixa,
Misama, Ntuma, Maxas,
Hanta, Thema, Yethu, Nafi hab Khentema.
Cov nuav yog Yisama‑ee cov tub hab nuav yog puab tej npe kws hu rua puab tej zej zog hab hu rua puab tej chaw nyob, yog kaum ob tug thawj rua huv puab txhua xeem.
Yisama‑ee le noob nyoog huvsw muaj ib puas peb caug xyaa xyoo. Nwg tu sav moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob.
Puab cov ntawd nyob txwj ndua lub moos Havila moog txug lub moos Su kws nyob ntawm Iyi ib saab moog rua Axilia tebchaws. Puab nrug puab cum nyob ua yeeb ncuab rua puab cov kwvtij.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Yiha kws yog Aplahaa tug tub caaj ceg. Aplahaa yog Yiha txwv.
Yiha noob nyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo nwg le yuav tau Lenpekha ua quaspuj, yog Npethu‑ee tug ntxhais kws yog tuabneeg Alaa nyob tebchaws Panta Alaa, hab yog Lanpaa kws yog tuabneeg Alaa tug muam.
Yiha thov Yawmsaub rua nwg tug quaspuj vem yog nwg tsw xeeb tub. Yawmsaub pub lawv le nwg thov, nwg tug quaspuj Lenpekha txhad xeeb tub.
Mivnyuas kuj sws txwv huv nwg lub plaab nwg txhad has tas, “Yog zoo le nuav, kuv yuav muaj txujsa nyob ua daabtsw?” Lenpekha txhad moog ua nug rua Yawmsaub.
Yawmsaub has rua nwg tas, “Muaj ob lub tebchaws nyob huv koj lub plaab, ob haiv tuabneeg kws koj yug hov yuav sws ncaim, ib tug yuav muaj zug heev dua ib tug, tug tij yuav ua tug kwv qhev.”
Thaus txug caij kws Lenpekha yug mivnyuas lawm, ua cav muaj ib nkawm mivnyuas ntxaib huv nwg lub plaab.
Yug thawj tug lug yog ib tug mivnyuas lab tawv tuaj plaub thoob plawg ib ce yaam nkaus le lub tsho plaub. Puab txhad tis lub npe hu ua Exau.
Dhau ntawd yug tug kwv lug, nwg txhais teg tuav rawv Exau lauj taw. Puab txhad tis npe hu ua Yakhauj.  Thaus Lenpekha yug nkawm mivnyuas ntxaib hov, Yiha noob nyoog muaj rau caum xyoo.
Thaus ob tug mivtub hlub lawm, Exau yog ib tug txawj tua nqaj hab yog ib tug nyob nruab nraag xwb, tassws Yakhauj mas yog tug kws nyob huv tsev ntau ua sab tug quas yeeg.
Yiha nyam Exau vem nwg pheej tau noj tej nqaj qus kws Exau tua tau lug. Tassws Lenpekha nyam Yakhauj.
Muaj ib nub thaus Yakhauj saamswm hau zaub, Exau rov tom haav zoov lug tshaib plaab heev.
Exau has rua Yakhauj tas, “Thov ca kuv noj cov taum lab hov ib txha tsua qhov kuv tshaib plaab heev.” (Vem le hov txhad muab nwg hu ua Entoo. )
Yakhauj has tas, “Muab koj feem kws ua tij muag rua kuv ua ntej tsaiv.”
Exau txawm has tas, “Kuv tub yuav tuag, feem kws ua tij yuav muaj qaabhau daabtsw rua kuv?”
Yakhauj txawm has tas, “Cog lug twv ca tsaiv.” Exau txawm cog lug twv ca hab muab nwg feem kws ua tij muag rua Yakhauj.
Yakhauj txhad muab ncuav hab cov taum lab kws hau tau lawm rua Exau noj. Thaus Exau noj hab haus taag tes nwg sawv taug kev lawm. Ua le nuav yog Exau saib tsw taug nwg feem kws ua tij.

Tom qaab nuav tebchaws Khana‑aa rov raug kev tshaib plaab, ib yaam le tam kws thau Aplahaa tseed ua neej nyob, mas Yiha txhad tswv moog cuag cov Filixatee tug vaajntxwv Anpimelej nraag lub moos Kelas.
Yawmsaub txhad tshwm lug rua Yiha pum hab has tas, “Tsw xob moog nyob nraag Iyi tebchaws, ca le nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv qha rua koj xwb.

Nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav ib ntus xwb, kuv txhad le nrug koj nyob hab foom koob moov rua koj. Kuv yuav muab tej tebchaws nuav huvsw pub rua koj hab koj caaj ceg. Kuv yuav ua kuas tej lug kws kuv tub cog tseg ruaj rua koj txwv Aplahaa lawd tav huvsw.

Kuv yuav ua rua koj caaj ceg fuam vaam coob yaam le cov nub qub sau nruab ntug hab yuav muab tej tebchaws nuav huvsw pub rua puab. Ib tsoom tebchaws huv lub nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm koj caaj ceg lug
vem yog Aplahaa noog kuv lug hab ua lawv le kuv has hab tuav rawv kuv tej lug nkaw hab kuv tej kaab ke hab kuv tej kevcai huvsw.”
Yiha txhad nyob ntawm Kelas.

Thaus cov txwvneej huv lub moos hov nug txug nwg tug quaspuj nwg txawm teb puab tas, “Yog kuv le muam xwb,” tsua qhov nwg ntshai, nwg tsw kaam leeg tas “Yog kuv quaspuj.” Nwg xaav tas tsaam cov txwvneej hov tsua muab nwg tua vem yog puab xaav yuav Lenpekha tsua qhov nwg zoo nkauj kawg le.
Thaus Yiha nyob hov ntawd tau ntev loo mas cov Filixatee tug vaajntxwv Anpimelej xauj qhov rais pum Yiha tawb tawb Lenpekha kws yog nwg quaspuj.

Tes Anpimelej txawm hu Yiha tuaj cuag nwg hab has tas, “Lenpekha tub yog koj le quaspuj nev, ua caag koj daag has tas, yog koj le muam nua?” Yiha teb vaajntxwv has tas, “Tsua qhov kuv xaav tas tsaam luas tsua muab kuv tua vem xaav yuav nwg.”
Anpimelej txawm has tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav rua peb 'os? Tsaam muaj ib tug twg tsua nkaag hlo moog nrug koj quaspuj pw tes kuj yog koj coj txem lug rua peb.”
Anpimelej txhad has tawv rua cov pejxeem suavdawg tas, “Yog leejtwg ua le caag rua tug yawm nuav hab nwg tug quaspuj mas yuav raug muab tua pov tseg xwb.”
Yiha cog qoob cog loos huv tebchaws hov mas xyoo hov nwg sau tej qoob tau ib puas npaug lug, vem yog Yawmsaub foom koob foom moov rua nwg.
Yiha muaj txag vaam meej zuj zug caj tuam lospaav nplua nuj heev.
Nwg muaj tej nam paab tshws tej paab yaaj tej paab nyuj hab muaj tub maab tub qhe coob mas cov Filixatee khib sab heev rua nwg.
Cov Filixatee tub muab aav txhub txhua lub qhov dej kws thau u nwg txwv Aplahaa tseed ua neej nyob es Aplahaa tej tub qhe khawb ca lawd huvsw.
Anpimelej txawm has rua Yiha tas, “Koj ca le tswv ntawm peb moog vem koj muaj zug dua peb lawm.”
Yiha txhad tawm qhov ntawd tswv moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm lub haav Kelas tes nwg txawm nyob ntawd.

Yiha txhad muab tej qub qhov dej kws thau u nwg txwv Aplahaa tseed ua neej nyob es khawb ca lawd khawb dua, vem yog thaus Aplahaa tuag lawd cov Filixatee muab tej qhov dej hov txhub taag lawm. Mas Yiha txhad tis npe rua tej qhov dej hov lawv le kws thau nwg txwv tub tis ca lawd.
Thaus Yiha cov tub qhe khawb ntawm haav Kelas mas khawb tau ib lub qhov dej txhawv zoo heev.

Tassws cov tuabneeg Kelas kws yug tsaj txawm nrug Yiha cov tub qhe yug tsaj sws caav has tas, “Lub qhov dej yog peb le huas.” Yiha txhad tis npe rua lub qhov dej hov hu ua Exe  vem puab nrug nwg sws caav.
Puab rov khawb dua ib lub qhov dej mas cov Kelas kuj nrug puab sws caav txug lub qhov dej hov hab. Yiha txhad tis npe rua lub qhov dej hov hu ua Xina.

Nwg kuj tswv tawm qhov ntawd moog khawb dua ib lub qhov dej mas tsw muaj tuabneeg sws caav txug lub qhov dej hov, nwg txhad tis npe rua lub qhov dej hov hu ua Lehaunpau,  mas nwg has tas, “Nwgnuav Yawmsaub pub chaw rua peb nyob lawm mas peb yuav vaam meej rua huv lub tebchaws nuav lauj.”
Yiha kuj tawm qhov ntawd moog rua peg Npe‑awsenpa.

Mo hov Yawmsaub tshwm lug rua Yiha pum hab has rua nwg tas, “Kuv yog koj txwv Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv, koj tsw xob ntshai tsua qhov kuv yeej nrug nraim koj nyob hab kuv yuav foom koob moov rua koj hab kuv yuav ua rua koj caaj ceg fuam vaam coob vem yog kuv saib rua kuv tug tub qhe Aplahaa.”
Yiha txawm tib ib lub thaaj rua hov ntawd hab nwg tuav Yawmsaub lub npe thov Yawmsaub. Nwg tsaa tsev ntaub nyob hov ntawd hab nwg cov tub qhe kuj khawb dua ib lub qhov dej rua ntawd hab.
Anpimelej hab nwg tug tim xyoob Ahuxa hab nwg tug thawj rog Fikhau txawm tawm huv Kelas tuaj tshaam Yiha.
Yiha nug puab has tas, “Ua caag mej tsua yuav tuaj tshaam kuv? Mej tub ntxub ntxub kuv es muab kuv ntab tswv tawm moog nev?”
Puab teb has tas, “Peb pum tseeb tas Yawmsaub nrug nraim koj nyob peb txhad has tas, Ca peb hab koj sws cog lug twv tseg hab nrug koj cog lug sws raug zoo has tas

koj yuav tsw ua phem le caag rua peb yaam le kws peb tub tsw ua ib nyuag qhov phem rua koj le, peb tsuas yog ua zoo rua koj xwb hab peb xaa koj moog zoo tso sab quas lug. Nwgnuav Yawmsaub tub foom koob moov rua koj lawm.”
Tes Yiha txawm paam ib tsum mov lug rua puab mas puab txhad noj txhad haus.
Taagkig tom qaab puab sawv ntxuv ntxuv lug sws cog lug twv tseg taag Yiha le xaa puab moog, puab txhad moog ua tso sab quas lug.
Tuab nub hov Yiha cov tub qhe lug has rua nwg txug lub qhov dej kws puab khawb tau lawm has tas, “Peb ntswb dej lawm.”
Yiha muab lub qhov dej hov tis npe hu ua Sinpa,  mas txhad hu lub moos hov ua Npe‑awsenpa  txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Thaus Exau noob nyoog muaj plaub caug xyoo nwg yuav Npe‑awli kws yog tuabneeg Hithai tug ntxhais Yunti ua quaspuj, hab nwg yuav Eloo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai tug ntxhais Npaxema ua quaspuj.
Cov nyaab nuav ua rua Yiha hab Lenpekha ob tug lub neej nyuaj sab kawg le.
Thaus Yiha laug lawm qhov muag plooj tsw pum kev lawm, nwg txhad hu nwg tug tub hlub Exau has tas, “Tub 'e.” Exau teb tas, “Kuv nyob nuav 'os.”
Yiha has tas, “Nwgnuav kuv laug laug le lawm. Kuv tsw paub nub kws kuv yuav tuag.
Koj ca le coj koj tej cuab yeej moog, coj koj raaj xub hab raab neev tawm moog yos haav zoov tua nqaj lug rua kuv.
Ca le npaaj ib pluag qaab qaab lug rua kuv yaam le kuv nyam hab coj lug rua kuv noj, kuv txhad foom koob moov rua koj ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau tuag.”
Thaus Yiha has tej lug hov rua nwg tug tub Exau, Lenpekha kuj noog tuabywv hab. Thaus Exau tawm moog tua nqaj tom haav zoov lawm,
Lenpekha txawm has rua nwg tug tub Yakhauj tas, “Kuv nov koj txwv has rua koj tug tijlaug Exau tas,
‘Ca le coj nqaj qus lug rua kuv hab npaaj ib pluag qaab qaab rua kuv noj, kuv txhad foom koob moov rua koj taab meeg Yawmsaub lub xubndag ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau tuag.’
Vem le nuav, kuv tub, koj ca le ua lawv nraim le kws kuv has rua koj.
Ca le moog tom paab tshws nteg ob tug mivnyuas tshws zoo zoo lug rua kuv, kuv txhad npaaj tau tej zaub mov qaab yaam le koj txwv nyam rua nwg.
Tes koj nqaa moog rua koj txwv noj nwg txhad foom koob moov rua koj ua ntej kws nwg tsw tau tuag.”
Yakhauj txhad has rua nwg nam Lenpekha tas, “Koj swm saib maj, kuv tug tijlaug Exau tuaj plaub thoob plawg ib ce, tassws kuv mas ib ce du lug xwb.
Tsaam tes kuv txwv cev teg xuas kuv, mas yuav zoo le kuv daag ntxag nwg, tes nwg yuav foom tsw zoo rua kuv tsw yog foom zoo.”
Nwg nam has rua nwg tas, “Tub 'e, ca qhov kws raug foom tsw zoo poob rua kuv rws. Tsuav yog koj ua lawv le kuv has hab moog nteg mivnyuas tshws lug rua kuv xwb.”
Yakhauj txawm moog nteg coj lug rua nwg nam, nwg nam txhad npaaj tej zaub mov qaab yaam le nwg txwv nyam.
Tes Lenpekha txawm muab nwg tug tub hlub Exau tej tsoog tsho kws zoo kawg huv tsev pub rua nwg tug tub yau Yakhauj naav.
Nwg muab ob tug mivnyuas tshws hov le tawv lug qhwv Yakhauj teg hab lub cej daab kws du quas lug.
Tes nwg txawm muab tej zaub mov qaab qaab hab ncuav kws nwg npaaj ntawd rua huv nwg tug tub Yakhauj txhais teg.
Yakhauj txhad nkaag moog rua leej txwv hab has tas, “Kuv txwv.” Nwg has tas, “Tub 'e, kuv nyob ntawm nuav, koj yog leejtwg?”
Yakhauj has rua leej txwv tas, “Kuv yog koj tug tub hlub Exau. Kuv tub ua lawv le kws koj has rua kuv lawm. Ca le sawv lug noj tej nqaj kws kuv moog tua tau lug es koj foom koob moov rua kuv.”
Yiha has rua nwg tug tub tas, “Tub 'e, ua caag koj nrhav tau sai ua luaj?” Nwg teb tas, “Vem yog Yawmsaub kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv pub kuv tua tau.”
Mas Yiha has rua Yakhauj tas, “Tub 'e, txaav lug ze ze mas kuv yuav xuas koj sub txhad paub tas koj yog kuv tug tub Exau tag los tsw yog.”
Yakhauj txawm txaav moog ze nwg txwv Yiha. Yiha txhad xuas nwg lub cev hab has tas, “Lub suab yog Yakhauj tassws txhais teg yog Exau le.”
Nwg tsw paub Yakhauj lawm vem ob txhais teg muaj plaub yaam nkaus le nwg tug tijlaug Exau txhais teg. Nwg txhad foom koob moov rua Yakhauj.
Nwg nug tas, “Koj yog kuv tug tub Exau tag lov?” Nwg teb tas, “Yog lauj.”

Leej txwv txhad has tas, “Koj coj zaub mov lug rua kuv, kuv yuav noj tej nqaj kws kuv tug tub tua tau lug hab foom koob moov rua koj.” Yakhauj txhad coj lug rua nwg, nwg txhad noj. Yakhauj coj cawv txwv maab rua nwg, nwg kuj haus.
Mas nwg txwv Yiha txhad has rua nwg tas, “Tub 'e, txaav lug ze hab nwj kuv.”

Nwg txhad txaav lug ze hab nwj leej txwv. Leej txwv na tug ntxhab ntawm nwg lub tsho hab foom koob moov rua nwg, hab has tas, “Saib maj, kuv tub tug ntxhab yog tej ntxhab nruab laj nruab teb kws Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua.
Thov Vaajtswv pub dej lwg sau ntuj lug rua koj, hab pub lub nplajteb zoo qoob nplua quas mag, hab pub qoob loos cawv txwv maab ntau kawg rua koj.

Thov kuas ib tsoom tuabneeg ua koom rua koj, hab ib tsoom tebchaws pe koj. Ca koj ua tug kaav koj cov kwvtij, ca koj nam tej tub pe koj. Thov kuas txhua tug kws foom tsw zoo rua koj raug foom tsw zoo, hab ca txhua tug kws foom koob moov rua koj tau moov zoo.”
Thaus Yiha foom koob moov rua Yakhauj taag lawm hab Yakhauj nyav tawm plawg ntawm nwg txwv xubndag moog lawm, nwg tug tijlaug Exau kuj tua tau nqaj rov lug txug.
Nwg kuj npaaj zaub mov qaab qaab coj lug rua nwg txwv, hab nwg has rua leej txwv tas, “Thov txwv sawv lug noj tej nqaj kws koj tug tub moog tua tau lug, es foom koob moov rua kuv.”
Nwg txwv Yiha has rua nwg tas, “Koj yog leejtwg?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv yog koj tug tub, yog koj tug tub hlub Exau.”

Mas Yiha ib ce tshee quas nyo has tas, “Es leejtwg moog tua nqaj coj lug rua kuv nua? Kuv nyav noj taag nrho es koj lug txug nuav, hab kuv tub foom koob moov rua nwg lawm lauj. Nwg yuav tau koob moov tag tag le.”
Thaus Exau nov nwg txwv tej lug hov, nwg ca le quaj nrov nrov tu sab kawg, hab has rua leej txwv tas, “Txwv 'e, thov foom koob moov rua kuv, thov foom koob moov rua kuv hab.”
Tassws leej txwv has tas, “Koj tug kwv kws lub sab daag tuaj hab nwg tub coj koj le koob moov moog taag lawm.”

Exau has tas, “Nwg lub npe Yakhauj tub hu raug lawm los tsw yog?  tsua qhov nwg tub daag kuv ob zag lawm. Nwg tub muab kuv le feem ua tij txeeb moog lawm, mas zag nuav nwg tseed txeeb txhaav kuv le koob moov lawm hab.” Hab nwg has tas, “Koj tsw tseg ib txha koob moov rua kuv le lov?”

Yiha teb Exau tas, “Kuv tsaa nwg ua tug kws kaav koj hab muab nwg cov kwvtij suavdawg ua koom rua nwg, hab muab tej qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab yug nwg lawm. Tub 'e, kuv yuav ua le caag rua koj lawm?”
Exau has rua leej txwv tas, “Txwv, koj muaj tuab yaam koob moov nuav xwb lov? Txwv 'e, thov foom koob moov rua kuv, thov foom koob moov rua kuv hab.” Tes Exau txawm tsaa suab hlo quaj.
Nwg txwv Yiha txhad teb nwg tas, “Koj yuav nyob deb ntawm tej qoob loos kws zoo nplua mag huv lub nplajteb hab deb ntawm tej dej lwg sau ntuj.
Koj yuav tuav rawv ntaaj ua neej nyob, hab koj yuav ua koom rua koj tug kwv, tassws thaus koj nti dim tau koj yuav muab nwg tug quab ntawm koj caaj qwb luv tseg.”

Exau ntxub Yakhauj vem yog leej txwv foom koob moov rua Yakhauj, mas Exau has quas tawg huv lub sab tas, “Tub yuav txug nub kws kuv txwv taag swm neej, mas nub ntawd kuv yuav muab kuv tug kwv Yakhauj tua pov tseg.”

Tassws tug tub hlub Exau tej lug hov nrov moog txug Lenpekha qhov ntsej, nwg txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog hu nwg tug tub yau Yakhauj lug, mas has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj swm xaav saib, koj tug tijlaug Exau npaaj sab yuav muab koj tua pov tseg txhad zoo nwg lub sab.
Vem le nuav, tub 'e, ca le noog kuv has. Ca le tswv moog cuag kuv tug nug Lanpaa huv lub moos Halaa,
hab nrug nwg nyob ib ntus moog txug thaus koj tug tijlaug lub sab npau nqeg tsaiv,

moog txug thaus koj tug tijlaug txujkev chim nqeg hab nwg nov qaab tej kws koj tau ua rua nwg tsaiv, tes kuv le tso tuabneeg tuaj coj koj rov qaab hov ntawd lug. Ua caag kuv yuav ca meb ob leeg pluj ua ib nub ntawm kuv?”

Lenpekha txhad has rua Yiha tas, “Kuv dhuav cov puj Hithai, tsw xaav ua neej nyob lawm. Yog Yakhauj tseed yuav cov ntxhais Hithai zoo le cov quaspuj huv lub tebchaws nuav ua quaspuj, tes kuv txujsa yuav muaj qaabhau daabtsw rua kuv?”
Yiha txawm hu Yakhauj lug foom koob moov hab nkaw lug rua nwg tas, “Koj tsw xob yuav cov ntxhais Khana‑aa ua quaspuj.
Ca le sawv kev moog rua tebchaws Panta Alaa, moog rua Npethu‑ee lub tsev, kws yog koj nam leej txwv, hab yuav koj nam tug nug Lanpaa ib tug ntxhais hov ntawd ua quaspuj.
Thov Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus  foom koob moov hab pub kuas koj muaj tub ki hab fuam vaam coob ua tau ib haiv tuabneeg coob heev.

Thov Vaajtswv pub tej koob moov kws foom rua Aplahaa lawm rua koj hab koj tej tub ki xeeb ntxwv sub koj txhad tau lub tebchaws kws koj ua qhua nyob nuav ua koj tug, yog lub tebchaws kws Vaajtswv pub rua Aplahaa.”
Yiha kuas Yakhauj moog le nuav, nwg txhad moog rua Panta Alaa moog cuag nwg tug txwv daab Lanpaa kws yog Npethu‑ee tug tub, yog Yakhauj hab Exau ob tug nam Lenpekha tug nug kws yog tuabneeg Alaa.

Exau pum tas Yiha foom koob moov rua Yakhauj hab kuas Yakhauj moog nrhav quaspuj rua Panta Alaa tebchaws, hab thaus Yiha foom koob moov rua Yakhauj hov nwg nkaw lug has tas, “Tsw xob yuav cov ntxhais Khana‑aa ua quaspuj,”
hab Yakhauj noog nwg nam nwg txwv lug hab moog rua Panta Alaa tebchaws lawm.
Thaus Exau pum tas nwg txwv Yiha tsw txaus sab rua cov quaspuj Khana‑aa,
tes nwg txawm moog cuag Yisama‑ee kws yog Aplahaa tug tub, hab yuav Yisama‑ee tug ntxhais Mahala kws yog Nenpayau tug muam ua nam yau.
Yakhauj tawm ntawm Npe‑awsenpa yuav moog rua lub moos Halaa,
nwg moog txug ib qho chaw tes txawm su hov ntawd ib mos vem nub poob qho lawm. Nwg muab ib lub pob zeb hov ntawd lug rau ncoo pw qhov chaw ntawd.
Mas nwg ua npau suav pum ib tug ntaiv tuam huv nplajteb, lub hauv ntaiv nto plawg sau ntuj. Na cav Vaajtswv cov tubkhai ntuj saamswm nce nce nqeg nqeg tug ntaiv hov.

Yawmsaub sawv ntsug dhau sau lub hauv ntaiv  hab has tas, “Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog koj yawm Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv hab yog Yiha tug Vaajtswv. Thaaj chaw kws koj pw nuav kuv yuav muab rua koj hab koj caaj ceg.

Koj caaj ceg yuav coob yaam le tej moov aav sau lub nplajteb, hab koj yuav nthuav daav rua saab nub poob saab nub tuaj saab peg saab nraag, ib tsoom tuabneeg huv nplajteb yuav tau koob moov ntawm koj hab koj caaj ceg lug.

Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj hab kuv yuav tsom kwm koj rua txhua txujkev kws koj moog hab yuav coj koj rov qaab lug rua lub tebchaws nuav, vem kuv yuav tsw tso koj tseg moog txug thaus kuv tau ua tej kws kuv has ca rua koj nuav lawm.”
Yakhauj tswm lug mas has tas, “Yawmsaub yeej nyob ntawm nuav tag tag le, yog kuv tsw paub xwb.”
Nwg ntshai hab has tas, “Lub chaw nuav txaus ntshai heev kawg le lauj! Lub chaw nuav yeej yog Vaajtswv lub tsev hab yog lub rooj ntug ceeb tsheej.”
Yakhauj txhad sawv ntxuv tseeg muab lub pob zeb kws nwg rau ncoo txhus ua ib tug ncej hab laub roj aulib rua sau lub hauv ncej zeb ntawd.
Nwg hu lub chaw ntawd ua Npe‑ee.  Yaav tom ntej lub moos ntawd hu ua Lu.
Yakhauj yeem lug tseg tas, “Yog Vaajtswv nrug nraim kuv hab yuav tsom kwm kuv rua txujkev kws kuv moog nuav, hab pub zaub mov rua kuv noj hab pub rwg tsho rua kuv naav,
sub kuv txhad rov lug txug kuv txwv lub tsev kaaj sab quas lug, mas Yawmsaub yuav yog kuv tug Vaajtswv.
Hab lub pob zeb kws kuv muab txhus ua ib tug ncej ca nuav yuav ua Vaajtswv lub tsev. Hab txhua yaam kws koj pub rua kuv, kuv yuav muab ib feem huv kaum pub rov rua koj.”
Yakhauj txawm taug kev moog txug cov tuabneeg saab nub tuaj lub tebchaws.

Thaus nwg tsaa muag mas pum ib lub qhov dej nyob huv ib daim teb, muaj peb paab yaaj pw ib ncig ntawm lub qhov dej hov, vem yog tej paab yaaj txeev haus dej ntawm lub qhov hov. Txhwb zeb kws npug lub qhov dej ntawd kuj luj.
Thaus cov paab yaaj lug txhwj lawm, cov tuabneeg yug yaaj le muab txhwb zeb hov dov ntawm lub qhov dej hab ntaus dej rua tej yaaj haus taag le muab txhwb zeb npug lub qhov dej le qub ca.
Yakhauj has rua puab tas, “Cov kwvtij, mej tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Puab teb tas, “Peb tuaj lub moos Halaa tuaj.”
Yakhauj txhad nug puab tas, “Mej paub Lanpaa kws yog Nahau tug tub los tsw paub?” Puab teb tas, “Paub hab.”
Yakhauj has rua puab tas, “Lanpaa nyob zoo lov?” Puab teb tas, “Nwg nyob zoo hab sas. Ntawm nej, nwg tug ntxhais Lachee saamswm lawv paab yaaj lug.”
Yakhauj txhad has tas, “Swjhawm nuav tseed ntxuv tsw tau txug caij kws coj tej yaaj lug ua ke. Ca le ntaus dej rua cov yaaj haus hab coj moog noj zaub.”
Tassws puab teb tas, “Tsw tau, peb yuav tog txug thaus txhua paab yaaj lug txhwj tsaiv le muab txhwb zeb kws npug lub qhov dej dov tawm es peb le ntaus dej rua cov yaaj haus.”
Thaus Yakhauj tseed nrug puab has lug hov, Lachee kuj lawv nwg txwv paab yaaj lug txug vem yog nwg yug paab yaaj ntawd.

Thaus Yakhauj pum dheev Lachee kws yog nwg nam tug nug Lanpaa tug ntxhais hab pum nwg nam tug nug Lanpaa cov yaaj, nwg txawm moog muab txhwb zeb kws npug lub qhov dej dov tawm hab ntaus dej rua nwg nam tug nug Lanpaa paab yaaj haus.
Yakhauj txhad nwj Lachee hab quaj quaj.
Hab Yakhauj has rua Lachee tas nwg yog Lachee txwv le txheeb ze, nwg yog Lenpekha tug tub. Tes Lachee txawm dha moog has rua nwg txwv paub.
Thaus Lanpaa nov txug nwg tug muam tug tub Yakhauj, nwg txawm dha moog puag nwj hab coj Yakhauj lug rua huv nwg lub tsev. Yakhauj pav txhua yaam huvsw rua Lanpaa noog.
Mas Lanpaa has rua nwg tas, “Koj yeej yog kuv caaj ceg tag tag le.” Yakhauj txhad nrug nwg nyob tau ib lub hlis.
Lanpaa has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj txheeb ze kuv tag tag le, tsw tswm nyog ca koj ua kuv le num dawb dawb xwb. Ca le has rua kuv paub saib koj yuav nqe zug le caag?”
Lanpaa muaj ob tug ntxhais, tug hlub hu ua Le‑a, tug yau hu ua Lachee.
Le‑a lub qhov muag tsw cus pes tsawg, tassws Lachee mas lub cev ntaaj ntsug zoo nkauj heev.
Yakhauj nyam Lachee, nwg txhad has rua Lanpaa tas, “Kuv yuav ua koj zug xyaa xyoo es yuav Lachee kws yog koj tug ntxhais yau ua quaspuj.”
Lanpaa has tas, “Ca kuv muab kuv tug ntxhais qua rua koj zoo dua le muab qua rua lwm tug. Koj ca le nrug kuv nyob lauj.”
Yakhauj txhad ua xyaa xyoo zug kuas tau Lachee, nwg saib mas yaam le ob peb nub xwb vem nwg nyam Lachee heev.
Yakhauj txhad has rua Lanpaa tas, “Thov muab quaspuj rua kuv kuv txhad tau nrug nwg pw ua ke vem kuv tub ua num puv rua koj lawm.”
Lanpaa txhad hu kwvtij zej zog tuaj noj tshoob.
Thaus tsaus ntuj Lanpaa muab nwg tug ntxhais Le‑a coj lug rua Yakhauj, Yakhauj kuj nrug nwg pw.
Lanpaa muab nwg tug nkauj qhev Xilapa pub ua nwg tug ntxhais Le‑a le nkauj qhev.
Thaus kaaj ntug Yakhauj pum na cav yog Le‑a, nwg txhad has rua Lanpaa tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav rua kuv? Kuv ua koj zug yuav Lachee los tsw yog? Ua caag koj daag kuv le nuav?”
Lanpaa teb tas, “Huv peb lub tebchaws nuav tsw muaj kevcai kws yuav muab tug nam hluas qua ua tug tais laug ntej.
Ca koj yuav tug nuav puv xyaa nub tsaiv peb le muab tug ntawd qua rua koj es koj rov ua zug rua kuv xyaa xyoo ntxwv hab.”
Yakhauj ua le ntawd hab nwg nrug Le‑a nyob kuas puv xyaa nub. Tes Lanpaa le muab nwg tug ntxhais Lachee qua rua Yakhauj yuav.
Lanpaa muab nwg tug nkauj qhev Npiha pub ua nwg tug ntxhais Lachee le nkauj qhev.
Yakhauj txhad moog nrug Lachee pw. Nwg nyam Lachee heev dua Le‑a, hab nwg ua xyaa xyoo zug ntxwv rua Lanpaa.
Thaus Yawmsaub pum tas Yakhauj ntxub Le‑a, Yawmsaub txhad le qheb Le‑a lub plaab mivnyuas. Tassws Lachee xeeb tsw taug mivnyuas.

Le‑a xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub, nwg tis npe hu ua Lunpee  tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Vem yog Yawmsaub tsaa muag saib kuv txujkev txom nyem nyuaj sab. Nwgnuav kuv tug quasyawg yeej yuav nyam kuv tag tag le.”
Le‑a rov xeeb tub hab yug tau dua ib tug tub, hab has tas, “Vem yog Yawmsaub nov tas kuv raug ntxub, nwg txhad muab tug tub nuav rua kuv hab.” Vem le nuav nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Xime‑oo.
Nwg rov xeeb tub hab yug tau dua ib tug tub hab has tas, “Zag nuav kuv tug quasyawg yuav npuab hlo kuv vem kuv yug peb tug tub rua nwg lawm.” Vem le nuav txhad muab hu ua Levi.
Nwg rov qaab xeeb tub hab yug tau dua ib tug tub hab has tas, “Zag nuav kuv yuav qhuas Yawmsaub.” Vem le nuav nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Yuta.  Tes nwg txawm tseg tsw muaj mivnyuas lawm.
Thaus Lachee pum tas nwg tsw muaj mivnyuas yug rua Yakhauj, nwg kuj khib nwg tug tais laug. Nwg txhad has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj ca le muab mivnyuas rua kuv, yog tsw tau kuv yuav tuag.”
Yakhauj chim rua Lachee txhad has tas, “Kuv nyob Vaajtswv chaw lov? Vaajtswv yog tug kws tsw pub koj xeeb tub.”
Lachee txhad has tas, “Kuv tug nkauj qhev Npiha nyob nuav. Koj ca le moog nrug nwg pw, nwg txhad yug tau mivnyuas rua huv kuv lub xubndag, kuv txhad le tau mivnyuas hov ntawm nwg lug.”
Lachee txhad muab nwg tug nkauj qhev Npiha rua Yakhauj yuav ua quaspuj, hab Yakhauj moog nrug nwg pw.
Npiha txawm xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Mas Lachee has tas, “Vaajtswv tsaa kuv cai hab nov kuv lub suab thov hab pub ib tug tub rua kuv.” Vem le nuav nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Ntaaj.
Npiha kws yog Lachee tug nkauj qhev rov xeeb tub hab yug tau dua ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Lachee txhad has tas, “Kuv nrug tug tais laug sws ntsuag zug heev hab kuv kov yeej lawm.” Vem le nuav nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Nathali.
Thaus Le‑a pum tas nwg tseg tsw muaj mivnyuas lawm, nwg txawm muab nwg tug nkauj qhev Xilapa rua Yakhauj yuav ua quaspuj.
Xilapa kws yog Le‑a tug nkauj qhev yug tau ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Le‑a txhad has tas, “Kuv tau moov zoo.” Vem le nuav nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Kas.
Xilapa kws yog Le‑a tug nkauj qhev rov yug dua ib tug tub rua Yakhauj.
Le‑a kuj has tas, “Kuv zoo sab lawm lauj. Tsua qhov tej quaspuj yuav hu kuv tas tug kws zoo sab.” Nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Asaw.
Thaus lub caij hlais mog Lunpee moog tom teb txhad de tau cov lwg ntunta‑i  lug muab rua nwg nam Le‑a. Lachee txawm has rua Le‑a tas, “Thov muab koj tug tub cov lwg ntunta‑i ib txha rua kuv hab.”

Le‑a teb tas, “Koj tub txeeb kuv tug quasyawg moog lawm yog ib qho miv miv xwb lov? Koj tseed yuav lws kuv tug tub cov lwg ntunta‑i hab lov?” Lachee teb tas, “Mo nuav kuv yuav ca kuv tug quasyawg nrug koj pw pauj koj tug tub cov lwg ntunta‑i.”

Thaus tsaus ntuj Yakhauj rov tom teb lug, Le‑a txawm moog tog nwg hab has tas, “Koj yuav tsum nrug kuv pw, tsua qhov kuv tub muab kuv tug tub cov lwg ntunta‑i ndav koj mo nuav lawm.” Mo hov Yakhauj txhad nrug nwg pw.
Vaajtswv nov Le‑a tej lug, nwg txhad xeeb tub hab yug tau tug tub kws tswb rua Yakhauj.
Le‑a has tas, “Vaajtswv pub cov nqe ndav hov rua kuv vem kuv tub muab kuv tug nkauj qhev rua kuv tug quasyawg lawm.” Nwg txhad tis tug tub hov lub npe hu ua Ixakha.
Le‑a rov xeeb dua tub hab yug tau tug tub kws rau rua Yakhauj.
Mas Le‑a has tas, “Vaajtswv tub pub yaam kws zoo rua kuv lawm. Nwgnuav kuv tug quasyawg yuav saib taug kuv vem kuv yug tau rau tug tub rua nwg lawm.” Nwg txhad tis npe hu ua Xenpuloo.
Dhau ntawd Le‑a yug tau ib tug ntxhais muab tis npe hu ua Ntina.
Vaajtswv ncu txug Lachee hab nov nwg tej lug thov hab qheb nwg lub plaab mivnyuas.
Nwg txhad xeeb tub hab yug tau ib tug tub hab has tas, “Vaajtswv tub daws kuv txujkev txaaj muag lawm.”
Nwg txhad tis tug tub hov lub npe hu ua Yauxej,  nwg has tas “Thov Yawmsaub tsaav dua ib tug tub rua kuv hab.”
Thaus Lachee yug Yauxej lawm, Yakhauj txawm has rua Lanpaa tas, “Thov tso kuv moog kuv txhad rov moog txug kuv qub teb qub chaw.
Thov muab kuv cov quaspuj mivnyuas rua kuv, kuv tub ua zug them rua koj lawm, thov tso kuv moog, tsua qhov koj tub paub tej num kws kuv tau ua rua koj lawm.”
Tassws Lanpaa has rua nwg tas, “Thov ca kuv has ib lu lug rua koj le nuav. Kuv saib yaig saib swj mas paub tas Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua kuv vem yog muaj koj.
Koj ca le xaam nqe zug es kuv yuav muab rua koj.”
Yakhauj has rua nwg tas, “Kuv ua num rua koj le caag hab kuv saib koj tej tsaj zoo le caag, koj yeej paub lawm.

Thaus kuv tsw tau lug koj muaj tsawg, tassws nwgnuav tub fuam vaam coob kawg le. Kuv moog rua txujkev twg los Yawmsaub yeej foom koob moov rua koj. Tassws nwgnuav yuav thaus twg kuv le yug tau kuv tsev tuabneeg?”

Lanpaa txhad nug tas, “Kuv yuav muab daabtsw rua koj?” Yakhauj teb tas, “Koj tsw xob muab daabtsw rua kuv. Yog koj yeem ua le nuav rua kuv, kuv yuav yug hab tsom kwm koj paab yaaj paab tshws ntxwv moog.

Nub nua ca kuv moog thoob plawg koj paab yaaj paab tshws es rhu txhua tug yaaj kws txheeb hab txaij tej teev hab txhua tug mivnyuas yaaj kws dub, hab tej tshws kws txheeb hab txaij tej teev tawm rua ib qho. Tes muab tej tsaj nuav ua nqe zug rua kuv.

Kuv txujkev ncaaj yuav tshwm lug rua yaav tom qaab rua nub kws koj tuaj tshuaj tej kws muab ua nqe zug rua kuv. Yog koj ntswb tej tshws tug twg kws tsw txheeb hab tsw txaij tej teev hab tej mivnyuas yaaj tug twg kws tsw dub huv kuv paab, mas koj yuav suav tas yog kuv nyag lawm.”
Lanpaa txhad has tas, “Zoo lauj, yuav le kws koj has kod.”

Tassws nub hov Lanpaa kuj muab tej txwv tshws kws txaij tej kaab hab txaij tej teev hab txhua tug maum tshws kws txaij tej teev hab txheeb, yog tej tshws kws muaj tej teev dawb, hab txhua tug mivnyuas yaaj kws dub rhu tawm cob rua nwg cov tub yug.
Nwg txawm coj cov tsaj hov moog nrug deb ntawm Yakhauj peb nub ke. Mas Yakhauj yug Lanpaa tej paab yaaj paab tshws kws tseed tshuav.
Yakhauj txawm muab tej kaav ntoo nyoog kws yog ntoo cev hab ntoo txwv duaj deg hab ntoo seb lug laws tawv ua txaij tej kwb kaab pum dawb paug.
Nwg muab tej kaav ntoo kws nwg muab laws hov tso rua huv tej daab dej ntawm tej tsaj xubndag, yog lub chaw kws cov tsaj lug haus dej, vem tej tsaj pheej phuv rua thaus lug haus dej.
Tes cov yaaj cov tshws txawm phuv rua ntawm tej kaav ntoo txaij hov, tes txawm yug tau tej mivnyuas kws txaij tej kaab hab tej teev hab txheeb.

Yakhauj txhad muab tej mivnyuas yaaj hov cais tso rua ib qho, hab muab tej yaaj tej tshws saib ntsoov rua Lanpaa tej yaaj tej tshws kws txaij tej kaab hab dub. Nwg muab nwg cov tsaj tso rua ib qho, tsw xyaw Lanpaa cov tsaj.
Thaus cov tsaj kws zoo hab khov kho phuv Yakhauj kuj muab cov kaav ntoo txaij tso rua huv cov daab dej rua cov tsaj pum sub txhad le phuv ntawm cov kaav ntoo txaij hov.

Tassws nwg tsw muab cov kaav ntoo txaij hov tso rua tej tsaj kws tsw zoo tsw khov pum. Ua le nuav mas tej tsaj tsw zoo tsw khov txhad poob ua Lanpaa le lawm, tassws tej tsaj kws zoo hab khov yog Yakhauj le.
Ua le nuav Yakhauj txhad le nplua nuj tuaj, muaj tej nam paab yaaj paab tshws luj luj, hab muaj tub qhe nkauj qhev, muaj ntxhuav muaj neeg luav.
Yakhauj nov has tas Lanpaa cov tub ywg ywg tas, “Yakhauj txeeb peb txwv cuab txhaj cuab taam ib puas tsaav yaam taag lawm, hab tej kws nwg muaj hov puavleej yog tau peb txwv le xwb.”
Yakhauj pum tas Lanpaa tsw txaus sab rua nwg tsw thooj le yaav thau u lawm.
Yawmsaub txawm has rua Yakhauj tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog nyob koj tej laug lub tebchaws moog nrug koj kw koj tig nyob. Kuv yuav nrug nraim koj.”
Yakhauj txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Lachee hab Le‑a tuaj tom tshaav zaub kws nwg yug yaaj yug tshws.
Mas nwg has rua ob tug tas, “Kuv pum tas meb txwv tsw txaus sab rua kuv tsw thooj le yaav thau u lawm. Tassws kuv txwv tug Vaajtswv yeej nrug nraim kuv nyob.
Meb yeej paub tas kuv ua meb txwv le daag num kawg daag kawg zug le,
los meb txwv tseed ntxag kuv, txauv kuv nqe zug kaum zag lawm. Tassws Vaajtswv tsw kheev nwg ua tau ib yaam phem le caag rua kuv.

Txwv has tas tej tsaj kws txaij ua tej teev mas muab ua nqe zug rua kuv, tes txhua tug tsaj txawm xyaa mivnyuas txaij ua tej teev taag le. Txwv tsua has tas tej tsaj kws txaij ua tej kaab mas muab ua nqe zug rua kuv tes txhua tug tsaj txawm xyaa mivnyuas txaij ua tej kaab taag huvsw.
Tej nuav yeej yog Vaajtswv rhu koj txwv tej tsaj lug pub rua kuv ntaag.
Thaus lub caij kws tej tsaj txhu phuv kuv ua npau suav pum tas tej txwv tshws kws phuv paab tshws ntawd ib txha txaij ua tej kaab ib txha txaij ua tej teev ib txha txheeb.
Vaajtswv tug tubkhai txawm has rua kuv huv zaaj npau suav hov has tas, ‘Yakhauj.’ Kuv teb tas, ‘Hav, kuv nyob nuav 'os.’

Nwg has tas, ‘Tsaa muag saib txhua tug txwv tshws kws phuv paab tshws hov ib txha txaij ua tej kaab ib txha txaij ua tej teev hab ib txha txheeb, tsua qhov kuv tub pum txhua yaam kws Lanpaa ua rua koj lawm.

Kuv yog tug Vaajtswv ntawm Npe‑ee kws koj muab roj laub ywg tug ncej zeb txhus ca hab koj tau cog lug tseg rua kuv. Nwgnuav koj ca le sawv tseeg tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav rov qaab moog nyob rua lub tebchaws kws yug koj.’ ”
Lachee hab Le‑a ob tug teb tas, “Wb cav tsw muaj feem tau ib txwv tej qub txeeg qub teg.
Txwv kuj muab ib saib yaam le yog lwm haiv tuabneeg hab xwb hoj. Txwv tub muab ib muag hab muab ib nqe noj taag.
Ib puas tsaav yaam nplua mag kws Vaajtswv rhu ntawm txwv lug hov yeej yog peb le hab peb tej mivnyuas le. Nwgnuav Vaajtswv has kuas koj ua le caag kuj ua lawv le ntawd.”
Tes Yakhauj txawm sawv tseeg muab nwg tej quaspuj mivnyuas caij ntxhuav,

hab lawv nwg tej tsaj txhu huvsw ua nwg ntej moog, yog tej hov txhua chaw huvsw hab nwg tej tsaj txhu kws nwg tau huv lub tebchaws Panta Alaa rov qaab moog rua nwg txwv Yiha rua huv tebchaws Khana‑aa.
Lub swjhawm ntawd Lanpaa moog txav plaub yaaj lawm tes Lachee ca le nyag kag nwg txwv cov txoov daab kws teev huv tsev coj moog.
Yakhauj kuj daag Lanpaa kws yog tuabneeg Alaa, Yakhauj tsw qha rua Lanpaa paub tas nwg yuav tswv le.
Yakhauj txawm coj ib puas tsaav yaam hov txhua chaw taag nrho tswv moog hlaa tug dej Yufeti ncaaj nraim moog rua peg toj sab Kile‑a tebchaws.
Tub tau peb nub lawm le muaj tuabneeg moog has rua Lanpaa paub tas Yakhauj tswv lawm.
Lanpaa txhad coj kwvtij caum qaab tau xyaa nub le caum cuag Yakhauj peg tej toj roob Kile‑a tebchaws.

Mas thaus mo ntuj Vaajtswv lug has rua Lanpaa kws yog tuabneeg Alaa huv npau suav has tas, “Koj ceev faaj zoo zoo tsw xob moog has daabtsw rua Yakhauj le, txawm yog lug zoo lug phem los tsw xob has le.”
Yakhauj moog tsaa tsev ntaub tsuam chaw su rua peg toj sab Kile‑a tebchaws mas Lanpaa kuj caum cuag Yakhauj. Lanpaa hab nwg cov kwvtij kuj tsuam chaw su rua ntawd hab.
Lanpaa has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj ua daabtsw le nuav? Koj daag tau kuv lawm. Koj coj kuv tej ntxhais tswv yaam nkaus le koj moog ntaus rog yeej es koj txeeb tau lug.

Ua caag koj nyag kev tswv kuv le nuav hab daag kuv tsw qha kuv paub le? Yog kuv paub, kuv tseed yuav paab xaa koj ua xyiv faab quas hlo, tseed yuav hu nkauj nrov seev quas yeeg hab yuav npuaj nruag ntaus nkauj nog ncaas xaa koj hab los sas.
Ua le caag koj tsw kheev kuv nwj xob kuv tej tub tej ntxhais? Koj ua ruag kawg le.

Kuv yeej muaj peevxwm ua phem tau rua mej. Tassws yog naag mo mej txwv tug Vaajtswv has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj ceev faaj zoo zoo tsw xob moog has daabtsw rua Yakhauj le, txawm yog lug zoo lug phem los tsw xob has le.’
Tej zag qhov kws koj tswv yog koj ncu txug vaaj tse nam txwv heev, tassws ua caag koj tseed nyag kuv tej txoov daab lug lawm hab nawj?”
Yakhauj teb Lanpaa has tas, “Kuv ntshai vem kuv xaav tas tsaam koj tsua txeeb hlo koj tej ntxhais rov qaab.

Yog koj pum koj tej txoov daab nyob huv leejtwg teg tes tsw xob tseg tug ntawd sav le. Txwm kaav xawb taab meeg huv peb cov kwvtij neej tsaa, yog pum ib yaam daabtsw kws yog koj le nyob ntawm kuv kuj ca le coj moog.” Yakhauj tsw paub tas Lachee tub nyag tej txoov daab hov lug.

Lanpaa txawm nkaag rua huv Yakhauj lub tsev ntaub hab moog rua huv Le‑a lub tsev ntaub hab moog rua huv ob tug nkauj qhev lub tsev ntaub los kuj tsw pum. Nwg txawm tawm huv Le‑a lub tsev ntaub moog nkaag rua huv Lachee lub tsev ntaub.
Tassws Lachee tub muab tej txoov daab hov coj moog zais rua huv lub eeb ntxhuav nwg txawm nyob tsawg sau lawm. Mas Lanpaa moog xawb nrhav txhua zog huv Lachee lub tsev ntaub los kuj tsw pum le.
Lachee txawm has rua leej txwv has tas, “Thov txwv tsw xob chim sab. Kuv cev tsw huv kuv txhad sawv tsw tau lug fem txwv.” Tes Lanpaa xawb taag los tsw pum nwg tej txoov daab le.
Yakhauj txawm chim heev nwg txhad tshev Lanpaa tas, “Kuv ua txhum le caag? Kuv muaj txem le caag es koj yuav swv zug caum kuv qaab ua luaj le?

Txawm yog koj tub xawb nrhav huv kuv tej nraa huvsw lawm yog koj pum muaj daabtsw kws yog koj le? Ca le muab lug txawb kag rua ntawm nuav taab meeg peb cov kwvtij neej tsaa ob tog es ca puab txav cai rua ib ob tog.
Kuv nrug koj nyob tau neeg nkaum xyoo lawm. Koj tej yaaj tej tshws tsw muaj ib tug lawb mivnyuas le, hab koj tej txwv yaaj kuv tsw tau noj ib tug le.
Tej kws tsaj qus tum lawd kuv kuj tsw coj lug rua koj, kuv tseed nrhav kuv lug ntxwv rua xwb. Tej kws tub saab nyag tsw has nyag nruab nub nyag mo ntuj koj kuj muab xaam huvsw rua kuv them.
Kuv lub neej yeej zoo le nuav, nruab nub kuv kuj tiv tshaav ntuj kub mo ntuj kuv kuj tiv no kuv tub pw tsw tsaug zug le.

Kuv nrug koj tsev tuabneeg nyob le nuav tau neeg nkaum xyoo. Kuv ua koj zug kaum plaub xyoo yuav koj ob tug ntxhais hab kuv ua koj zug rau xyoo yuav koj tej tsaj txhu los koj tseed txauv kuv nqe zug kaum zag.

Yog kuv txwv tug Vaajtswv kws yog Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv hab yog tug kws kuv txwv Yiha fwm hab ntshai, tsw tuaj kuv tog tes zag nuav koj yeej yuav ua kuas kuv moog teg dawb teg nplag xwb lauj. Yog Vaajtswv pum kuv txujkev txom nyem lwj sab hab pum tej num kws kuv ua, naag mo Vaajtswv txhad le txwv koj.”

Lanpaa txawm teb Yakhauj tas, “Tej ntxhais nuav los yog kuv ntxhais, tej mivnyuas nuav los yog kuv mivnyuas, tej nam paab tsaj nuav los yog kuv le, ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob ntawm koj xubndag nuav puavleej yog kuv le. Nub nua sub kuv nim ua tau le caag rua kuv tej ntxhais hab tej mivnyuas kws puab yug?
Ca le txaav lug es ib sws cog lug ca sub tej lug cog tseg hov txhad ua tau timkhawv rua kuv hab koj.”
Yakhauj txawm muab ib txhwb zeb lug txhus ua ib tug ncej.
Yakhauj has rua nwg cov kwvtij neej tsaa tas “Khaws pob zeb lug.” Puab txawm khaws pob zeb lug tib ua ib pawg. Tes puab txawm noj ib tsum mov rua ntawm pawg pob zeb hov.
Lanpaa tis npe rua pawg pob zeb hov has tas Yeka Xahantutha huas Yakhauj tsua tis npe has tas Kale‑e.
Lanpaa has tas, “Nub nua pawg pob zeb nuav ua timkhawv rua koj hab kuv.” Vem le nuav txhad hu qhov chaw ntawd ua Kale‑e,
hab hu ua Mixapa,  tsua qhov Lanpaa has tas, “Txawm yog ib ob tog sws ncaim lawm los thov Yawmsaub zuv rawv ib ob tog.
Yog koj tswm txom kuv tej ntxhais lossws koj yuav dua nam yau, txawm yog tsw muaj leejtwg nrug ib ob tog nyob los koj ncu ntsoov tas Vaajtswv ua timkhawv rua koj hab kuv.”
Lanpaa kuj has rua Yakhauj tas, “Saib pawg pob zeb hab tug ncej zeb kws ib muab txhus kem koj hab kuv nuav nawj.

Pawg pob zeb nuav ua timkhawv hab tug ncej zeb ua timkhawv has tas kuv yuav tsw hlaa pawg pob zeb nuav tuaj ua phem rua koj, hab koj yuav tsw hlaa pawg pob zeb hab tug ncej zeb nuav tuaj ua phem rua kuv.
Ca Aplahaa hab Nahau ob tug tug Vaajtswv kws yog ob tug txwv tug Vaajtswv ua tug kws txav cai rua ib.” Yakhauj kuj tuav tug Vaajtswv kws nwg txwv Yiha fwm hab ntshai lub npe cog lug twv hab.
Yakhauj txawm tua tsaj xyeem sau lub roob hov, hab hu nwg tej kwvtij neej tsaa suavdawg lug noj ib tsum mov ua ke. Puab noj mov nyob ib mos sau lub roob hov.
Lanpaa sawv ntxuv ntxuv lug nwj xob nwg tej xeeb ntxwv hab nwg tej ntxhais hab foom koob moov rua puab taag tes nwg txawm rov moog tsev lawm.
Yakhauj txawm taug kev moog mas Vaajtswv cov tubkhai ntuj lug ntswb nwg.
Thaus Yakhauj pum puab nwg has tas, “Nuav yog Vaajtswv paab tub rog.” Nwg txhad hu lub chaw hov ua Mahana‑i.
Yakhauj khaiv tuabneeg tshaaj xu ua nwg ntej moog cuag nwg tug tijlaug Exau huv Xe‑i tebchaws kws yog Entoo tebchaws,
Yakhauj has rua puab tas, “Ca le moog has rua Exau kws ua hlub tas, ‘Koj tug qhev Yakhauj has le nuav tas, Kuv nrug Lanpaa nyob txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Kuv muaj nyuj muaj neeg luav muaj tej paab yaaj paab tshws muaj tub qhe nkauj qhev, mas kuv khaiv tuabneeg tuaj saam fwm koj sub koj txhad le txaus sab rua kuv.’ ”
Cov kws tshaaj xu hov rov lug has rua Yakhauj tas, “Peb moog cuag koj tug tijlaug Exau lawm, nwg saamswm tuaj ntswb koj, hab muaj plaub puas leej nrug nwg tuaj.”
Yakhauj ntshai hab txhawj kawg le, txhad muab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg hab nwg tej paab yaaj paab tshws paab nyuj hab tej ntxhuav faib ua ob paab.
Nwg xaav tas, “Yog Exau tuaj muab ib paab ua puam tsuaj lawm, paab kws tseed tshuav yuav tswv dim.”

Yakhauj thov Vaajtswv has tas, “Au kuv yawm Aplahaa tug Vaajtswv hab kuv txwv Yiha tug Vaajtswv, au Yawmsaub koj has rua kuv tas, ‘Ca le rov qaab moog rua koj teb koj chaw koj kw koj tig es kuv yuav ua zoo rua koj.’

Kuv tsw tswm nyog tau txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov hab txujkev ncaaj nceeg kws koj tau ua tshwm rua koj tug qhev lawm ib nyuag qhov hlo le. Tsua qhov tas kuv muaj tuab tug paas nreg hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog xwb, mas nwgnuav kuv muaj ob paab tuabneeg.
Thov koj cawm kuv dim huv kuv tug tijlaug Exau txhais teg, vem kuv ntshai nwg, tsaam tes nwg yuav muab kuv hab quaspuj mivnyuas tua pov tseg huvsw.
Tassws koj tub has ca lawm tas koj yuav ua zoo rua kuv hab paab kuas kuv caaj ceg zoo yaam nkaus le tej xuab zeb ntawm ntug havtxwv suav tsw txheeb vem yog coob kawg.”
Mo ntawd Yakhauj su qhov ntawd, hab xaiv nwg tej hov txhua chaw kws nwg yuav pub ua tshaav ntuj rua nwg tug tijlaug Exau,
yog ob puas tug maum tshws hab neeg nkaum tug txwv tshws, ob puas tug maum yaaj hab neeg nkaum tug txwv yaaj,
peb caug tug maum ntxhuav hab tej mivnyuas ntxhuav, plaub caug tug maum nyuj hab kaum tug txwv nyuj, hab neeg nkaum tug maum neeg luav hab kaum tug txwv neeg luav.
Yakhauj muab cov nuav rua nwg cov tub qhe saib kuas ib paab nyob nrug deb ib paab, hab has rua nwg cov tub qhe tas, “Ca le ua kuv ntej moog, hab ca ib paab moog kuas nrug deb zog ib paab.”

Yakhauj has rua tug tub qhe kws saib thawj paab tas, “Thaus kuv tug tijlaug Exau tuaj ntswb koj hab nug koj tas, ‘Koj yog leejtwg le tuabneeg? Koj moog hovtwg? Hab tej tsaj txhu kws ua koj ntej ntawd yog leejtwg le?’
koj yuav tsum teb tas, ‘Tej nuav yog koj tug qhev Yakhauj le. Yog tej kws coj tuaj ua tshaav ntuj pub rua Exau kws ua hlub. Hab Yakhauj tseed lawv peb qaab lug.’ ”
Yakhauj has rua tug kws saib paab ob hab paab peb hab txhua tug kws lawv tej paab tsaj tas, “Thaus mej ntswb Exau mej yuav has ib yaam nkaus le ntawd rua nwg.

Hab mej yuav has tas, ‘Hab koj tug qhev Yakhauj tseed lawv peb qaab lug.’ ” Vem yog Yakhauj xaav tas, “Nyab tej tsaj kws kuv xaa ua ntej moog ua tshaav ntuj yuav tswj tau Exau kev npau tawg, hab thaus kuv moog pum nwg tim ntsej tim muag nyab nwg yuav txais yuav kuv.”
Yog le nuav nwg txhad muab tej tshaav ntuj xaa ua ntej moog, tassws mo ntawd nwg tug kheej nwg tseed su qhov chaw ntawd.
Mo ntawd Yakhauj sawv tseeg coj ob tug quaspuj hab ob tug nkauj qhev hab kaum ib tug mivnyuas hlaa tug dej Yanpo.
Yakhauj xaa puab hlaa tug dej moog hab xaa cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw hlaa moog.
Yakhauj tuab leeg tseed nyob hov ntawd. Muaj ib tug txwvneej nrug nwg sws qhau ib mos kaaj ntug.
Thaus tug yawm hov pum tas kov tsw yeej Yakhauj, nwg txawm nas Yakhauj lub cos qej txhaa ceg txws. Thaus Yakhauj nrug nwg sws qhau Yakhauj lub cos qej txhaa txhad txawv plhawv.
Tug yawm ntawd has tas, “Ca le tso kuv moog tsua qhov tub yuav kaaj ntug.” Tassws Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv yuav tsw tso koj moog txug thaus koj foom koob moov rua kuv tsaiv.”
Tug yawm ntawd has rua nwg tas, “Koj npe hu le caag?” Nwg teb tas, “Kuv npe hu ua Yakhauj.”
Tug yawm ntawd txhad has tas, “Yuav tsw hu koj ua Yakhauj lawm, yuav hu ua Yixayee  tsua qhov koj tau nrug Vaajtswv hab tuabneeg sws ntsuag zug hab kov yeej.”
Yakhauj txhad nug nwg tas, “Thov koj qha koj lub npe rua kuv.” Tug txwvneej hov has tas, “Ua caag koj nug kuv lub npe?” Tes nwg txawm foom koob moov rua Yakhauj hov ntawd.
Yakhauj txhad hu lub chaw hov ua Peni‑ee  hab has tas “Tsua qhov kuv tub pum Vaajtswv tim ntsej tim muag los nwg tseed tseg kuv txujsa nyob.”
Thaus Yakhauj hlaa Peni‑ee moog nub tawm tuaj mas nwg moog kev ceg tawv pluav vem yog nwg ceg txws txawv.
Vem le nuav cov Yixayee txhad tsw noj txuj leeg ntawm ceg txws kws nyob ntawm cos qej txhaa txug naj nub nwgnuav, vem yog Vaajtswv nas ncaaj txuj leeg ntawm Yakhauj lub cos qej txhaa ceg txws.
Yakhauj tsaa muag saib mas pum Exau tuaj hab muaj plaub puas leej nrug nwg tuaj. Yakhauj txhad muab cov mivnyuas faib nrug Le‑a hab Lachee hab ob tug nkauj qhev.
Nwg tso ob tug nkauj qhev hab ob tug cov mivnyuas moog ua ntej, tso Le‑a hab nwg cov mivnyuas moog ua nruab nraab, ca Lachee hab Yauxej moog ua qaab hlo.
Nwg ua puab ntej moog, khoov ntshws huv aav pe xyaa pes moog ti nkaus nwg tug tijlaug.
Exau dha loo moog tog nwg hab puag nkaus khawm cej daab nwj, mas nyag taug nyag quaj.

Thaus Exau tsaa muag saib pum cov quaspuj mivnyuas, nwg txhad nug tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nrug koj ua ke nuav yog leejtwg?” Yakhauj teb tas, “Yog cov mivnyuas kws Vaajtswv zoo sab pub rua kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe.”
Ob tug nkauj qhev hab ob tug cov mivnyuas txhad txaav lug ze hab pe.
Le‑a hab nwg cov mivnyuas kuj txaav lug ze hab pe. Thaus kawg Yauxej hab Lachee txaav lug ze hab pe.
Exau has tas, “Cov tsaj txhu huvsw kws kuv ntswb ntawd yog muab ua daabtsw?” Yakhauj teb tas, “Yog muab pub rua koj kuas koj txaus sab rua kuv.”
Exau has tas, “Tug kwv, kuv muaj txaus lawm, khaws koj le ca rua koj.”

Yakhauj has tas, “Tsw tau, yog koj txaus sab rua kuv, thov koj txais tej tshaav ntuj ntawm kuv txhais teg, tsua qhov kuv pum koj ntsej muag mas ib yaam le kuv pum Vaajtswv ntsej muag ntaag vem koj hlub kuv hab koj txais kuv zoo kawg.
Kuv thov koj txais tej tshaav ntuj kws kuv coj lug rua koj, tsua qhov Vaajtswv hlub hab ua zoo rua kuv, hab kuv muaj txaus lawm.” Nwg thov thov le nuav Exau txhad txais lawm.
Exau has tas, “Peb ca le ua ke moog, kuv yuav coj koj kev.”

Yakhauj teb nwg tas, “Yawm hlub koj yeej paub tas kuv cov mivnyuas tsw muaj zug, hab kuv tseed txhawj txug kuv tej paab yaaj paab tshws hab tej nyuj le mivnyuas kws tseed noj mig. Yog tseed lawv ceev nrooj moog ib nub hab, tej tsaj yuav tuag taag.

Thov yawm hlub ua koj tug qhev ntej moog mas kuv maav maav lawv koj qaab lug lawv le tej tsaj tug zug kws nyob ntawm kuv hauv ntej hab lawv le kuv cov mivnyuas tug zug, moog txug thaus kuv lug cuag yawm hlub ntawm Xe‑i.”
Exau txhad has tas, “Ca kuv tso kuv cov tuabneeg nrug koj ua ke.” Tassws Yakhauj has tas, “Tsw txug ua le ntawd. Thov koj txaus sab rua kuv xwb tes txaus lawm.”
Mas nub ntawd Exau kuj taug kev rov moog rua Xe‑i.
Tassws Yakhauj moog txug ntawm Xukhau tes txawm ua vaaj tse nyob ntawd hab ua tsev pheeb suav rua nwg tej tsaj txhu. Vem le ntawd txhad hu lub chaw hov ua Xukhau.
Yakhauj taug kev ntawm Panta Alaa lug txug lub moos Sekhee huv Khana‑aa tebchaws tsw raug ceblaaj daabtsw le. Nwg txhad tsaa tsev ntaub ze ntawm lub moos Sekhee.
Yakhauj yuav thaaj aav kws nwg tsaa tsev ntaub hov ntawm Hamau cov tub ib puas lub txag. Hamau yog Sekhee txwv.
Yakhauj tib ib lub thaaj xyeem rua hov ntawd, hu lub thaaj hov ua Ee Elohe Yixayee.
Yakhauj tug ntxhais Ntina kws Le‑a yug tawm moog tshaam cov quaspuj kws nyob huv tebchaws ntawd.
Thaus Hamau kws yog tuabneeg Hivai kws kaav tebchaws hov tug tub Sekhee pum Ntina tes nwg txawm muab tug ntxhais yuam coj moog pw ua ke.
Sekhee kuj taag sab hlo rua Yakhauj tug ntxhais Ntina, nwg nyam heev hab has lug zoo kawg le rua Ntina.
Sekhee txawm has rua nwg txwv Hamau tas, “Thov paab yuav tug ntxhais hov ua kuv quaspuj lauj.”
Yakhauj nov has tas Sekhee muab nwg tug ntxhais lub cev kov puag lawm tassws nwg cov tub tseed yug tsaj tom tshaav zaub. Yakhauj txhad nyob tuabywv tog ca cov tub lug tsaiv.
Hamau kws yog Sekhee txwv txhad moog cuag Yakhauj moog nrug nwg thaam.

Thaus Yakhauj cov tub nov tej xuv hov puab txawm rov tom tshaav zaub lug. Puab mob sab kawg hab chim kawg le tsua qhov kws Sekhee saib tsw taug cov Yixayee txhad muab Yakhauj tug ntxhais yuam le ntawd, yeej tsw tswm nyog yuav ua le ntawd.
Hamau txawm has rua puab tas, “Kuv tug tub Sekhee lub sab yeej dai quas dhuas rua koj tug ntxhais le. Thov muab tug ntxhais rua kuv tug tub yuav ua quaspuj.
Mej nrug peb ua tshoob ua kug, muab mej tej ntxhais qua rua peb hab yuav peb tej ntxhais rua mej.
Mej nrug peb nyob, peb yuav qheb tebchaws quas lug rua mej nyob. Ca le nyob ntawm nuav ua laag ua luam yuav laj yuav teb ua vaaj ua tsev.”
Sekhee txawm has rua Ntina txwv hab nwg cov nug tas, “Tsaa laaj muag saib rua kuv lauj. Mej yuav pes tsawg los kuv yeej yuav them xwb.
Mej yuav hu nqe mig nqe no le caag hab tshaav ntuj le caag los kuv yeej yuav muab rua mej lawv le mej has. Thov muab tug ntxhais qua rua kuv yuav xwb.”
Vem yog Sekhee muab puab tug muam Ntina lub cev kov puag lawm Yakhauj cov tub txhad daag Sekhee hab nwg txwv Hamau.
Puab teb tas, “Tsw tau le lauj! Peb qua tsw nyog tug muam rua tug tuabneeg kws tsw tau ua kevcai txav. Ua le mas yuav rhuav peb ntsej muag heev.
Tsuav yog mej kaam ua le kws peb has es ca txhua tug txwvneej ua kevcai txav ib yaam le peb hab, tes peb yuav yeem muab qua rua koj.
Peb txhad yeem muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua mej hab yuav mej tej ntxhais lug rua peb mas peb yuav nrug mej nyob ua hlo ib haiv tuabneeg.
Tassws yog mej tsw noog peb has tsw kaam ua kevcai txav tes peb yuav coj peb tug muam tswv moog.”
Puab cov lug hov mas hum Hamau hab nwg tug tub Sekhee ob tug sab.
Tug hluas hov tsw tog le, nwg maaj nroog ua hlo le puab has vem nwg taag sab nrho rua Yakhauj tug ntxhais. Sekhee yog tug kws muaj meej thawb dua txhua tug huv nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg.
Hamau hab nwg tug tub Sekhee txhad tawm moog rua ntawm rooj loog has rua cov txwvneej huv lub moos ntawd tas,

“Cov txwvneej nuav nrug peb sws raug zoo lawm. Ca puab nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav ua laag ua luam tsua qhov lub tebchaws nuav daav txaus puab nyob. Peb ca le yuav kag puab tej ntxhais lug ua peb cov le quaspuj hab muab peb tej ntxhais qua rua puab yuav.
Qhov kws puab yuav kaam nrug peb nyob ua hlo ib haiv tuabneeg mas yuav tsum ua le nuav xwb. Peb cov txwvneej txhua tug yuav tsum ua kevcai txav ib yaam le puab.
Puab tej nam paab tsaj txhu hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws puab muaj hab tej tsaj kws swv ua num puav leej yuav yog peb le los sas. Ca peb ua lawv le kws puab has nuav, puab txhad le kaam nrug peb nyob.”
Cov txwvneej suavdawg kws nyob huv lub moos kuj pum zoo ua lawv le Hamau hab nwg tug tub Sekhee has. Mas cov txwvneej huv lub moos hov txhua tug txawm ua kevcai txav.

Puab ua kevcai txav tau peb nub, thaus puab tseed saamswm mob mob Yakhauj ob tug tub Xime‑oo hab Levi kws yog Ntina ob tug nug hlub txawm coj ntaaj nyaag moog rua huv moos muab cov txwvneej huv moos txhua tug tua pov tseg.
Ob tug xuas ntaaj tua Hamau hab nwg tug tub Sekhee tuag mas coj Ntina tawm huv Sekhee lub tsev moog.
Yakhauj cov tub pum cov txwvneej kws tuag hov mas puab ca le lws tej hov txhua chaw huv lub moos vem cov tuabneeg huv lub moos hov muab puab tug muam lub cev kov puag lawm.
Puab txeeb hlo tej tshws tej yaaj tej nyuj tej neeg luav hab ib puas tsaav yaam tsw has huv lub moos nruab laj nruab teb coj huvsw moog,
coj hlo nyaj txag cuab txhaj cuab taam hab nteg quaspuj mivnyuas coj moog. Puab sau ib puas tsaav yaam huv vaaj huv tsev du quas lug le.

Yakhauj txawm has rua Xime‑oo hab Levi tas, “Meb ua rua kuv tau kev kub ntxhuv heev, meb ua rua cov tuabneeg Khana‑aa hab cov tuabneeg Pelixai kws nyob tebchaws nuav ntxub kuv. Peb tsawg tsawg le, yog puab sau nthwv tuaj ntaus kuv tes kuv hab kuv tsev tuabneeg yeej yuav puam tsuaj taag xwb.”
Tassws ob tug teb has tas, “Luas muab peb tug muam ua cuag nkaus le puj muag cev tau hab lov?”
Vaajtswv has rua Yakhauj has tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg tswv moog rua nraag Npe‑ee moog nyob nraag es tib ib lub thaaj rua tug Vaajtswv kws thau koj tswv koj tug tijlaug Exau es lug tshwm rua koj pum.”

Vem le hov Yakhauj txhad has rua nwg tsev tuabneeg hab cov tuabneeg kws nrug nwg nyob ua ke suavdawg has tas, “Ca le muab lwm tebchaws tej daab kws mej coj tso pov tseg huvsw hab ua kevcai ntxuav lub cev lub sab kuas kaaj kuas huv hab hloov tsoog tsho huvsw.
Peb ca le moog lawm nraag Npe‑ee mas kuv yuav tib ib lub thaaj rua ntawd rua tug Vaajtswv kws thau kuv raug kev txom nyem es nwg teb kuv hab nrug nraim kuv nyob rua txhua qhov chaw kws kuv tau moog.”

Puab txawm muab lwm haiv tuabneeg tej daab qhuas kws puab coj hab muab puab tej puj cu  kws puab coj ntawm qhov ntsej huvsw rua Yakhauj, tes Yakhauj txawm muab faus rua huv qaab tsob ntoo xeeb kws nyob ze lub moos Sekhee.
Thaus puab tswv moog hov mas Vaajtswv ua rua tej zej zog thoob plawg huv tebchaws hov ntshai kawg le, puab txhad tsw caum Yakhauj cov tub qaab.
Yakhauj hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg lug txug ntawm Lu (kws yog Npe‑ee) kws nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Yakhauj txawm tib ib lub thaaj rua ntawd mas hu lub chaw hov ua Eenpe‑ee,  vem yog lub chaw kws thau Yakhauj tswv nwg tug tijlaug es Vaajtswv lug tshwm rua nwg pum.
Tug nkauj qhev Ntenpaula kws tu Lenpekha hlub txawm tuag mas puab muab nwg log rua huv qaab tsob ntoo xeeb nraag qaab Npe‑ee, mas txhad hu tsob ntoo hov ua Aaloo Npakhu.
Thaus Yakhauj tswv ntawm Panta Alaa rov lug Vaajtswv lug tshwm rua Yakhauj dua ib zag hab foom koob moov rua nwg.
Vaajtswv has rua nwg tas, “Koj npe hu ua Yakhauj  tassws yuav tsw hu koj ua Yakhauj dua le lawm, yuav hu koj ua Yixayee.”  Yog le nuav txhad hu nwg ua Yixayee.

Hab Vaajtswv has rua Yakhauj tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus.  Koj ca le muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob coob. Muaj ib haiv tuabneeg yuav tshwm ntawm koj lug hab yuav muaj ntau haiv tuabneeg tshwm ntawm koj lug, yuav muaj tej vaajntxwv tshwm ntawm koj lug.
Lub tebchaws kws kuv muab pub rua Aplahaa hab Yiha lawd kuv yeej yuav pub rua koj hab pub rua koj caaj ceg moog le.”
Vaajtswv txawm tawm ntawm lub chaw kws nrug Yakhauj thaam moog lawm.
Yakhauj txawm txhus ib tug ncej zeb ca rua ntawm lub chaw kws Vaajtswv nrug nwg has lug hab nwg muab cawv txwv maab laub ywg ua kevcai laub xyeem rua sau tug ncej hab muab roj laub ywg tug ncej hov.
Yakhauj hu lub chaw kws Vaajtswv nrug nwg has lug ntawd ua Npe‑ee.
Puab tswv ntawm Npe‑ee moog tsw tau txug Efatha tes Lachee txawm ua mob teb heev yug mivnyuas nyuaj heev.
Thaus nwg saamswm mob heev tug quaspuj kws paab yug mivnyuas has rua Lachee tas, “Koj tsw xob ntshai, koj tub tau dua ib tug mivtub lawm.”
Thaus nwg yuav tu sav yuav tuag hov nwg tis tug mivtub hov npe hu ua Npee‑auni  kuas nwg txwv tis npe hu ua Npeeyamee.
Tes Lachee txawm tuag lawm, mas puab muab nwg log rua ntawm ntug kev kws moog rua nraag lub zog Efatha (kws yog Npelehee).
Yakhauj muab ib tug ncej zeb txhus rua ntawm lub ntxaa. Tug ncej ntawm Lachee lub ntxaa mas nyob lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Yixayee kuj tswv rua tom ntej, moog tsaa tsev ntaub nyob dhau plhawv lub chaw tsom faaj Entaw.
Thaus Yixayee nyob rua huv lub tebchaws hov Lunpee txawm moog nrug nwg txwv tug nam yau Npiha pw. Yixayee kuj nov txug qhov hov hab. Yakhauj muaj kaum ob tug tub.
Le‑a cov tub yog Lunpee kws yog Yakhauj tug tub hlub, hab Xime‑oo, Levi, Yuta, Ixakha, hab Xenpuloo.
Lachee cov tub yog Yauxej hab Npeeyamee.
Lachee tug nkauj qhev Npiha cov tub yog Ntaaj hab Nathali.
Le‑a tug nkauj qhev Xilapa cov tub yog Kas hab Asaw. Cov nuav yog Yakhauj cov tub kws yug ntawm Panta Alaa.
Yakhauj rov lug cuag nwg txwv Yiha ntawm Maale kws ze lub moos Khiliya Anpa (kws yog Heploo) yog lub chaw kws thau u Aplahaa hab Yiha txeev ua qhua nyob.
Yiha noob nyoog muaj ib puas yim caum xyoo,
nwg txujsa le tu. Nwg nyob laug quas nkoog txug caij txug nyoog le tuag moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob. Nwg ob tug tub Exau hab Yakhauj txhad coj nwg moog log.
Ntawm nuav yog Exau kws yog Entoo caaj ceg.
Exau moog yuav cov Khana‑aa tej ntxhais lug ua quaspuj. Nwg yuav Eloo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai tug ntxhais Antas hab yuav Anas tug ntxhais Auhaulinpama, nwg yawm yog Xinpe‑oo kws yog tuabneeg Hivai,
hab nwg yuav Yisama‑ee tug ntxhais Npaxema kws yog Nenpayau tug nam hluas.
Antas yug tau Elifa rua Exau, Npaxema yug tau Le‑u‑ee,
hab Auhaulinpama yug tau Ye‑u hab Yalaa hab Khaula. Cov nuav yog Exau cov tub kws yug huv tebchaws Khana‑aa.

Exau coj nwg cov quaspuj hab tej tub tej ntxhais hab nwg cov tuabneeg suavdawg hab tej tsaj txhu hab tej tsaj swv ua num hab txhua yaam kws nwg khwv tau huv Khana‑aa tebchaws ncaim nwg tug kwv Yakhauj tswv moog deb rua lwm tebchaws lawm.
Vem yog ob kwvtij muaj hov txhua chaw ntau heev txhad nyob tsw tau ua ke, vem lub tebchaws kws ob tug nyob hov nqaim tsw txaus puab yug tsaj txhu ua ke.
Exau kws yog Entoo txhad tswv moog nyob rua peg tej toj roob Xe‑i tebchaws.
Ntawm nuav yog Exau caaj ceg. Exau yog cov tuabneeg Entoo lub keeb kws nyob peg toj sab Xe‑i tebchaws.
Exau cov tub tej npe yog le nuav. Elifa yog Exau tug nam hlub Antas yug, hab Le‑u‑ee yog Exau tug nam ob Npaxema yug.
Elifa cov tub yog Themaa, Auma, Xefau, Kathaa hab Khena.
Exau tug tub Elifa tug nam yau Thina muaj ib tug tub hu ua Amalej. Cov nuav yog Exau tug nam hlub Antas le xeeb ntxwv.
Le‑u‑ee cov tub yog Nahaj, Xelag, Sama hab Mixa. Cov nuav yog Exau tug nam ob Npaxema le xeeb ntxwv.
Exau tug nam peb Auhaulinpama kws yog Anas tug ntxhais hab yog Xinpe‑oo tug xeeb ntxwv cov tub kws nwg yug rua Exau yog Ye‑u hab Yalaa hab Khaula.
Ntawm nuav yog cov thawj coj huv Exau tej caaj ceg. Exau tug tub hlub Elifa cov tub kws ua thawj coj yog Themaa, Auma, Xefau, Khena,
Khaula, Kathaa hab Amalej. Cov nuav yog Elifa cov tub kws ua thawj coj huv Entoo tebchaws. Puab yog Antas le xeeb ntxwv.
Exau tug tub Le‑u‑ee cov tub kws ua thawj coj yog Nahaj, Xelag, Sama hab Mixa. Cov nuav yog Le‑u‑ee cov tub kws ua thawj coj huv Entoo tebchaws. Puab yog Exau tug nam ob Npaxema le xeeb ntxwv.
Exau tug nam peb Auhaulinpama cov tub kws ua thawj coj yog Ye‑u hab Yalaa hab Khaula. Cov nuav yog Exau tug nam peb Auhaulinpama kws yog Anas tug ntxhais cov tub kws ua thawj coj huv Entoo tebchaws.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog Exau kws yog Entoo cov tub, hab yog cov kws ua thawj coj.
Ntawm nuav yog Xe‑i kws yog tuabneeg Hauli cov tub kws nyob tebchaws hov, yog Lauthaa, Saunpaa, Xinpe‑oo, Anas,
Ntisoo, Exaw hab Ntisaa. Cov nuav yog Xe‑i cov tub kws ua thawj coj huv cov Hauli huv Entoo tebchaws.
Lauthaa cov tub yog Hauli hab Hemaa. Thina yog Lauthaa tug muam.
Saunpaa cov tub yog Avaa, Manaha, Enpaa, Sefau hab Aunaa.
Xinpe‑oo cov tub yog Aiyag hab Anas. Anas yog tug kws coj nwg txwv Xinpe‑oo paab neeg luav moog yug mas moog pum ib lub qhov dej kub dej npau huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Anas tug tub yog Ntisoo tug ntxhais yog Auhaulinpama.
Ntisoo cov tub yog Hentaa, Esanpaa, Ithalaa hab Khelaa.
Exaw cov tub yog Npihaa, Xavaa hab Akhaav.
Ntisaa cov tub yog Us hab Alaaj.
Cov nuav yog cov kws ua thawj coj huv cov Hauli, yog Lauthaa, Saunpaa, Xinpe‑oo, Anas,
Ntisoo, Exaw hab Ntisaa. Cov nuav yog cov kws ua thawj coj huv cov Hauli nyag ua nyag ib cum huv Xe‑i tebchaws.
Ntawm nuav yog cov vaajntxwv kws kaav huv Entoo tebchaws yog kaav ua ntej thau u kws cov Yixayee tsw tau muaj vaajntxwv.
Npe‑au tug tub Npela sawv lug kaav huv Entoo. Nwg lub moos hu ua Ntihanpa.
Thaus Npela tuag lawd Xelag tug tub Yaunpam kws yog tuabneeg Npauxa nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Yaunpam tuag lawd Husaa kws yog tuabneeg huv tebchaws Themaa nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Husaa tuag lawd Npenta tug tub Hanta kws yog tug kws ntaus yeej cov Mintee huv Mau‑a tebchaws nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav mas nwg lub moos hu ua Avij.
Thaus Hanta tuag lawd Xaala kws yog tuabneeg Malekha nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Xaala tuag lawd Sa‑u kws yog tuabneeg Lehaunpau kws nyob ntawm ntug dej Yufeti nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Sa‑u tuag lawd Anpau tug tub Npa‑aa Hanaa nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav.
Thaus Anpau tug tub Npa‑aa Hanaa tuag lawd Hantaj nyob nwg chaw ua vaajntxwv kaav. Nwg lub moos hu ua Pa‑u, nwg tug quaspuj hu ua Mehethanpee, kws yog Maleb tug ntxhais. Maleb yog Mexaha le ntxhais.
Cov nuav yog cov kws ua thawj coj huv Exau caaj ceg kws nyag ua thawj coj huv nyag cum nyag nyob nyag tebchaws tej npe, yog Thina, Avas, Yethe,
Auhaulinpama, Ela, Pinoo,
Khena, Themaa, Mixas,
Mati‑ee hab Ilaa. Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws ua thawj coj huv Entoo kws nyag nyob nyag thaaj chaw huv lub tebchaws kws yog puab teej puab tug. Tug Exau nuav yog cov tuabneeg Entoo tug yawm koob.
Yakhauj nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws kws nwg txwv txeev ua qhua nyob.

Ntawm nuav moog yog has txug Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg. Thaus Yauxej noob nyoog muaj kaum xyaa xyoo nwg nrug cov tijlaug yug yaaj yug tshws. Nwg nrug tug nkauj qhev Npiha hab Xilapa cov tub nyob ua ke. Ob tug yog nwg txwv le nam yau. Yauxej coj tej kws cov tijlaug ua tsw zoo lug pav rua leej txwv noog.
Yixayee nyam Yauxej heev dua nwg cov mivnyuas huvsw, tsua qhov Yauxej yug rua thaus leej txwv laug laug lawm. Yixayee ua ib lub tsho ntev muaj teg  rua Yauxej.
Thaus cov tijlaug pum tas leej txwv nyam Yauxej heev dua puab, tes puab txawm ntxub Yauxej hab tsw has ib lus zoo rua Yauxej hlo le.
Yauxej ua ib zaaj npau suav, thaus nwg pav rua cov tijlaug noog taag puab yimfuab ntxub nwg heev.
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Ca le noog zaaj npau suav kws kuv pum maj.
Peb saamswm paav teg nplej  tom teb, na cav kuv teg nplej sawv nreg nreeg huas mej cov teg nplej lug nyob vej ib ncig kuv teg nplej hab pe kuv teg nplej.”
Cov tijlaug txawm nug Yauxej tas, “Koj yuav kaav peb tag tag le lov? Koj yuav muaj fwjchim tswjfwm peb nua lov?” Puab yimfuab ntxub nwg heev vem yog zaaj npau suav hab nwg tej lug.
Yauxej kuj rov ua dua ib zaaj npau suav, hab pav rua cov tijlaug noog has tas, “Kuv ua dua ib zaaj npau suav, na cav pum lub nub lub hli hab kaum ib lub nub qub saamswm pe kuv.”

Thaus nwg pav rua leej txwv hab cov tijlaug noog, leej txwv ywg Yauxej tas, “Koj zaaj npau suav kws koj pum kod yog le caag? Kuv hab koj nam hab koj cov kwvtij yuav lug txhus caug huv aav pe koj nua lov?”
Nwg cov tijlaug txhad khib Yauxej huas leej txwv khaws zaaj nuav ca tuabywv rua nruab sab.
Cov tijlaug moog yug leej txwv tej yaaj tej tshws ze ntawm lub moos Sekhee.
Yixayee txawm has rua Yauxej tas, “Koj cov tijlaug moog yug yaaj yug tshws rua ntawm lub moos Sekhee los tsw yog? Lug es kuv yuav khaiv koj moog saib puab.” Yauxej teb tas, “Kuv kaam moog.”

Leej txwv txawm has rua nwg tas, “Moog saib koj cov tijlaug hab tej yaaj tej tshws saib nyob zoo le caag, es rov lug has rua kuv paub.” Leejtxwv khaiv nwg tawm ntawm lub taj Heploo moog, nwg txhad moog rua lub moos Sekhee.
Muaj ib tug yawm ntswb Yauxej moog moog lug lug tom tshaav zaub, txhad nug tas, “Koj nrhav daabtsw?”
Yauxej teb tas, “Kuv nrhav kuv cov tijlaug. Thov qha kuv saib puab yug yaaj yug tshws rua hovtwg lawm.”
Tug yawm hov has tas, “Puab tub moog lawm, tsua qhov kuv nov puab sws thaam tas, ‘Ca peb moog rua lub moos Ntauthaa.’ ” Yauxej txhad lawv qaab moog ntswb nwg cov tijlaug ntawm lub moos Ntauthaa.
Thaus cov tijlaug pum Yauxej deb deb tuaj tsw tau txug, puab txawm tuav huv yuav muab Yauxej tua pov tseg.
Puab has tas, “Tug nyuag Kws npau suav tuaj ntawm nuav lawm lauj!
Ca le lug es peb muab nwg tua hab muab nrum rua huv ib lub qhov tub tub. Peb has tas ib tug tsaj nyaum muab nwg tum noj lawm, es peb swm saib nwg tej nyuag npau suav yuav tav tau le caag.”
Thaus Lunpee nov tej lug hov, nwg xaav paab Yauxej dim huv puab txhais teg, nwg txhad has tas, “Peb tsw xob muab nwg tua.”

Lunpee kuj has rua puab tas, “Tsw xob ua rua nwg nqaj nduag ntshaav nrug, ca muab nwg pov rua huv lub qhov tub tub huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav, kuas tsw xob kov nwg hlo le.” Nwg has le hov sub nwg txhad paab tau Yauxej dim huv puab txhais teg es yuav muab xaa rov qaab rua leej txwv.
Thaus Yauxej tuaj txug ntawm cov tijlaug, puab txawm muab nwg lub tsho hle, yog lub tsho ntev muaj teg.
Puab muab nwg nrum rua huv ib lub qhov, yog ib lub qhov dej qhuav.

Thaus puab saamswm noj mov puab tsaa muag saib pum ib paab tuabneeg Yisama‑ee tuaj ntawm Kile‑a tuaj. Puab xuas ntxhuav thauj roj ntoos hab roj ntoos ua tshuaj hab roj tsw qaab taug kev moog lawm nraag Iyi tebchaws.
Tes Yuta txawm has rua cov kwvtij tas, “Yog peb muab peb tug kwv tua hab muab nwg cov ntshaav zais los peb yuav tau qaabhau daabtsw?
Ca peb muab nwg muag rua cov tuabneeg Yisama‑ee, peb tsw xob kov nwg hlo le tsua qhov nwg yog peb le kwv hab nrug peb koom nqaj koom ntshaav.” Cov kwvtij suavdawg pum zoo le nwg has.
Mas thaus cov tub luam Mintee tuaj txug puab txawm rhu Yauxej huv lub qhov lug muag rua cov tuabneeg Yisama‑ee neeg nkaum sekhee nyaj.  Cov tuabneeg Yisama‑ee txawm coj Yauxej moog rua Iyi tebchaws.
Thaus Lunpee rov lug txug ntawm lub qhov tsw pum Yauxej nyob huv lub qhov lawm nwg txawm dua rhe nwg lub tsho,
hab rov moog rua ntawm nwg cov kwv hab has tas, “Tug kwv hov pluj lawm, es kuv yuav ua le caag?”
Tes puab txawm muab Yauxej lub tsho lug hab tua ib tug tshws hab muab lub tsho raus rua huv cov ntshaav ntawd.
Puab txawm xaa lub tsho ntev kws muaj teg hov moog rua leej txwv hab has tas, “Peb pum lub tsho nuav. Koj swm saib yog koj tug tub le los tsw yog.”
Leejtxwv paub lub tsho ntawd hab has tas, “Yog kuv tug tub lub tsho tag, muaj ib tug tsaj nyaum muab nwg tum noj lawm lauj. Yauxej raug dua ua tej dwb daim taag lawm lauj!”
Yakhauj dua rhe nwg lub tsho muab khaub seev tsaaj lug naav hab quaj quaj nwg tug tub tau ntau nub.

Mas nwg tej tub tej ntxhais suavdawg tuaj nplig nwg lub sab, tassws nwg tsw yuav puab tej lug nplig le. Nwg has tas, “Tsw yuav le, kuv yuav quaj ntsuag moog rua huv tub tuag teb kuas ntswb kuv leej tub hov ntawd.” Nwg txwv quaj nwg le nuav ntaag.
Lub swjhawm ntawd cov tuabneeg Mintee kuj muab Yauxej muag rua Pautifa huv Iyi tebchaws. Nwg yog Falau le ib tug thawj rog, yog tug thawj rog kws kaav cov tub rog kws zuv vaajntxwv.
Thaus hov Yuta ncaim nwg cov kwvtij tswv moog nrug ib tug tuabneeg Antulaa kws npe hu ua Hila nyob lawm.
Yuta txawm pum cov Khana‑aa ib tug ntxhais hov ntawd. Tug ntxhais hov txwv hu ua Sua. Yuta txawm yuav tug ntxhais hov ua quaspuj hab moog nrug nwg pw ua ke.
Tug quaspuj hov txhad xeeb tub mas yug tau ib tug tub muab tis npe hu ua Ws.
Nwg rov qaab xeeb tub mas yug tau ib tug tub muab tis npe hu ua Auna.
Nwg yug tau dua ib tug tub muab tis npe hu ua Sela. Thaus yug tug tub nuav yog nwg nyob ntawm lub moos Khexib.
Yuta txhad yuav ib tug nyaab hu ua Thama rua Ws kws yog nwg tug tub hlub.
Yawmsaub pum tas Ws kws yog Yuta tug tub hlub ua phem, Yawmsaub txhad muab nwg tua lawm.
Yuta txawm has rua Auna tas, “Koj ca le yuav koj nam tij lawv le txuj kev txujcai es moog nrug nwg pw sub txhad muaj tub ki rua koj tug tijlaug hab.”

Auna paub has tas nwg cov noob yuav tsw ua nwg caaj ceg tes nwg nrug nwg tug nam tij pw thaus twg los nwg pheej muab cov noob ua poob rua peg teb. Nwg txhob txwm ua le hov sub txhad tsw muaj mivnyuas ua nwg tug tijlaug feem.
Yawmsaub pum tas qhov kws Auna ua le hov kuj yog ua txhum mas Yawmsaub txhad muab nwg tua pov tseg lawm hab.

Tes Yuta txawm has rua Thama kws yog nwg tug nyaab tas, “Koj ca le rov qaab moog nyob ua puj ntsuag rua huv koj txwv tsev moog txug thaus kuv tug tub Sela hlub tav txwv tsaiv,” vem Yuta ntshai tsaam nwg tug tub hov tsua tuag le ob tug tijlaug hab. Tes Thama txhad rov qaab moog nrug nwg nam nwg txwv nyob lawm.

Nyob ntev loo tes Yuta tug quaspuj kws yog Sua tug ntxhais txawm tuag lawm. Thaus Yuta rov zoo sab mivntswv lawm nwg txawm nrug nwg tug phoojywg Hila kws yog tuabneeg Antulaa ua ke moog saib nwg cov tub zug txav plaub yaaj peg lub zog Thinaj.
Muaj tuabneeg has rua Thama tas, “Koj swm saib, koj txwv yawg saamswm tuaj moog txav plaub yaaj peg Thinaj.”

Tes Thama txawm hloov hlo cev tsoog puj ntsuag ca txawm muab ib daim ntaub nyag nyag kauv hlo nwg ntsej muag moog nyob ntawm kev tshuam kws yuav nkaag rua huv lub zog Ena‑i hab yuav moog peg Thinaj, tsua qhov nwg yeej paub tas Sela hlub tav txwv lawm los nwg tseed tsw tau moog ua Sela quaspuj.
Thaus Yuta pum Thama mas xaav has tas yog ib tug puj muag cev xwb, vem yog Thama muab ib daim ntaub kauv ntsej muag lawm.

Yuta txhad txaav zog moog has rua nwg tom ntug kev tas, “Lug es kuv yuav nrug koj pw ua ke,” tsua qhov nwg tub tsw paub tas yog nwg tug nyaab. Thama txawm has tas, “Yog koj nrug kuv pw saib koj yuav muab daabtsw rua kuv.”
Yuta teb tas, “Kuv yuav xaa kuv le ib tug mivnyuas tshws tuaj rua koj.” Thama txawm has tas, “Muab ib yaam daabtsw ua puav pheej ca moog txug thaus koj xaa tug mivnyuas tshws tuaj puas tau?”
