Yuta txawm nug has tas, “Yog le es koj xaav yuav daabtsw lug ua puav pheej ca?” Thama teb tas, “Thov muab lub nplhaib nrug saw kws koj swv txaam txwm hab koj tug paas nreg ua puav pheej ca.” Yuta kuj muab rua nwg hab moog nrug nwg pw tes Thama txawm xeeb mivnyuas.
Nwg sawv tseeg rov moog tsev muab daim ntaub kauv ntsej muag yaws hlo ca muab cev tsoog puj ntsuag lug naav kag.
Yuta muab tug mivnyuas tshws rua nwg tug phoojywg kws yog tuabneeg Antulaa coj moog txhwv tej kws nwg muab nas ca ntawm tug puj hov txhais teg lug, tassws moog nrhav tsw pum tug puj hov.
Nwg txhad nug cov txwvneej kws nyob hov ntawd tas, “Tug puj muag cev kws nyob ntawm ntug kev huv Ena‑i nuav moog dua twg lawm?” Puab teb tas, “Ntawm nuav yeej tsw muaj ib tug puj muag cev le.”
Yuta tug phoojywg txhad rov moog has rua Yuta tas, “Kuv nrhav tsw pum le. Cov txwvneej kws nyob hov has tas yeej tsw muaj ib tug puj muag cev nyob ntawd le.”
Yuta txawm has tas, “Ca nwg khaws tej hov txhua chaw ntawd ca sub luas txhad tsw tau chaw luag ib. Kuv tub muab tug mivnyuas tshws nuav xaa moog rua nwg tassws koj nrhav tsw tau nwg xwb.”

Kwvlaam peb lub hlis tom qaab muaj tuabneeg has rua Yuta tas, “Thama kws yog koj tug nyaab moog ua puj muag cev muaj mivnyuas lawm.” Yuta txhad has tas, “Ca le coj nwg tawm moog, muab nwg hlawv pov tseg.”

Thaus puab saamswm coj Thama tawm moog, Thama txawm tso tuabneeg moog has rua txwv yawg has tas, “Kuv plaab mivnyuas nuav yog cov hov txhua chaw nuav tug tswv le mivnyuas.” Hab nwg has tas, “Thov koj swm ua tuab zoo saib lub nplhaib nrug saw kws txaam txwm hab tug paas nreg nuav yog leejtwg le.”
Yuta paub hlo tas yog nwg le, nwg txhad has tas, “Tug quaspuj nuav ua ncaaj dua kuv vem yog kuv tsw muab nwg txws rua kuv tug tub Sela.” Yuta kuj tsw nrug Thama pw ua ke dua le lawm.
Thaus txug caij yug mivnyuas na cav yog ib nkawm mivnyuas ntxaib nyob huv plaab.
Thaus saamswm yug mas ib tug mivnyuas txawm cev teg tshwm lug ua ntej. Tug puj kws paab yug mivnyuas muab ib txuj xuv lab khi txhais teg mas has tas, “Tug nuav xub yug.”
Thaus kws tug mivnyuas hov nkaum teg lawm txawm yug tau dua ib tug ua ntej. Tug puj kws paab yug mivnyuas txawm qw has tas, “Eb, txeem le caag lug,” mas txhad muab tis npe hu ua Peles.
Dhau hov tug kws khi txuj xuv lab ntawm txhais teg le yug lug txhad muab tis npe hu ua Xelag.

Yauxej raug coj moog rua nraag Iyi tebchaws lawm mas Pautifa kws yog tuabneeg Iyi kws yog Falau le ib tug thawj rog, yog tug thawj rog kws kaav cov tub rog kws zuv vaajntxwv, yuav Yauxej ntawm cov tuabneeg Yisama‑ee kws coj nwg tuaj.
Yawmsaub nrug nraim Yauxej nyob, Yauxej tej daag num txhad vaam meej. Nwg nyob huv nwg tug lospaav kws yog tuabneeg Iyi lub tsev.
Tug lospaav pum tas Yawmsaub nrug nraim Yauxej hab pum tas Yawmsaub pub txhua yaam kws Yauxej txhais teg ua vaam meej tuaj.
Yauxej yog tug kws tam tug lospaav, mas nwg txaus sab rua Yauxej, nwg txhad tsaa Yauxej ua tug kws saib taag nrho lub cuab lub yig hab nwg tej hov txhua chaw huvsw.

Txwj thaus nwg tsaa Yauxej ua tug kws saib nwg lub cuab lub yig hab nwg tej hov txhua chaw huvsw, Yawmsaub kuj foom koob moov rua tug tuabneeg Iyi hov tsev tuabneeg vem yog saib rua Yauxej. Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua nwg tej hov txhua chaw huvsw huv nwg lub vaaj lub tsev hab huv tej laj teb.

Nwg muab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj tso rua Yauxej saib. Txwj thaus muaj Yauxej lawm nwg tsw txhawj txug ib yaam daabtsw le tsuas yog pluag mov kws nwg noj xwb. Yauxej yog ib tug ntsej muag zuag plag zoo nraug ntxag.
Nyob tsw ntev lospaav tug quaspuj pheej saib saib Yauxej tes txawm thaab tas, “Ca le lug nrug kuv pw.”

Tassws Yauxej tsw kaam txawm teb lospaav tug quaspuj tas, “Swm xaav saib maj, thaus muaj kuv lawm, lospaav kuj tsw txhawj txug ib yaam daabtsw huv lub vaaj lub tsev le, nwg muab txhua yaam kws nwg muaj tso plhuav rua huv kuv txhais teg.

Huv lub tsev nuav nwg kuj tsw ua luj dhau kuv, nwg tsw tseg ib yaam daabtsw kws tsw muab tso rua kuv le tsuas yog tseg koj tug kheej xwb vem koj yog nwg tug quaspuj. Kuv yuav ua qhov phem luj nuav hab ua txhum rua Vaajtswv tau le caag?”
Txawm yog nwg thaab Yauxej ib nub taag ib nub thab, los Yauxej kuj tsw quav ntsej le tsw kaam nrug nwg pw hab nrug nwg nyob.
Muaj ib nub Yauxej nkaag moog ua num huv lub tsev, tsw muaj ib tug tub qhe nyob huv tsev le.
Tug quaspuj hov txawm ntsab nkaus Yauxej lub tsho hab has tas, “Lug nrug kuv pw.” Yauxej txawm nti ua lub tsho hle hlo rua huv tug quaspuj hov txhais teg hab tswv tawm rua nrau zoov lawm.
Thaus tug quaspuj pum tas Yauxej tso plhuav lub tsho tseg rua huv nwg txhais teg tswv rua nrau zoov lawm,
nwg txawm qw hu cov tub qhe kws zuv tsev lug has tas, “Saib maj, lospaav coj tug tuabneeg Henplais lug ca ua saib tsw taug peb. Nwg nkaag lug yuav nrug kuv pw, kuas kuv qw nrov.
Thaus nwg nov kuv lub suab qw nwg txawm tso plhuav nwg lub tsho tseg rua ntawm kuv tswv tawm rua nrau zoov lawm.”
Tes tug puj hov txawm khaws lub tsho hov ca moog txug thaus nwg tug quasyawg lug tsev,
tes nwg txawm has zaaj hov rua nwg tug quasyawg tas, “Tug tub qhe kws yog tuabneeg Henplais kws koj coj lug nrug peb nyob hov, nkaag lug saib tsw taug kuv.
Thaus kuv tsaa suab qw nrov, nwg txawm tso plhuav lub tsho tseg rua ntawm kuv tswv tawm rua nrau zoov lawm.”
Thaus tug lospaav nov tej lug kws tug quaspuj has rua nwg tas, “Koj tug qhev ua le nuav rua kuv,” nwg kuj npau tawg heev.
Tug lospaav txhad muab Yauxej kaw rua huv lub nkuaj kws kaw cov tuabneeg kws vaajntxwv rau txem. Yauxej txhad raug kaw rua hov ntawd.
Tassws Yawmsaub kuj nrug nraim Yauxej nyob hab ua txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov tshwm lug rua nwg, hab pub kuas tug kws saib lub nkuaj txaus sab rua nwg.
Tug kws saib lub nkuaj txhad muab cov kws raug kaw huvsw huv lub nkuaj tso rua Yauxej saib. Tej num huvsw kws ua huv lub nkuaj Yauxej yog tug kws yuav tsum saib.
Mas tug kws saib lub nkuaj tsw saib tej num kws muab tso rua Yauxej saib lawm, vem yog Yawmsaub nrug nraim Yauxej nyob. Txhua yaam num kws nwg ua Yawmsaub kuj pub kuas ua tau tav zoo heev.
Tsw ntev tom qaab, tug kws thab cawv txwv maab rua vaajntxwv Iyi hab tug kws ua ncuav rua vaajntxwv ua txhum rua ob tug tug tswv kws yog vaajntxwv Iyi.
Mas Falau chim rua ob tug tub teg tub taw hov, yog tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab hab tug thawj kws ua ncuav,
txhad muab ob tug kaw rua huv tug thawj rog kws zuv vaajntxwv lub tsev, yog nyob huv lub nkuaj kws kaw Yauxej hab.
Tug thawj rog kws kaav cov tub rog zuv vaajntxwv muab ob tug rua Yauxej saib mas Yauxej ua koom rua ob tug. Ob tug raug kaw tau ib ntus.
Muaj ib mos ob tug puavleej ua npau suav, yog tug kws thab cawv txwv maab hab tug kws ua ncuav rua vaajntxwv Iyi, nyag ua nyag ib zaaj npau suav, nyag zaaj npau suav nyag muaj dua nyag ib lub ntsab.
Thaus kaaj ntug Yauxej tuaj saib ob tug mas pum tas ob tug txhawj heev.
Nwg txawm nug Falau ob tug tub teg tub taw kws nrug nwg raug kaw rua huv nwg tug lospaav lub tsev tas, “Ua caag nub nua meb ntsej muag ntshaus ntshaus le?”

Ob tug teb tas, “Wb ob leeg ua npau suav mas tsw muaj leejtwg txhais rua ib.” Yauxej has rua ob tug tas, “Qhov kws txhais tau npau suav nyob ntawm Vaajtswv los tsw yog? Thov meb pav rua kuv noog saib.”
Tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab txawm pav nwg zaaj npau suav rua Yauxej noog has tas, “Kuv ua npau suav pum ib tsob txwv maab nyob ntawm kuv xubndag.
Tsob txwv maab hov muaj peb tug ceg. Thaus ua cos paaj mas txawm tawg paaj hab txw txwv maab ua tej tauv sav taamswm ntawd.
Mas Falau lub khob nyob huv kuv txhais teg, kuv txawm de cov txwv maab tsu kua rua huv Falau lub khob hab thab lub khob rua Falau.”
Yauxej has rua nwg tas, “Zaaj npau suav txhais le nuav. Peb tug ceg hov yog peb nub.

Tshuav peb nub sau nuav Falau yuav tsaa koj lub taubhau sawv hab tsaa koj lug nyob koj lub qub chaw. Koj yuav rov tau thab lub khob rua huv Falau txhais teg yaam le yaav taag lug lawm kws koj ua tug thab cawv txwv maab rua nwg.
Thaus koj tau zoo lawm, thov ncu txug kuv, hab thov koj hlub kuv es paab has txug kuv zaaj rua Falau sub kuv txhad tawm tau huv lub tsev nuav.
Qhov tseeb puab nyag kuv huv cov Henplais lub tebchaws lug. Hab huv lub tebchaws nuav los kuv kuj tsw tau ua txhum daabtsw kws txaus muab kaw rua huv lub nkuaj aav nuav.”
Thaus tug thawj kws ua ncuav pum tas tej lug kws txhais npau suav hov zoo, nwg txawm has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv kuj ua npau suav pum muaj peb lub choo ncuav txawb sau kuv taubhau.
Huv lub choo kws txawb hlo txheej sau muaj ob peb yaam ncuav ci kws yuav muab rua Falau, mas muaj noog saamswm noj tej ncuav huv lub choo kws nyob sau kuv taubhau.”
Yauxej txhad teb nwg tas, “Zaaj npau suav txhais le nuav. Peb lub choo hov yog peb nub.
Tshuav peb nub Falau yuav muab koj lub taubhau nqaa kuas nrug ntawm koj lub cev. Nwg yuav muab koj lub cev dai rua ntawm ib tsob ntoo, mas noog yuav lug noj koj cev nqaj.”

Thaus puv peb nub yog nub kws yug Falau nwg paam noj haus rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw huvsw, tes txawm tso tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab hab tug thawj kws ci ncuav lug rua huv plawv nwg cov tub teg tub taw huvsw.
Falau pub tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab rov tau nyob lub qub chaw, nwg rov thab lub khob rua Falau txhais teg yaam le qub.
Huas Falau muab tug thawj kws ci ncuav dai cej daab tuag lawv le Yauxej tau txhais zaaj npau suav.
Tassws tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab tsw ncu txug Yauxej le, nov qaab le lawm.
Dhau hov lug tau ob xyoos Falau txawm ua npau suav tas nwg sawv ntawm ntug dej Nai,
cav txawm muaj xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog zoo zoo nkauj tawm huv tug dej Nai lug noj tej nplooj lojkov.
Tes txawm muaj dua xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pob txhaa xwb tawm huv tug dej Nai lawv qaab lug, lug sawv ntawm cov maum nyuj kws rog rog ntawm ntug dej Nai.
Cov maum nyuj kws ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pob txhaa txawm muab xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog zoo nkauj hov noj taag. Tes Falau txawm tswm dheev lug.
Nwg rov tsaug zug ua dua ib zaaj npau suav pum ib tsob nplej  muaj xyaa naab zoo hab puv heev.
Tes txawm muaj xyaa naab nplej npluag hab qhuav qhawv tawm lawv qaab tuaj vem yog raug cua saab nub tuaj.
Tej naab nplej npluag hov txawm muab xyaa naab nplej kws puv zoo nqog huvsw lawm hab. Tes Falau txawm tswm dheev, hab paub tas yog ua npau suav.

Thaus kaaj ntug nwg txhawj heev, nwg txawm has kuas hu cov txwv neeb txwv yaig huvsw hab cov kws txawj ntse huvsw huv Iyi tebchaws tuaj cuag nwg, mas Falau pav nwg tej npau suav rua puab noog, tassws tsw muaj leejtwg txhais tau tej npau suav hov rua Falau le.
Thaus hov tug thawj kws thab cawv txwv maab txhad has rua Falau tas, “Nub nua kuv ncu dheev txug kuv tej kev txhum.
Falau, thaus koj chim rua koj cov tub qhe es muab kuv hab tug thawj kws ci ncuav kaw rua huv tug thawj rog kws zuv vaajntxwv lub tsev,
muaj ib mos ib ob leeg ua npau suav, kuv hab nwg nyag ua nyag ib zaaj npau suav hab nyag muaj nyag lub ntsab.

Muaj ib tug hluas Henplais, yog tug thawj rog kws zuv vaajntxwv tug qhev, raug kaw ua ke. Thaus ib ob leeg pav npau suav rua nwg noog, nwg kuj txhais tau ib le npau suav lub ntsab, lawv le nyag ua nyag zaaj npau suav.
Nwg txhais ib ob leeg tej npau suav le caag kuj muaj tseeb le ntawd. Kuv txhad raug tsaa rov ua teg num qub, tassws tug kws ci ncuav raug muab dai tuag lawm.”
Falau txhad has kuas hu Yauxej lug, mas puab txhad maaj nroog moog coj Yauxej tawm huv lub nkuaj aav lug. Thaus Yauxej chais fwj txwv hab hloov rwg tsho lawm, nwg txawm lug cuag Falau.
Falau has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv ua npau suav tsw muaj leejtwg txhais tau le. Kuv nov tas thaus koj nov zaaj npau suav lawm, koj kuj txhais tau.”
Yauxej teb Falau tas, “Qhov kws txhais npau suav tsw yog nyob ntawm kuv. Tassws Vaajtswv yog tug kws yuav txhais lub ntsab zoo rua Falau.”
Falau txhad has rua Yauxej tas, “Huv kuv zaaj npau suav hov kuv sawv ntawm ntug dej Nai,
mas pum xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog zoo nkauj tawm huv tug dej Nai lug noj nplooj lojkov.
Tes txawm muaj dua xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pob txhaa tawm ua qaab lug, thoob Iyi tebchaws kuv tsw tau pum dua nyuj ntxaug le nuav.
Cov maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pob txhaa hov txawm muab xyaa tug maum nyuj rog rog noj taag.
Thaus noj taag lawm tsw muaj leejtwg yuav paub tas muab noj taag lawm tsua qhov tseed ntxaug ntxaug le qub. Tes kuv txawm tswm dheev lug.
“Kuv rov ua dua ib zaaj npau suav pum ib tsob nplej muaj xyaa naab zoo hab puv zoo.
Hab muaj dua xyaa naab nplej npluag qhuav qhawv nkig nkuav tawm lawv qaab tuaj vem yog raug cua saab nub tuaj.
Cov naab nplej npluag hov txawm muab xyaa naab nplej puv zoo hov nqog taag lawm. Kuv pav tej npau suav nuav rua cov txwv neeb txwv yaig noog, tassws tsw muaj leejtwg txhais tau.”
Yauxej txawm has rua Falau tas, “Koj ob zaaj npau suav yog tuab zaaj. Tub yog Vaajtswv qha rua Falau paub txug tej kws Vaajtswv yuav ua.
Xyaa tug maum nyuj kws zoo hov yog xyaa xyoo, hab xyaa naab nplej puv zoo hov kuj yog xyaa xyoo. Yeej yog tuab zaaj npau suav xwb.

Xyaa tug maum nyuj ntxaug ntxaug tshuav pob txhaa kws tawm lawv qaab tuaj hov kuj yog xyaa xyoo, hab xyaa naab nplej npluag kws raug cua saab nub tuaj ntsawj qhuav qhawv kuj yog xyaa xyoo kws raug kev tshaib nqhes.
Muaj tseeb lawv le kuv has rua Falau nuav, yog Vaajtswv qha rua Falau paub txug tej kws Vaajtswv yuav ua.
Yuav muaj mov noj nplua quas mag thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws xyaa xyoo.
Dhau ntawd yuav raug kev tshaib nqhes xyaa xyoo, ua kuas tsw ncu tas txeev muaj noj nplua quas mag huv Iyi tebchaws. Txujkev tshaib nqhes hov yuav rhuav tshem lub tebchaws,
yuav tsw paub tej kev noj nplua quas mag vem tas tej kev tshaib nqhes kws yuav tshwm tuaj nuav yuav txom nyem kawg nkaus.
Qhov kws Falau ua ob zaaj npau suav nuav lub ntsab txhais has tas Vaajtswv tub npaaj tej nuav ca lawm, Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas tshwm lug sai sai nuav.
“Vem le nuav ca Falau xaiv ib tug kws txawj xaav hab muaj tswvyim, muab tsaa ua tug saib taag nrho Iyi tebchaws.

Ca Falau npaaj ib co tuabneeg ua tub teg tub taw saib thoob plawg lub tebchaws hab sau tej qoob loos huv Iyi tebchaws ib feem huv tswb feem rua ncua swjhawm xyaa xyoo kws qoob loos zoo ntau nplua quas mag nuav ca.
Mas ca cov tuabneeg hov sau tej qoob loos huv xyaa xyoo zoo zoo kws saamswm yuav lug hov ca, hab muab tej qoob loos hov khaws ca huv Falau tug fwjchim rua huv tej moos hab muab ceev ca.
Tej qoob loos nuav yuav muab khaws ca faaj seeb rua xyaa xyoo kws yuav muaj kev tshaib nqhes tshwm lug rua Iyi tebchaws. Ua le nuav mas lub tebchaws txhad tsw raug kev tshaib nqhes puam tsuaj taag.”
Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw suavdawg pum zoo le kws Yauxej has.
Falau txhad has rua nwg cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Peb yuav nrhav ib tug kws muaj Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig nrug nraim nwg ib yaam le tug nuav tau hab lov?”
Falau txhad has rua Yauxej tas, “Vem Vaajtswv qha zaaj xwm txheej nuav huvsw rua koj, mas tsw muaj ib tug kws txawj xaav hab muaj tswvyim zoo le koj.
Koj yuav saib taag nrho kuv lub vaaj tse hab kuv tej pejxeem suavdawg yuav tsum ua lawv le koj has kuas puab ua. Yog has txug kuv lub zwm txwv kuv txhad ua luj dua koj xwb.”
Falau has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv tsaa koj ua tug kws kaav taag nrho Iyi tebchaws.”
Falau txhad hle nwg lub nplhaib ntaus hom thawj ntawm nwg txhais teg rua Yauxej coj hab muab rwg tsho ntaub maag zoo zoo rua Yauxej naav hab muab saw kub rua Yauxej coj ntawm cej daab.
Hab kuas Yauxej caij vaajntxwv lub tsheb kws ob. Muaj tuabneeg qw ua nwg ntej has tas, “Ca le txhus caug.” Falau tub tsaa nwg kaav taag nrho Iyi tebchaws le nuav.
Tsw taag le ntawd xwb Falau kuj has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv yog Falau, taag nrho Iyi tebchaws yuav tsw muaj ib tug twg tsaa teg tsaa taw tau, yuav tsum yog koj tso ncauj tsaiv.”

Falau txhad muab Yauxej tis npe hu ua Xafena Pane‑a, hab nwg muab tug pov thawj Pautifela huv lub moos Oo tug ntxhais Axena rua Yauxej yuav ua quaspuj. Yauxej txhad tawm moog saib thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Thaus Yauxej chiv ua num rua Falau kws ua vaajntxwv huv Iyi tebchaws hov nwg noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo. Yauxej txawm tawm ntawm Falau xubndag moog moog lug lug thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws.
Xyaa xyoo kws qoob zoo zoo hov tej teb tau qoob loos ntau nplua quas mag.

Xyaa xyoo hov Yauxej sau tej qoob loos huvsw ntau nplua quas mag thoob plawg Iyi tebchaws, hab muab khaws ca rua huv tej moos. Tej qoob loos kws tau ntawm lub moos twg kuj muab khaws ca rua huv lub moos ntawd.
Yauxej sau tau qoob loos ntau nplua quas mag yaam le tej xuab zeb ntawm ntug havtxwv, ntau heev txhad tseg tsw suav lawm vem yog suav tsw txheeb.
Thaus tsw tau txug xyoo kws tshaib nqhes, tug pov thawj Pautifela huv lub moos Oo tug ntxhais Axena yug ob tug tub rua Yauxej.
Yauxej tis npe rua tug hlub hu ua Manaxe  tsua qhov nwg has tas, “Vaajtswv ua rua kuv nov qaab tej kev txom nyem huvsw hab nov qaab kuv txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg.”
Nwg tis npe rua tug tub yau hu ua Efa‑i.  “Vem Vaajtswv pub kuv muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv raug txom nyem nyuaj sab.”
Xyaa xyoo kws qoob loos zoo ntau nplua quas mag huv Iyi tebchaws kuj dhau lawm.

Xyaa xyoo kws muaj kev tshaib nqhes txawm chiv tshwm lug lawv le Yauxej tau has tseg lawm. Tej kev tshaib nqhes hov muaj thoob plawg rua huv txhua lub tebchaws, tassws huv Iyi tebchaws tseed muaj mov noj.
Thaus Iyi tebchaws suavdawg tshaib plaab, tej pejxeem kuj qw hu rua Falau thov mov noj, mas Falau has rua cov tuabneeg Iyi suavdawg tas, “Ca le moog cuag Yauxej, nwg has le caag, mej ua le ntawd.”
Thaus kev tshaib nqhes muaj thoob plawg tebchaws, Yauxej txawm qheb txhua lub txhaab muag qoob rua cov Iyi, vem muaj kev tshaib nqhes luj heev rua huv Iyi tebchaws.
Tsw yog le hov xwb, taag nrho lub nplajteb kuj tuaj cuag Yauxej huv Iyi tebchaws txhad yuav tau qoob, tsua qhov muaj kev tshaib nqhes luj heev thoob plawg lub nplajteb.
Thaus Yakhauj paub tas huv Iyi tebchaws muaj mog hab qeb, nwg txhad has rua nwg cov tub tas, “Ua caag mej nyob sws zooj le kod?”
Nwg txhad has tas, “Kuv nov xuv tas huv Iyi tebchaws muaj mog hab qeb. Ca le moog yuav mog hab qeb hov ntawd lug rua peb sub peb txhad le muaj txujsa nyob tsw tuag tshaib.”
Yauxej kaum tug tijlaug txhad le moog yuav mov noj huv Iyi tebchaws.
Tassws Yakhauj tsw tso Yauxej tug kwv Npeeyamee nrug cov tijlaug moog, nwg ntshai tsaam tes muaj xwm le caag rua Npeeyamee.
Ua le nuav Yixayee cov tub txhad le nrug luas tej ua ke moog yuav mog hab qeb vem kev tshaib nqhes muaj thoob plawg Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Yauxej yog tug thawj kws kaav lub tebchaws. Nwg yog tug kws muag qoob loos rua tej pejxeem suavdawg. Yauxej cov tijlaug kuj tuaj pe nwg khwb ti nkaus aav.

Thaus Yauxej pum nwg cov tijlaug nwg kuj paub puab tassws nwg ua txuj tsw paub, mas has nyaum nyaum rua puab tas, “Mej tuaj hovtwg tuaj?” Puab teb tas, “Peb tuaj huv Khana‑aa tebchaws tuaj, yog peb tuaj yuav mov noj.”
Yauxej yeej paub cov tijlaug, tassws cov tijlaug tsw paub nwg le lawm.
Yauxej ncu txug zaaj npau suav kws nwg tau ua pum puab, nwg txhad has rua puab tas, “Mej yog tuabneeg tshuaj tebchaws, mej tuaj saib peb tebchaws qaug zug qhov twg xwb.”
Puab teb tas, “Yawm hlub, tsw yog le ntawd. Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe tuaj yuav mov noj xwb.
Peb suavdawg koom tuab leej txwv, peb yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe tsw yog tuaj tshuaj tebchaws.”
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Tsw tseeb, yeej yog mej tuaj saib lub tebchaws qaug zug qhov twg xwb.”

Puab teb nwg tas, “Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe muaj kaum ob leeg kwvtij, koom tuab leej txwv kws tseed nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws. Nub nua tug kwv ntxawg tseed nrug txwv nyob, huas muaj ib tug kwv tsw nyob lawm.”
Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Qhov kws kuv has tas mej tuaj tshuaj tebchaws hov muaj tseeb tag.
Kuv yuav swm mej le nuav. Muaj Falau kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, mej yuav tawm tsw tau ntawm lub chaw nuav moog le, moog txug thaus mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj txug hov ntawm nuav tsaiv.

Ca mej tso ib tug moog coj tug kwv ntxawg tuaj, tassws mej cov yuav nyob huv tsev lojfaaj sub txhad tshuaj tau mej tej lug saib mej has tseeb los cuav. Yog tsw ua le ntawd, mas muaj Falau kws muaj txujsa nyob pum, mej yeej yog tuabneeg tshuaj tebchaws xwb.”
Yauxej txawm muab cov tijlaug kaw rua huv lojfaaj tau peb nub.
Nub peb Yauxej has rua puab tas, “Ua le nuav mas mej txhad dim txujsa, vem kuv paub ntshai Vaajtswv.

Yog tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tag, mas ca mej ib tug nyob raug kaw rua huv tsev lojfaaj, es dua lwm tug ca le moog, es thauj mog hab qeb moog rua mej tsev tuabneeg kws saamswm tshaib plaab tau noj,
hab coj mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj cuag kuv. Yog ua le nuav kuv txhad paub tas mej has tseeb tag, mas mej txhad tsw tuag.” Puab kuj ua le ntawd.

Cov tijlaug sws ywg has tas, “Qhov tseeb peb tau ua txhum rua peb tug kwv. Thaus peb pum nwg raug txom nyem nyuaj sab nwg thov thov peb los peb tsw noog nwg. Vem le nuav txujkev txom nyem nuav txhad le poob rov lug raug peb ntaag lauj.”
Lunpee has rua puab tas, “Kuv tub has kuas mej tsw xob ua txhum rua tug mivtub hov los tsw yog? Tassws mej tsw noog kuv has le. Yog le nuav peb txhad tau rws nwg cov ntshaav lawm.”
Puab tsw paub tas Yauxej nkaag sab puab tej lug, tsua qhov thaus puab has lug muaj ib tug txhais rua Yauxej.
Yauxej txawm tawm moog quaj quaj, le rov lug nrug puab has lug. Nwg coj Xime‑oo moog khi kag taab meeg ntawm puab xubndag.
Yauxej has kuas ntim mog hab qeb puv nkaus puab tej seev hab muab txhua tug tej nyaj rov qaab ntsaws rua huv txhua tug lub seev, hab ntim zaub mov rua puab noj taug kev. Cov qhev kuj ua le ntawd.
Cov tijlaug txawm pem nraa tsaws rua neeg luav hab tawm moog.
Thaus puab moog txug chaw su, muaj ib tug qheb nwg lub ncauj seev yuav muab qeb rua nwg le neeg luav noj, ua cav pum nwg cov nyaj nyob huv lub ncauj seev.

Nwg txhad has rua nwg cov kwvtij tas, “Mej saib kuv cov nyaj luas muab thim rov rua kuv lawm, nyob ntawm ncauj seev.” Cov kwvtij poob sab nthaav, puab sws nug ntshai tshee quas nyo has tas, “Vaajtswv ua daabtsw le nuav rua peb?”
Thaus puab lug cuag puab txwv Yakhauj huv Khana‑aa tebchaws lawm, puab pav txhua yaam kws muaj tshwm lug hov rua leej txwv noog has tas,
“Tug yawm kws ua tug thawj kaav lub tebchaws hov has nyaum kawg rua peb, hab has tas peb yog tuabneeg tshuaj tebchaws xwb.
Tassws peb has rua nwg tas, ‘Peb yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, peb tsw yog tuaj tshuaj tebchaws.
Peb muaj kaum ob leeg kwvtij koom tuab leej txwv, tassws ib tug tsw nyob lawm hab tug kwv ntxawg tseed nrug peb txwv nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.’

Tug yawm kws kaav lub tebchaws hov has rua peb tas, ‘Ua le nuav kuv txhad paub tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg. Mej ca le tso ib tug kwvtij nrug kuv nyob es dua lwm tug ca le thauj mog hab qeb moog rua mej tsev tuabneeg kws saamswm tshaib plaab tau noj, es ca le moog.

Ca le coj mej tug kwv ntxawg tuaj cuag kuv, kuv txhad paub tseeb tas mej yog tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg tsw yog tuabneeg tshuaj tebchaws, mas kuv le maav muab tug kwvtij nuav tso dim rua mej, hab mej yuav tau ua laag ua luam huv lub tebchaws nuav.’ ”
Thaus puab suavdawg nchuav puab tej seev, txhua tug kuj pum nyag naab nyaj nyob huv nyag lub seev. Thaus puab hab leej txwv pum tej naab nyaj hov, puab kuj poob sab nthaav.

Yakhauj kws yog puab leej txwv has rua puab tas, “Mej ua rua kuv ncaim kuv tej mivnyuas. Yauxej kuj tsw nyob lawm, Xime‑oo kuj tsw nyob lawm, mas nwgnuav tseed yuav coj Npeeyamee moog hab. Kuv raug tej xwm txheej nuav huvsw lawm lauj!”

Lunpee txhad has rua leej txwv tas, “Yog kuv tsw coj Npeeyamee rov lug rua koj, koj ca le muab kuv ob tug tub tua pov tseg. Koj ca le muab Npeeyamee rua huv kuv txhais teg, kuv yuav coj nwg rov lug rua koj kuas tau.”

Yakhauj has tas, “Kuv tug tub yuav tsw nrug koj moog nraag Iyi tebchaws, tsua qhov nwg tug tijlaug kuj tuag lawm, tsuas yog tshuav Npeeyamee tuab leeg xwb. Yog nwg raug xwm le caag rua thaus nwg nrug mej taug kev moog, mej yuav ua rua kuv tug dawb hau nuav moog ua lwj sab kawg le rua huv tub tuag teb.”
Kev tshaib nqhes tseed muaj luj heev huv lub tebchaws.
Thaus Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg noj tej mog hab qeb kws puab coj huv Iyi tebchaws lug taag lawm, leej txwv txawm has rua puab tas, “Ca le rov moog yuav mivntswv mov lug rua peb noj.”
Kuas Yuta has rua nwg tas, “Tug num hov has tu nrho rua peb tas, ‘Yog mej tug kwv tsw nrug mej tuaj, tes mej yuav tsw pum kuv lub ntsej muag hlo le.’
Yog koj tso tug kwv nrug peb moog, peb le maav moog yuav mov noj lug rua koj.
Tassws yog koj tsw tso tug kwv moog, peb yuav tsw moog le, vem tug num hov has rua peb tas, ‘Yog mej tug kwv tsw nrug mej tuaj, tes mej yuav tsw pum kuv ntsej muag hlo le.’ ”
Yixayee txhad has tas, “Ua caag mej ua tsw zoo rua kuv es tseed qha rua tug yawm hov tas muaj dua ib tug kwv hab nua?”

Puab teb tas, “Tug yawm hov nug txhaab nug txhua txug peb hab peb cov kwvtij has tas, ‘Mej txwv tseed muaj txujsa nyob lov? Mej muaj dua ib tug kwv lov?’ Peb txhad teb lawv le nwg nug ntawd. Peb yuav ua caag paub tas yog nwg yuav lem kuas coj tug kwv moog nua?”
Yuta txhad has rua nwg txwv Yixayee tas, “Tso tug miv kwv nrug kuv moog, peb yuav sawv kev moog mas peb hab koj hab peb cov mivnyuas suavdawg txhad caj sa nyob tsw tuag tshaib.

Kuv yuav muab kuv lub taubhau tiv tug kwv nuav, hab kuv yuav ua tug kws qhwv hlo nwg. Yog kuv tsw coj nwg rov lug rua koj hab tsw cob nkaus rua ntawm koj xubndag, tes ca kuv rws txujkev txhum nuav moog ib txhws.
Yog peb tsw taab kaum le nuav, tes peb tub moog ob tsaav lawm lauj.”

Puab txwv Yixayee txawm has rua puab tas, “Ca mej ua le nuav. Muab tej qoob loos kws zoo kawg huv lub tebchaws nuav ib yaam mivntswv ntim rua mej lub naab coj moog ua tshaav ntuj pub rua tug yawm num hov, yog mivntswv roj ntoo ua tshuaj, mivntswv zwb ntaab, roj ntoo, roj tsw qaab, noob txwv ntoo roj hab noob txwv duaj.
Hab coj nyaj ob npaug moog hab. Coj tej nyaj kws muab thim rua ntawm mej cov ncauj seev, tej zag yog puab tsw ncu saib lawm xwb.
Ca le sawv kev coj mej tug kwv moog cuag tug yawm num hov.
Thov Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus  ua rua tug yawm hov khuvleej mej, sub nwg txhad tso mej tug tijlaug hab Npeeyamee rov lug. Txawm yog kuv tej mivnyuas yuav ncaim kuv los xwjpeem.”
Puab txhad le coj tej tshaav ntuj hab nyaj txag ob npaug hab Npeeyamee ua ke moog. Puab sawv kev moog rua nraag Iyi tebchaws hab moog cuag Yauxej.

Thaus Yauxej pum Npeeyamee nrug puab tuaj nwg txawm has rua tug tub qhe kws saib tsev tas, “Ca le coj cov tuabneeg nuav moog rua huv tsev, hab tua ib tug tsaj hab npaaj rooj tog kuas txhwj, tsua qhov cov tuabneeg nuav yuav nrug kuv noj su.”
Tug kws saib tsev ua lawv le Yauxej has, nwg coj cov tuabneeg hov moog rua huv Yauxej tsev.

Cov tuabneeg hov kuj ntshai heev vem luas coj puab moog rua huv Yauxej tsev, puab txawm sws thaam has tas, “Ntshai yog tim tej nyaj kws zag u muab thim rua huv peb tej seev, puab txhad coj peb lug rua huv nuav, sub tug num txhad nrhav tau swjhawm nplawm peb hab nteg peb ua qhev hab txeeb peb tej neeg luav.”
Puab txhad moog cuag tug kws saib Yauxej tsev hab has rua nwg ntawm qhov rooj.
Puab has tas, “Yawm hlub, thov koj noog peb has. Zag u peb tuaj yuav mov noj,

mas thaus peb moog txug chaw su peb qheb peb tej seev kuj pum txhua tug le nyaj nyob huv txhua tug lub ncauj seev, tej nyaj hov nyob txhwj zog tsw poob ib feeb le. Peb txhad coj tej nyaj hov rov tuaj.
Peb tseed coj dua ib co nyaj ntawm teg tuaj yuav mov moog noj hab. Peb tsw paub le sov leejtwg muab tej nyaj hov ntim rov rua huv tej seev.”

Tug kws saib tsev txawm teb tas, “Tsw xob txhawj, tsw xob ntshai. Tej zag yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab mej txwv tug Vaajtswv muab tej nyaj txag rua huv mej tej seev kaj. Mej cov nyaj zag hov kuv tub khaws lawm.” Tes nwg txawm coj Xime‑oo lug rua puab.
Thaus tug kws saib tsev coj puab lug rua huv Yauxej lub tsev, nwg muab dej rua puab ntxuav kwtaw hab muab quav nyaab rua neeg luav noj.
Puab npaaj tej tshaav ntuj tog cev rua Yauxej rua thaus taav su nwg yuav lug, tsua qhov puab nov tas puab yuav noj mov ua ke hov ntawd.
Thaus Yauxej rov lug tsev, puab txawm coj tej tshaav ntuj kws puab npaaj hov tuaj rua huv tsev muab pub rua Yauxej hab pe Yauxej ti nkaus aav.
Yauxej nug txug puab kev noj qaab nyob zoo hab has tas, “Leejtxwv laug laug kws mej has txug hov nyob zoo hab lov? Nwg tseed muaj txujsa nyob lov?”
Puab teb tas, “Peb txwv kws yog koj tug qhev nyob zoo tseed muaj txujsa nyob.” Tes puab txawm nyo hau pe dua ib zag.
Yauxej tsaa muag saib pum nwg tug kwv Npeeyamee kws nrug nwg koom nam, hab nug tas, “Tug nuav yog tug kwv ntxawg kws mej has rua kuv lov? Mivtub, thov Vaajtswv hlub koj.”
Tes Yauxej txawm tawm plawg lawm, vem yog nwg mob sab tug kwv heev tauv tsw taug kua muag nwg txhad moog rua huv txaaj hab quaj.
Yauxej txawm ntxuav muag taag rov lug, ua sab tawv tawv has tas, “Rau zaub rau mov.”

Cov tub qhe rau ib rooj rua Yauxej tuab leeg noj hab rau ib rooj rua cov kwvtij noj, hab rau dua ib lub rooj rua cov Iyi noj, tsua qhov cov Iyi caiv tsw nrug cov Henplais koom rooj noj mov vem tas puab suav tas yog kev qas vuab tsuab rua cov Iyi.
Yauxej cov kwvtij nyob ntawm nwg lub xubndag, nyob quas zug tug hlub kws muaj feem ua tij moog txug tug yau kawg. Puab ib leeg saib ib leeg xaav tsw thoob le.
Cov tub qhe ntaus zaub mov ntawm Yauxej lub rooj rua cov kwvtij, tassws Npeeyamee le feem mas ntau dua cov tijlaug le tswb npaug. Puab txhad nrug Yauxej noj haus xyiv faab hlo.

Yauxej has rua tug saib nwg lub tsev tas, “Ca le ntim mog hab qeb kuas puv cov tuabneeg nuav tej seev npaum le kws puab thauj taug, hab muab puab cov nyaj ntsaws rua huv puab txhua tug lub ncauj seev,
hab muab kuv lub khob nyaj ntsaws rua huv tug kwv ntxawg lub seev ua ke nrug cov nyaj yuav tej mog hab qeb.” Nwg txawm ua lawv nraim le Yauxej has.
Thaus kaaj ntug nwg txhad tso puab cov tuabneeg hov hab tej neeg luav rov moog tsev.

Thaus puab tawm huv nroog moog tsw tau deb heev, Yauxej has rua tug kws saib tsev tas, “Ca le sawv tseeg moog lawv cov tuabneeg hov, thaus moog lawv cuag, ca le nug tas, ‘Ua caag mej yuav ua kev phem pauj kev zoo? Ua caag mej nyag kuv lub khob nyaj lug lawm?
Lub khob hov yog kuv tug tswv lub khob haus hab swv twv txug tom hauv ntej. Mej ua le nuav mas yog ua txhum.’ ”
Thaus nwg lawv cuag puab nwg has tej lug ntawd rua puab.
Puab txawm teb tas, “Yawm hlub ua caag koj has le kod? Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe peb yeej tsw tau ua le kod.
Swm xaav saib maj, cov nyaj kws peb pum huv peb tej ncauj seev, peb tseed coj huv Khana‑aa tebchaws rov qaab tuaj rua koj. Peb yuav nyag tej nyaj tej kub huv koj tug tswv lub tsev tau le caag?
Yog koj pum lub khob hov nyob huv peb cov kws yog koj tub qhe nuav leejtwg, koj kuj muab tug hov tua, hab peb tseed yuav moog ua koj kws yog peb tug tswv le qhev hab.”
Nwg has tas, “Ca ua lawv le kws mej has. Yog kuv pum lub khob hov nyob ntawm leejtwg mas tug hov yuav tsum ua kuv le qhev, huas mej cov mas tsw txhum.”
Puab suavdawg maaj nroog nyag tsaws nyag tej seev rua huv peg teb, hab qheb tej ncauj seev.
Tug kws saib tsev txhad tshawb saib tug tub hlub le moog txug ncua tug tub ntxawg le, mas pum lub khob nyob huv Npeeyamee lub seev.
Puab txawm dua rhe puab tej tsho hab txhua tug tsaws tej nraa rua neeg luav thauj rov lug rua huv lub nroog.
Thaus Yuta hab cov kwvtij lug txug Yauxej lub tsev, Yauxej tseed nyob huv tsev. Puab txhad khwb nkaus rua huv aav ntawm Yauxej xubndag.
Yauxej txhad has rua puab tas, “Mej ua daabtsw le nuav? Mej tsw paub tas tuabneeg zoo le kuv nuav mas paub tau tej kws yuav muaj tshwm lug rua tom hauv ntej lov?”

Yuta teb tas, “Peb yuav teb le caag rua kuv tug tswv? Peb yuav has le caag? Peb yuav has daws peb zaaj le caag? Vaajtswv muab peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe tej kev txhum nthuav lug lawm. Yawm hlub, peb txhua tug hab tug kws pum lub khob nyob huv nwg txhais teg yuav ua koj le qhev.”

Tassws Yauxej has tas, “Kuv yeej los yuav tsw ua le hov. Tsuas yog tug kws pum lub khob nyob huv nwg txhais teg ua kuv le qhev xwb. Tassws dua le mej cov mas ca le rov qaab moog kuas txug mej txwv ua kaaj sab lug.”

Yuta txhad nkaag moog cuag Yauxej has tas, “Yawm hlub 'e, kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe thov has ib lus rua koj. Thov koj tsw xob chim rua kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe, tsua qhov koj zoo taam le Falau ntaag.
Koj nug peb kws yog koj le tub qhe tas, ‘Mej tseed muaj txwv hab muaj kwv hab lov?’

Peb txhad teb kuv tug tswv tas, ‘Peb muaj txwv, nwg laug laug le lawm hab muaj ib tug kwv yau kws yug rua thaus txwv laug lawm. Tug kwv yau hov tug tijlaug kuj tuag lawm, cov kws nrug nwg koom nam tshuav nwg ib leeg xwb. Txwv hlub tug ntawd heev.’
Koj txawm has rua peb kws yog koj le tub qhe tas, ‘Coj tug kwv hov tuaj rua kuv saib ntawm nuav.’
Peb txhad has rua yawm hlub tas, ‘Tug tub hluas nuav yuav ncaim tsw tau leej txwv hlo le. Yog nwg ncaim txwv moog lawm mas txwv yuav tuag xwb.’
Koj txawm has rua peb kws yog koj le tub qhe tas, ‘Yog mej tug kwv ntxawg tsw nrug mej tuaj mas mej yuav tsw pum kuv lub ntsej muag dua le lawm.’
Thaus peb rov moog txug kuv txwv kws yog koj tug tub qhe lawm, peb kuj pav koj tej lug rua nwg noog.
Mas thaus peb txwv has tas, ‘Mej rov moog yuav mivntswv mov rua peb noj,’
peb txhad has tas, ‘Peb moog tsw tau. Yog tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb moog, peb le moog, tsua qhov peb yuav tsw pum tug yawm hlub hov lub ntsej muag hlo le yuav yog tug kwv ntxawg nrug peb moog xwb.’
Kuv txwv kws yog koj tug tub qhe txhad has rua peb tas, ‘Mej paub tas kuv tug quaspuj yug tau ob tug tub rua kuv.
Ib tug ncaim kuv lawm mas kuv xaav tas tsaj nyaum muab nwg dua noj taag lawm, kuv tsw pum nwg lug txug naj nub nwgnuav le.
Yog mej tseed coj tug nuav ncaim kuv moog es yog nwg raug xwm txheej le caag lawm, mej yuav ua rua kuv tug dawb hau nuav moog ua lwj sab kawg le rua huv tub tuag teb.’
Vem le nuav yog kuv rov qaab moog txug kuv txwv kws yog koj tug tub qhe es tug tub hluas nuav tsw nrug peb moog, mas thaus kuv txwv kws nwg txujsa cog nkaus rua tug tub hluas nuav

pum tas tug tub hluas nuav tsw nrug peb rov moog tsev, txwv yuav tuag. Peb kws yog koj le tub qhe yuav ua rua peb txwv tug dawb hau kws yog koj tug tub qhe moog rua huv tub tuag teb ua lwj sab kawg le xwb.
Kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe qhwv hlo tug kwv nuav rua txwv has tas, ‘Yog kuv tsw coj nwg rov lug rua koj, kuv yuav rws txujkev txhum nuav rua ntawm koj xubndag moog ib txhws le.’
Vem le nuav thov ca kuv kws yog koj tug tub qhe nyob tug tub hluas chaw ua koj le qhev es thov tso tug kwv nrug cov tijlaug moog.
Yog tug tub hluas tsw nrug kuv ua ke, kuv yuav ua le caag rov moog cuag tau kuv txwv? Ntshai tsaam yuav pum xwm txheej phem lug raug kuv txwv.”

Yauxej tauv tsw taug nwg lub kua muag taab meeg cov tuabneeg suavdawg kws sawv vej quas vog nwg, nwg txawm nthe tas, “Kuas txhua tug ca le tawm ntawm kuv moog,” txhad tsw muaj leejtwg nyob ntawd rua thaus Yauxej qha nwg rua cov kwvtij paub.
Mas Yauxej quaj nrov nrov ua rua cov Iyi nov hab Falau tsev tuabneeg tau nov.
Yauxej has rua nwg cov kwvtij tas, “Kuv yog Yauxej. Kuv txwv tseed muaj txujsa nyob lov?” Tassws nwg cov kwvtij ceeb nkaus tsw txawj teb le caag, vem paub tas yog Yauxej ntaag.
Yauxej txhad has rua nwg cov kwvtij tas, “Txaav lug ze kuv maj.” Puab kuj txaav lug ze. Yauxej txhad has tas, “Kuv yog Yauxej yog tug kwv kws mej muab muag lug rua huv Iyi tebchaws nuav.
Tassws nwgnuav tsw xob poob sab tsw xob chim rua mej tug kheej tsua qhov kws muag kuv lug rua ntawm nuav. Yog Vaajtswv xaa kuv ua mej ntej lug sub txhad cawm tau txujsa.
Lub tebchaws tub tshaib nqhes tau ob xyoos lawm, tseed tshuav tswb xyoos ntxwv hab kws yuav tsw laij teb tsw muaj qoob sau.
Vaajtswv xaa kuv ua mej ntej lug sub txhad tuav tau mej tshuav nyob huv nplajteb hab cawm tau mej cov tuabneeg kuas muaj txujsa nyob coob coob.

Yog le nuav tsw yog mej xaa kuv lug rua ntawm nuav tassws yog Vaajtswv xaa kuv lug. Vaajtswv tsaa kuv ua Falau txwv, hab ua tug tswv kws saib Falau lub cuab huvsw hab ua tug thawj kaav Iyi tebchaws huvsw.

Mej ca le maaj nroog moog cuag kuv txwv hab has rua nwg tas, Koj tug tub Yauxej has le nuav tas, ‘Vaajtswv tsaa kuv ua tug thawj kaav taag nrho Iyi tebchaws lawm. Ca le tswv lug cuag kuv nraag nuav, tsw xob tog.
Koj yuav tau nyob huv Kausee hab koj hab koj cov mivnyuas hab koj cov xeeb ntxwv hab koj tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj hab txhua yaam kws koj muaj huvsw yuav tau nyob ze kuv.
Kuv yuav tu koj hov ntawd tsua qhov tseed yuav tshaib nqhes tswb xyoos ntxwv hab. Tsw ua le nuav tes koj tsev tuabneeg hab txhua yaam kws koj muaj yuav pluag taag.’
Mej hab kuv tug kwv Npeeyamee lub qhov muag pum tas yog kuv lub qhov ncauj has rua mej ntaag.
Mej ca le pav rua txwv noog txug kuv lub meej mom huvsw huv Iyi tebchaws, hab txhua yaam kws mej pum. Mej ca le maaj nroog moog coj kuv txwv lug rua nraag nuav.”
Yauxej khawm nwg tug kwv Npeeyamee cej daab hab quaj. Npeeyamee kuj khawm Yauxej cej daab quaj hab.
Yauxej nwj nwg cov tijlaug suavdawg hab quaj. Dhau ntawd cov kwvtij nrug Yauxej sws thaam.
Thaus muaj xuv has moog rua huv Falau lub vaaj lub tsev tas, “Yauxej cov kwvtij tuaj,” Falau hab nwg cov tub teg tub taw kuj zoo sab heev.
Falau has rua Yauxej tas, “Has rua koj cov kwvtij tas, ‘Mej ua le nuav, muab nraa rua tsaj thauj hab rov moog rua Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Coj koj txwv hab mej tsev tuabneeg lug cuag kuv, kuv yuav pub thaaj aav kws zoo kawg huv Iyi tebchaws rua mej, hab mej yuav tau noj tej kws zoo tshaaj plawg huv lub tebchaws nuav.’
Koj kuj has rua puab tas, ‘Ua le nuav, coj tsheb huv Iyi tebchaws moog tog mej cov mivnyuas yau hab mej cov quaspuj hab coj mej txwv lug.
Tsw xob khauv xwm mej tej hov txhua chaw peg, tsua qhov tej kws zoo kawg huv Iyi tebchaws yog mej le lawm.’ ”
Yixayee cov tub kuj ua lawv le ntawd. Yauxej npaaj tsheb rua puab lawv le Falau has hab muab mov rua puab noj taug kev.
Nwg muab tej tsoog tsho zoo zoo rua puab ib leeg ib ce. Tassws nwg muab peb puas sekhee nyaj  hab tswb ce tsoog zoo zoo rua Npeeyamee.

Yauxej xaa tej nuav moog rua nwg txwv, yog kaum tug neeg luav thauj tej kws zoo kawg huv Iyi tebchaws moog hab kaum tug maum neeg luav thauj mog hab qeb hab ncuav hab zaub mov rua leej txwv noj taug kev.
Nwg txawm xaa nwg cov kwvtij moog, mas thaus puab sawv kev moog, nwg has rua puab tas, “Tsw xob sws caav taug kev.”
Cov kwvtij txhad tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog rua Khana‑aa tebchaws moog cuag leej txwv Yakhauj.
Puab has rua nwg tas, “Yauxej tseed muaj txujsa nyob. Nwg yog tug thawj kws kaav taag nrho Iyi tebchaws.” Yakhauj nyob haab nuv vem nwg tsw ntseeg tej kws puab has.
Thaus puab pav tej lug kws Yauxej has rua puab huvsw rua leej txwv noog hab thaus Yakhauj pum tej tsheb kws Yauxej xaa tuaj tog nwg, nwg txhad zoo sab tuaj.
Yixayee txhad has tas, “Kuv txaus sab lawm lauj. Kuv tug tub Yauxej tseed muaj txujsa nyob. Kuv yuav moog pum nwg ua ntej kws kuv tuag.”
Yixayee txhad coj nwg tej cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw taug kev moog. Thaus moog txug ntawm Npe‑awsenpa, nwg kuj xyeem hov txhua chaw rua nwg txwv Yiha tug Vaajtswv.
Thaus tsaus ntuj Yixayee ua yug quas toog nov Vaajtswv has lug rua nwg tas, “Yakhauj, Yakhauj 'e.” Yakhauj teb tas, “Kuv nyob ntawm nuav 'os.”
Vaajtswv has tas, “Kuv yog Vaajtswv, yog koj txwv tug Vaajtswv. Koj tsw xob ntshai qhov kws moog rua nraag Iyi tebchaws, tsua qhov kuv yuav pub koj ua ib haiv tuabneeg coob coob rua ntawd.
Kuv yuav nrug koj moog rua Iyi tebchaws, hab kuv yuav coj koj rov qaab lug dua ib zag. Yauxej yuav muab nwg txhais teg plhw koj ob lub qhov muag thaus koj tuag.”
Yakhauj txawm tawm ntawm Npe‑awsenpa moog. Yixayee cov tub muab leej txwv Yakhauj hab puab tej mivnyuas yau hab puab tej quaspuj caij tej tsheb kws Falau xaa tuaj tog puab.
Taag nrho Yakhauj hab nwg tej tub ki huvsw coj puab tej tsaj txhu cuab txhaj cuab taam kws puab muaj huv Khana‑aa tebchaws huvsw moog rua huv Iyi tebchaws.
Yakhauj coj nwg cov tub hab tej tub xeeb ntxwv nwg cov ntxhais hab tej ntxhais xeeb ntxwv nrug nwg moog. Nwg cov tub ki xeeb ntxwv huvsw nwg coj nrug nwg moog rua nraag Iyi tebchaws.
Cov nuav yog Yixayee tej tub ki xeeb ntxwv kws moog rua huv Iyi tebchaws tej npe, yog Yakhauj hab nwg tej tub. Lunpee yog Yakhauj tug tub hlub.
Lunpee cov tub yog Hanau, Palu, Hexaloo hab Khami.
Xime‑oo cov tub yog Yemu‑ee, Yami, Auha, Yakhi, Xauha hab Sa‑u kws yog tug quaspuj Khana‑aa yug.
Levi cov tub yog Kwsoo, Khauha, hab Melali.
Yuta cov tub yog Ws, Auna, Sela, Peles hab Xelag, tassws Ws hab Auna tub tuag rua tebchaws Khana‑aa lawm. Peles cov tub yog Hexaloo hab Hamu.
Ixakha cov tub yog Thaula, Puva, Yasu,  hab Siloo.
Xenpuloo cov tub yog Xeles, Eloo hab Yale‑ee.
Cov nuav yog cov tub kws Le‑a yug huv tebchaws Panta Alaa rua Yakhauj, hab ib tug ntxhais hu ua Ntina. Le‑a tej tub ki xeeb ntxwv huvsw muaj peb caug peb leeg.
Kas cov tub yog Xifi‑oo, Hakiv, Suni, Exanpoo, Elis, Alaunti hab Aleli.
Asaw cov tub yog Ina, Isava, Isavi hab Npeliya, hab ib tug ntxhais hu ua Xelas. Npeliya cov tub yog Henpaw hab Makhi‑ee.
Cov nuav yog cov tub ki xeeb ntxwv kws Xilapa yug rua Yakhauj, huvsw muaj kaum rau leej. Xilapa yog tug nkauj qhev kws Lanpaa muab pub rua nwg tug ntxhais Le‑a.
Yakhauj tug quaspuj Lachee le tub yog Yauxej hab Npeeyamee.
Yauxej cov tub kws yug huv Iyi tebchaws yog Manaxe hab Efa‑i. Ob tug nuav yog tug pov thawj Pautifela kws nyob lub moos Oo  tug ntxhais Axena yug.
Npeeyamee cov tub yog Npela, Npekhaw, Asanpee, Kela, Na‑amaa, Ehi, Laus, Mupi, Hupi hab As.
Cov nuav yog cov tub ki xeeb ntxwv kws Lachee yug rua Yakhauj mas huvsw muaj kaum plaub leeg.
Ntaaj tug tub yog Husi.
Nathali cov tub yog Yaxe‑ee, Kuni, Yexaw hab Silee.
Cov nuav yog cov tub ki xeeb ntxwv kws Npiha yug rua Yakhauj, mas huvsw muaj xyaa leej. Npiha yog tug nkauj qhev kws Lanpaa muab pub rua nwg tug ntxhais Lachee.
Yakhauj cov tuabneeg kws yog nwg cov tseem noob kws nrug nwg moog rua huv Iyi tebchaws tsw suav Yakhauj cov nyaab mas huvsw muaj rau caum rau leej.
Yauxej cov tub kws yug rua huv Iyi tebchaws muaj ob leeg. Suav Yakhauj tsev tuabneeg huvsw kws moog rua huv Iyi tebchaws muaj xyaa caum leej.
Yakhauj khaiv Yuta ua ntej moog qha Yauxej tuaj ntswb puab rua huv Kausee.  Mas puab txhad moog txug ntawm Kausee.
Yauxej txawm caij tsheb moog ntswb nwg txwv Yixayee ntawm Kausee. Thaus moog cuag leej txwv nwg txhad khawm nkaus leej txwv cej daab hab quaj ntev ntev.
Yixayee has rua Yauxej tas, “Nwgnuav kuv tuag los tau lawm lauj, tsua qhov kuv tub pum koj lub ntsej muag lawm hab paub tas koj tseed muaj txujsa nyob.”

Yauxej has rua nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg tas, “Kuv yuav moog cuag Falau hab has rua nwg tas, ‘Kuv cov kwvtij hab kuv txwv tsev tuabneeg kws nyob huv Khana‑aa tebchaws lug txug kuv lawm.
Cov tuabneeg hov yog tuabneeg yug yaaj yug tshws hab yug nyuj. Puab coj puab tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj hab puab cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw lug lawm.’
Thaus Falau hu mej moog cuag hab nug mej tas, ‘Mej ib txwm ua num daabtsw?’

mej yuav tsum has tas, ‘Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe yog tuabneeg yug tsaj txhu ib txwm thaus yau lug txug naj nub nwgnuav, ib yaam le peb tej laug yeej los yug,’ sub mej txhad tau nyob huv Kausee vem tas cov tuabneeg Iyi ntxub txhua tug kws yug yaaj yug tshws.”

Yauxej moog cuag Falau hab has tas, “Kuv txwv hab kuv cov kwvtij hab puab tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj hab puab tej cuab txhaj cuab taam huvsw lug ntawm Khana‑aa tebchaws lug. Nwgnuav puab nyob huv Kausee.”
Yauxej xaiv cov kwvtij tswb leeg coj moog cuag Falau.
Falau nug Yauxej cov kwvtij tas, “Mej ib txwm ua num daabtsw?” Puab has rua Falau tas, “Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe yog tuabneeg yug yaaj yug tshws ib yaam le peb tej laug.”

Puab has rua Falau tas, “Peb lug nyob ib ntus huv lub tebchaws nuav los vem yog Khana‑aa tebchaws tshaib nqhes heev tsw muaj tshaav zaub rua peb yug tsaj. Nwgnuav thov koj ca peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe nyob huv Kausee lauj.”
Falau txhad has rua Yauxej tas, “Koj txwv hab koj cov kwvtij lug txug koj lawm.

Lub tebchaws Iyi nyob ntawm koj xubndag, ca koj txwv hab koj cov kwvtij nyob ruaj rua thaaj teb kws zoo kawg nkaus, ca puab nyob huv Kausee. Yog koj paub koj cov kwvtij tug twg muaj peevxwm, mas tsaa tug hov saib kuv tej tsaj txhu hab.”
Yauxej coj nwg txwv Yakhauj moog cuag Falau, Yakhauj kuj foom koob moov rua Falau.
Falau has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj noob nyoog muaj pes tsawg xyoo lawm?”

Yakhauj teb Falau tas, “Kuv ua neej nyob tsw ruaj chaw huv lub nplajteb nuav tau ib puas peb caug xyoo, kuv txujsa tsw ntev hab txom txom nyem le, tsw ntev le kuv tej laug txujsa kws puab ua neej nyob tsw ruaj chaw huv lub nplajteb nuav.”
Yakhauj foom koob moov rua Falau taag tes txhad tawm ntawm Falau lub xubndag moog lawm.
Yauxej txawm tu chaw rua nwg txwv hab nwg cov kwvtij nyob, hab muab tej teb kws zoo kawg nkaus huv Iyi tebchaws ntawm lub moos Lamexe ua puab tug lawv le Falau has.
Yauxej muab zaub mov rua nwg txwv hab nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg tau noj lawv le txhua yim muaj tuabneeg coob los tsawg.
Thaus ntawd tsw muaj mov noj thoob plawg lub tebchaws, vem kev tshaib nqhes luj heev ua rua Iyi tebchaws hab Khana‑aa tebchaws qhuav nkig nkuav qaug zug taag.
Yauxej sau tej nyaj txag huvsw huv Iyi tebchaws hab Khana‑aa tebchaws kws cov pejxeem coj tuaj yuav mog hab qeb, hab coj moog ca rua huv Falau lub tsev.

Thaus cov Iyi hab cov Khana‑aa tej nyaj taag lawm, cov Iyi suavdawg tuaj cuag Yauxej hab has tas, “Thov pub mov rua peb noj lauj. Koj yuav ca peb tuag tshaib rua ntawm koj xubndag lov? Tsua qhov peb tej nyaj taag lawm.”
Yauxej txhad teb tas, “Yog mej tej nyaj taag lawm, tes coj mej tej tsaj txhu tuaj, kuv yuav muab mov pauv mej tej tsaj.”
Puab txhad coj puab tej tsaj txhu tuaj rua Yauxej, mas Yauxej muab mov pauv puab tej neeg tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj tej neeg luav. Xyoo ntawd nwg muab mov pauv puab tej tsaj txhu huvsw.

Dhau xyoo hov lawm xyoo tom qaab puab tuaj cuag nwg hab has tas, “Peb thov has tseeb rua koj ua hlub tas peb tej nyaj los taag lawm, peb tej nam paab tsaj txhu los poob ua koj le taag lawm. Tsw tshuav daabtsw ntawm koj xubndag lawm, tsuas yog tshuav peb lub cev hab peb tej laj teb xwb.

Koj yuav ca peb hab peb tej laj teb puam tsuaj rua ntawm koj xubndag lov? Koj ca le muab mov noj pauv peb hab peb tej laj teb, peb hab peb le laj teb yuav ua Falau qhev. Thov muab noob qoob rua peb cog sub peb txhad caj sa nyob tsw tuag hab tej laj teb txhad tsw nyob do cuas ca.”
Yauxej txhad yuav tej laj teb huvsw huv Iyi rua Falau. Cov Iyi txhua tug muag puab tej laj teb vem yog kev tshaib nqhes luj heev, tej laj teb txhad poob ua Falau tug.
Mas Yauxej txhad muab Iyi cov pejxeem thoob plawg tebchaws ua qhev.
Tsuas yog tseg cov pov thawj le laj teb Yauxej txhad tsw yuav xwb, tsua qhov Falau npaaj puab le feem rua puab lawm puab txhad tau noj. Yog le nuav puab txhad tsw tau muag puab tej laj teb.
Yauxej has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Saib maj, nub nua kuv tub yuav mej hab mej tej laj teb rua Falau lawm. Mas nwgnuav kuv muab noob qoob rua mej coj moog cog rua huv tej laj teb.

Thaus sau qoob loos lawm mej yuav muab ib feem huv tswb pub rua Falau, muab plaub feem ua mej tug swv ua noob cog rua huv mej tej laj teb hab ua mov rua mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg hab mej tej mivnyuas tau noj.”
Puab has tas, “Koj cawm tau peb txujsa lawm, thov koj kws yog peb tug tswv hlub peb es peb yuav ua Falau qhev.”

Yauxej txhad rhawv ib txuj kevcai has txug tej laj teb huv Iyi tebchaws swv lug txug naj nub nwgnuav, yog has tas Falau yuav tau qoob loos ib feem huv tswb. Tsuas yog tshuav cov pov thawj tej laj teb txhad tsw poob ua Falau tug xwb.
Cov Yixayee nyob huv Iyi tebchaws ntawm Kausee le has nuav. Puab tau laj tau teb ua puab tug hab muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob heev.
Yakhauj tseed muaj txujsa nyob huv Iyi tebchaws tau kaum xyaa xyoo. Yakhauj le noob nyoog huvsw muaj ib puas plaub caug xyaa xyoo.

Thaus ze swjhawm kws Yixayee yuav tu sav, nwg hu Yauxej lug has tas, “Yog koj hlub kuv, mas muab koj txhais teg tso rua huv qaab kuv txhais ncej qaab es cog lug tas koj yuav ua zoo hab ua ncaaj rua kuv. Tsw xob muab kuv log rua huv Iyi tebchaws.
Thaus kuv moog nrug kuv tej laug nyob lawm, koj ca le coj kuv tawm huv Iyi tebchaws rov moog log rua lub chaw kws log puab.” Yauxej teb tas, “Kuv yuav ua lawv le kws koj has.”
Yixayee txawm has rua nwg tas, “Ca le cog lug twv.” Yauxej kuj cog lug twv rua leej txwv. Tes Yixayee txawm nyo hau qhuas Vaajtswv sau nwg lub txaaj pw.
Dhau ntawd lug muaj tuabneeg has rua Yauxej tas, “Koj txwv muaj mob.” Yauxej txawm coj nwg ob tug tub yog Manaxe hab Efa‑i nrug nwg moog.
Muaj tuabneeg has rua Yakhauj tas, “Koj tug tub Yauxej tuaj saib koj.” Yixayee txhad swv zug sawv nyob tsawg sau txaaj.
Yakhauj txhad has rua Yauxej tas, “Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus  tau tshwm rua kuv pum ntawm lub moos Lu  huv Khana‑aa tebchaws hab foom koob moov rua kuv,
hab has rua kuv tas, ‘Kuv yuav ua rua koj muaj tub ki fuam vaam coob coob, hab kuv yuav ua rua koj ua ntau haiv tuabneeg hab yuav muab lub tebchaws nuav rua koj caaj ceg ua puab tug moog ib txhws.’

Koj ob tug mivnyuas kws koj yug huv Iyi tebchaws ua ntej kws kuv tsw tau lug txug koj huv Iyi tebchaws nuav kuj yog kuv le hab. Efa‑i hab Manaxe yuav ua kuv le mivnyuas, ib yaam le Lunpee hab Xime‑oo.
Huas cov yau kws koj yug tom qaab le yog koj le mivnyuas. Puab yuav raug hu lawv ob tug tijlaug lub xeem txhad tau qub txeeg qub teg ntawm ob tug.

Thaus kuv tawm ntawm Panta lug, mas kuv nyuaj sab kawg tsua qhov kws Lachee tuag rua thaus taug kev huv Khana‑aa tebchaws rua ntawm lub chaw kws lug yuav txug Efatha. Mas kuv muab nwg log rua ntawm ntug kev kws moog rua Efatha, kws yog Npelehee.”
Thaus Yixayee pum Yauxej ob tug tub nwg txhad has tas, “Nuav yog leejtwg?”
Yauxej teb nwg tas, “Nuav yog kuv ob tug tub kws Vaajtswv pub rua kuv huv lub tebchaws nuav.” Yixayee txhad has tas, “Thov koj coj ob tug lug es kuv yuav foom koob moov rua ob tug.”
Yixayee qhov muag pum kev tsw tseeb lawm vem nwg laug heev, saib daabtsw los tsw tshua pum. Yauxej txhad coj ob tug txaav lug ze Yixayee, mas nwg nwj hab puag ob tug.
Yixayee has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv xaav tas kuv yuav tsw pum koj lub ntsej muag le lawm. Tassws Vaajtswv tseed pub kuv pum koj cov mivnyuas hab.”
Yauxej tsaws mivnyuas ntawm Yixayee hauv caug lug hab pe ua lub plhu ti nkaus aav.
Yauxej tuav ob tug tub teg moog ti nkaus leej txwv, nwg saab teg xws tuav rawv Efa‑i moog rua Yixayee saab teg phem, nwg saab teg phem tuav rawv Manaxe moog rua Yixayee saab teg xws.

Tassws Yixayee xyaab saab teg xws moog tso rua sau Efa‑i kws yog tug yau lub taubhau, hab nwg muab nwg saab teg phem tso rua sau Manaxe taubhau, txawm yog Manaxe yog tug hlub los nwg xyaab teg sws rws le nuav.
Mas Yixayee foom koob moov rua Yauxej tas, “Thov Vaajtswv kws kuv yawm Aplahaa hab kuv txwv Yiha fwm hab yog tug Vaajtswv kws coj kuv txuj hauv kev ib swm neej lug txug naj nub nwgnuav,

yog tug tubkhai kws paab kuv dim huv txhua yaam kev phem, thov tug Vaajtswv hov foom koob moov rua ob tug tub nuav. Thov ca kuv lub npe hab kuv yawm Aplahaa hab kuv txwv Yiha lub npe muaj nyob rua huv puab moog ib txhws. Thov ca ob tug fuam vaam coob rua huv lub nplajteb.”
Thaus Yauxej pum tas nwg txwv muab txhais teg xws tso rua sau Efa‑i taubhau, nwg tsw txaus sab, nwg txawm ntsab nkaus leej txwv txhais teg sau Efa‑i taubhau lug tso rua sau Manaxe taubhau.
Yauxej has rua nwg txwv tas, “Txwv, tsw yog ua le kod, tug nuav txhad yog tug hlub, ca le muab koj txhais teg xws tso rua sau tug nuav taubhau.”

Tassws leej txwv tsw kaam, nwg teb tas, “Kuv paub lawm. Tub, kuv paub lawm. Nwg yuav ua ib haiv tuabneeg hab yuav ua luj. Txawm le caag los xwj, tug kwv yuav ua luj dua tug tijlaug, hab tug kwv caaj ceg yuav ua ntau haiv tuabneeg.”

Nub ntawd Yixayee txhad foom koob moov rua ob tug has tas, “Cov Yixayee yuav tuav meb lub npe foom koob moov has tas, Thov Vaajtswv ua rua mej zoo ib yaam le Efa‑i hab Manaxe.” Lawv le kws has nuav Yixayee txhad tsaa Efa‑i ua luj dua Manaxe.
Yixayee has rua Yauxej tas, “Kuv tub yuav tuag, tassws Vaajtswv yuav nrug nraim mej hab yuav coj mej rov moog rua mej tej laug lub tebchaws.
Hab kuv muab ib thaaj teb ntawm toj sab  kws kuv xuas ntaaj xuas neev txeeb tau ntawm cov tuabneeg Amaulai rua koj xwb tsw muab rua koj cov kwvtij.”
Yakhauj hu nwg cov tub lug mas has tas, “Mej ca le lug txoos ua ke, kuv yuav has tej kws yaav tom hauv ntej yuav tshwm lug rua mej.
“Yakhauj cov tub 'e, ca le lug ua ke noog, ca le tig ntsej noog mej txwv Yixayee tej lug.
“Lunpee, koj yog kuv tug tub hlub, hab yog kuv tug zug, hab yog thawj yaam ntawm kuv tug zug. Koj lub koob meej nchaa dua luas hab koj tug zug heev dua luas.

Koj sab tsw ruaj khov yaam nkaus le dej ndaas, koj yuav tsw tau ua thawj, vem koj nkaag moog rua huv koj txwv lub txaaj pw. Koj ua rua lub txaaj hov qas tsw huv, koj nkaag moog rua huv kuv lub txaaj pw.
“Xime‑oo hab Levi yog ob tug kwvtij. ob tug raab ntaaj yog cuab yeej ua nruj ua tswv.

Kuv tug ntsuj plig 'e, tsw xob nkaag moog rua huv ob tug lub chaw sablaaj. Kuv lub sab 'e, tsw xob moog nrug ob tug cov tuabneeg koom. Vem yog ob tug chim tes txawm ca le tua tuabneeg, hab ob tug txav leeg rawg nyuj lawv le ob tug lub sab.

Thov ca ob tug txujkev chim raug foom tsw zoo, vem yog ob tug ua nruj ua tswv. Ca ob tug txujkev npau tawg raug foom tsw zoo vem yog ob tug nyaum heev. Kuv yuav muab ob tug cais tsw pub ua ke rua huv Yakhauj, hab ua rua ob tug tawg ua saab ua sua rua huv Yixayee.
“Yuta, koj cov kwvtij yuav qhuas koj, koj txhais teg yuav nas koj cov yeeb ncuab caaj qwb, koj txwv cov tub yuav khoov ntshws pe koj.
Yuta yog mivnyuas tsuv ntxhuav. Tub, koj tawm ntawm tug qauv moog lawm. Nwg yuav plab lua pw khwb rwg yaam le txwv tsuv ntxhuav hab zoo le maum tsuv ntxhuav. Leejtwg yuav muaj cuabkaav zwg nwg sawv?
Tug cwj yuav tsw tu ncua ntawm Yuta, tug thawj kaav tug paas nreg yuav tsw pluj ntawm nwg kwtaw moog le moog txug thaus tug kws muaj feem lug txug, hab ib tsoom tuabneeg yuav noog tug hov has.

Nwg yuav muab nwg tug neeg luav khi rua ntawm tsob txwv maab, hab muab tug mivnyuas neeg luav khi rua ntawm tsob txwv maab kws zoo heev. Nwg muab cawv txwv maab ntxhua nwg tej rwg tsho, hab muab kua txwv maab kws lab ploog le ntshaav ntxhua nwg tsoog tsho.
Nwg lub qhov muag lab quas khav cawv txwv maab, nwg kaug nav dawb paug le kua mig.
“Xenpuloo yuav nyob ntawm ntug havtxwv, nwg yuav ua chaw nreg nkoj, nwg le nrwm teb yuav npuas lub moos Xaintoo.
“Ixakha yog tug neeg luav kws muaj zug heev, nwg plab lua cug nwg lub nraa.
Nwg pum tas lub chaw su zoo, hab lub tebchaws txaus sab, tes txawm cug xub pwg kwv, hab yeem raug luas yuam ua qhev.
“Ntaaj yuav ua ib tug tu plaub rua nwg haiv tuabneeg, yog ib xeem huv cov Yixayee.
Ntaaj yuav zoo le ib tug naab kws nyob ntawm ntug kev, yog ib tug naab muaj taug ntawm ntug kev kws tum neeg lauj taw ua rua tug kws caij poob ntxeev hlo.
Au Yawmsaub, kuv tog ntsoov koj txujkev cawm dim.
“Kas yuav muaj tuabneeg lws nwg, tassws nwg rov lawv puab qaab moog lws tau.
“Asaw yuav muaj qoob loos nplua mag, nwg yuav ua tej zaub mov kws vaajntxwv noj.
“Nathali yog ib tug maum muas lwj kws dha ywj sab ywj ntsws, nwg yug tau mivnyuas muas lwj zoo nkauj.
“Yauxej yog ib tug ceg kws txw txwv ncw, yog tug ceg txw txwv kws nyob ntawm qhov dej txhawv, nwg tej ceg nthuav moog hlaa ntsaa loog.
Cov tub rog tua neev tua nwg ua nruj ua tswv, puab tua neev hab ua nyaum kawg le rua nwg.

Tassws nwg raab neev tseed khov kho, hab nwg txhais npaab tseed muaj zug, vem yog muaj Yakhauj tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim txhais teg, hab vem muaj tug yug yaaj kws yog Yixayee lub Txhwb Zeb lub npe,

hab vem muaj koj txwv tug Vaajtswv kws yuav paab koj, yog Vaajtswv tug muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus kws yuav foom koob moov rua koj, yog tej moov kws lug sau ntuj lug hab tej moov kws lug huv nruab tiv txwv, hab tej moov kws lug ntawm cov kua mig hab lub plaab mivnyuas.

Tej moov kws lug ntawm koj txwv lug mas luj dua tej moov kws lug ntawm tej roob kws nyob ib txhws, hab luj dua tej kws zoo nplua quas mag sau tej pov roob kws nyob moog ib txhws. Thov tej moov nuav lug rua sau Yauxej lub taubhau hab lug rua sau tug kws raug ncaim cov kwvtij lub hauv plaj.
“Npeeyamee yog ib tug maa nyaum lawv nqaj, thaus sawv ntxuv nwg noj tej kws tum tau lawm, thaus tsaus ntuj nwg muab tej kws txeeb tau faib.”
Cov nuav yog Yixayee kaum ob xeem. Tej lug nuav yog tej kws leej txwv has rua puab rua thaus foom koob moov rua puab. Nwg foom koob moov rua txhua tug lawv le tswm nyog txhua tug tau.
Yakhauj nkaw lug rua puab tas, “Kuv yuav moog nrug kuv tej laug nyob, ca muab kuv log ua ke nrug kuv tej laug rua huv lub qhov tsua kws nyob ntawm Efoo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai daim teb.

Yog lub qhov tsua kws nyob huv daim teb ntawm Mapela kws nyob Maale saab nub tuaj huv Khana‑aa tebchaws. Lub qhov tsua hab daim teb nuav Aplahaa yuav ntawm Efoo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai lug ua nwg tug ca ua toj ntxaas.
Qhov chaw ntawd puab tub log Aplahaa hab Xala kws yog nwg tug quaspuj hab puab log Yiha hab Lenpekha kws yog nwg tug quaspuj. Hab tuab qhov chaw ntawd kuv kuj log Le‑a.
Daim teb hab lub qhov tsua kws nyob huv daim teb hov peb yuav ntawm cov tuabneeg Hithai.”
Thaus Yakhauj has rua nwg cov tub taag lawm, nwg txawm nqaa hlo nwg txhais kwtaw rua sau lub txaaj tes tu sav nrho, moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob.
Yauxej puag nkaus nwg txwv xubndag quaj hab nwj nwg.
Yauxej has rua cov Kws tshuaj kws yog nwg le tub teg tub taw kuas muab tshuaj pleev hab cub nwg txwv lub cev. Cov Kws tshuaj kuj ua le ntawd rua Yixayee lub cev tuag.
Puab ua tau plaub caug nub vem qhov kws pleev hab cub tshuaj rua lub cev tuag swv swjhawm plaub caug nub. Cov Iyi kuj quaj ntsuag Yixayee tau xyaa caum nub.
Thaus dhau lub swjhawm quaj ntsuag lawm, Yauxej has rua Falau cov tub teg tub taw tas, “Yog mej txaus sab rua kuv, thov paab moog has rua Falau le nuav,

‘Kuv txwv kuas kuv cog lug twv ca has tas, “Kuv tub yuav tuag, koj ca le coj kuv moog log rua huv kuv lub qhov ntxaa kws kuv khawb rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.” Yog le nuav thov koj tso kev rua kuv moog log kuv txwv, kuv le rov lug.’ ”
Falau teb tas, “Ca le coj koj txwv moog log lawv le nwg kuas koj cog lug twv tseg lawm.”
Yauxej txhad coj nwg txwv moog log, Falau cov tub teg tub taw huvsw yog cov kev txwj quas laug huv Falau lub tsev hab cov kev txwj quas laug huv Iyi tebchaws suavdawg nrug nwg moog.
Hab Yauxej tsev tuabneeg huvsw hab nwg cov kwvtij hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg suavdawg moog hab, tseg puab tej mivnyuas hab tej yaaj tej tshws tej nyuj nyob huv Kausee.
Hab muaj tej tsheb ua rog hab muaj cov kws caij neeg nrug nwg moog ua ib paab coob heev kawg le.

Thaus puab moog txug lub tshaav ntaus qoob ntawm Atha kws nyob ntawm tug dej Yalatee saab nub tuaj, puab quaj quaj ntsuag lwj sab ntsuav qhov ntawd. Yauxej ua kevcai paam leej txwv hov ntawd xyaa nub.

Thaus cov tuabneeg Khana‑aa kws nyob huv lub tebchaws hov pum qhov kws paam tuag huv lub tshaav ntaus qoob ntawm Atha, puab sws thaam has tas, “Nuav yog cov Iyi le kev paam tuag lwj sab heev.” Vem le hov puab txhad hu lub chaw hov ua Anpee Mila‑i,  yog nyob ntawm tug dej Yalatee saab nub tuaj.
Yakhauj cov tub paam leej txwv lawv le nwg tau has rua puab.

Nwg cov tub coj nwg moog rua Khana‑aa tebchaws muab log rua huv lub qhov tsua ntawm daim teb huv Mapela kws nyob ntawm Maale saab nub tuaj. Lub qhov tsua hab daim teb nuav Aplahaa yuav ntawm Efoo kws yog tuabneeg Hithai lug ua nwg tug ca ua toj ntxaas.
Thaus muab leej txwv log taag lawm, Yauxej hab nwg cov kwvtij hab txhua tug kws nrug nwg moog log leej txwv suavdawg rov lug rua Iyi tebchaws.
Thaus Yauxej cov tijlaug pum tas leej txwv tuag lawm, puab txawm sws thaam has tas, “Ntshai Yauxej yuav ntxub peb hab yuav ua pauj txhua yaam kws peb ua phem rua nwg lawm.”
Puab txhad le khaiv tuabneeg moog has rua Yauxej tas, “Thaus koj txwv tsw tau tuag nwg has ca le nuav tas,

‘Mej ca le has rua Yauxej tas, Kuv thov kuas koj zaam koj cov tijlaug tej kev txhum txem kws puab ua phem rua koj.’ Mas nwgnuav peb thov koj zaam peb kws yog koj txwv tug Vaajtswv cov tub qhe tej kev txhum.” Thaus Yauxej nov cov tijlaug tej lug nuav nwg quaj quaj.
Nwg cov tijlaug txhad ua ke tuaj khwb nkaus pe Yauxej has tas, “Peb yog koj le tub qhe lauj!”
Yauxej txhad has rua puab tas, “Mej tsw xob ntshai le, kuv nim yog Vaajtswv lov?
Mej xaav ua phem rua kuv tag, tassws Vaajtswv muab ua kuas tau qhov zoo lug cawm tau tuabneeg coob coob txujsa yaam le kws naj nub nwgnuav cawm tau lawm.
Yog le nuav mej tsw xob ntshai le, kuv yuav yug mej hab mej cov mivnyuas.” Yauxej has tej lug nuav nplig puab lub sab txhad le ua rua puab suv sab lawm.
Yauxej hab nwg txwv tsev tuabneeg nyob huv Iyi tebchaws. Yauxej noob nyoog muaj ib puas kaum xyoo.
Yauxej kuj pum Efa‑i le tub hab xeeb leej xeeb ntxwv. Manaxe tug tub Makhi kuj yug mivnyuas rua sau Yauxej hauv caug.

Yauxej has rua nwg cov kwvtij tas, “Kuv tub yuav tuag, kuas Vaajtswv yuav lug saib mej hab yuav coj mej tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog rua lub tebchaws kws Vaajtswv cog lug rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj.”
Yauxej kuas Yixayee cov tub cog lug twv tseg has tas, “Thaus Vaajtswv lug saib mej, mej yuav coj kuv cov pob txhaa nrug mej tawm huv lub tebchaws nuav moog.”
Yauxej tuag thaus nwg noob nyoog muaj ib puas kaum xyoo. Puab muab tshuaj pleev hab cub nwg lub cev tuag, tso rua huv hleb khaws ca rua huv Iyi tebchaws.
